name_zh: 凯岚加本内苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
此款酒酒体适中，多汁水果风味，略带些许辛辣，香草以及橡木味。
The Cabernet Sauvignon is medium‐bodied and possesses rich dark fruit characters supported by spice, hints ofvanilla and oak.

name_zh: 凯岚黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
此款酒口感丰富，前味带有樱桃的风味，单宁柔和，酒体适中，余味带给你如天鹅绒般的丝滑。
Rich, fruit forward cherry flavors, soft tannins, medium body and a smooth velvety finish.

name_en: Duc de Paris Brut, Compagnie Française des Grands Vins
name_zh: 巴黎公爵起泡葡萄酒
info:
Fresh and acidulous wine with a fine scent of white flower, grape and brioche. Lovely on the palate and sufficient persistency. Enjoy as an aperitif or at any time. 
口感鲜爽，略带酸味，十分怡人。散发着一丝精致的白花、葡萄与奶油蛋糕的芬芳。口味浓郁而持久。可作为理想的餐前酒，同时适合任何场合饮用。

name_zh: 传奇波尔多法定产区白葡萄酒
info:
Beautiful straw colour with hints of pale gold.
The nose is subtle and complex, developing aromas of ripe fruit (quince, pear and pineapple) as it is
swirled in the glass.
In the mouth, after a full-bodied attack, it is rounded and flavourful with a pleasant fruity finish.
The wine is to be served with white meats and cheese rather than as an aperitif. 酒体呈美丽的淡黄色，边缘泛淡金色光泽。
香气微妙丰富，有柏树，梨子，和凤梨的芳香。
口感饱满，充满了愉悦的水果气息，回味无穷。
此款酒可与白肉与奶酪搭配，更胜于仅仅作为一款开胃酒。

name_zh: 吉娜斯至尊波尔多干白葡萄酒
info:
This wine displays a brilliant gold pale color. The nose is very fine, pleasant and complex, full of fruits and delicate notes of wood and vanilla. With a lively attack, this well-structured wine offers good length on the finish.
Enjoy with grilled chicken and seafood dishes.
此酒呈明亮的淡金色，散发出精致而怡人的果香、木香和香草的混合芳香。酒体活跃，结构完美，回味持久。
适合搭配烤鸡肉和海鲜类菜肴。

name_zh: 利弗兰加州红葡萄酒
info:
利弗兰红是一款酒体适中的葡萄酒，具柔滑醇厚的余香，黑莓 果香令酒味厚重，非常适合搭配精致菜肴与朋友小酌每日饮用.
Rivercrest Red is a medium‐bodied red wine with a smooth well‐rounded finish. Hints of black cherry fruit add depth and richness to a taste thatcan be enjoyed day after day with good food and friends.

name_zh: 桑塔丽塔古园梅洛红葡萄酒
info:
Deep, red color, with violet and ruby hues. Fragrant
aromas of fresh strawberry, plum and vanilla are complemented by a hint of dried
herbs. Its sweet, well-rounded flavor, rich in fruity undertones, is enhanced by soft tannins and a pleasing note of oak. A treat to be enjoyed on all occasions.

Food Pairing: Ideal for informal "home style" foods, mild cheeses and pastas。 深红宝石色，带有紫罗兰的色晕，新鲜草莓，李子和香草的芳香由干药草的清香得到加强。入口甘甜，圆润，果味十足，并由柔软的丹宁和橡木桶的芳香得到提升。能适合任意场合的饮用。
搭配非正式场合的家居用餐，清淡芝士和意大利面食。

name_en: Le Bosq Rouge Vin de France
name_zh: 博斯克红葡萄酒
info:
此酒色泽鲜红，配合柔软和圆滑口感和水果的味道。
Red color shows a ripe fruit character overlaid with spicy notes of aromatic hers and a soft, round and fruity flavour.

name_zh: 桑塔丽塔古园卡门红葡萄酒
info:
An intense ruby red color with violet hues. Rich
aromas of ripe, red fruit and fragrant spices dominate the bouquet. On the palate, it is a
fresh, light bodied and elegant wine with a commanding, fruity flavor rounded out by
soft tannins that give way to a pleasant and lingering finish. Always an outstanding
choice.
Food Pairing : Lamb, ripe cheeses, pastas a la Bolognese, chicken and stews. 浓郁的红宝石色边缘呈紫罗兰色，芳香的成熟红果和辛香占据优势，入口感觉清新，酒体轻盈优雅，果味浓郁，丹宁圆润，令人愉悦，回味绵长。
是您杰出的选择。
搭配：羊排，重味芝士，意大利面，鸡肉，炖肉类。

name_zh: 克兰朵白葡萄酒
info:
Pale gold color with hints of green. Subtle aromas of white flowers and white fruits with touches of mineral notes. Rich palate fresh finish.
It perfectly matches Guangdong, Huaiyang and Shanghai cuisine. It is also delicious if enjoyed with Thai food that is rich in flavor.
色泽呈浅黄绿色，柚子，细腻的白花和白果芳香中夹带着一丝矿物质的气息。富裕的口感，回味清新。 与广东菜，淮阳菜系和上海菜搭配最完美。同样适于与香味丰富的泰国菜相搭配

name_zh: 天路卡本妮苏维翁红葡萄酒

name_en: Château  Haut Mayne Blanc, Graves AOC
name_zh: 高美尼堡白葡萄酒
info:
Brilliant pale green colour with flashes of silver This wine offers a complex nose of citrus fruit, white flowers and vanilla. Remarkably clean on the palate, it leaves an impression of superbe balance and elegance. A delightful wine with a finish combining woody and floral touches to be enjoyed with freshwater fish. It's best served chilled at between 11°and 12°C.
此酒呈现明亮的绿色，边缘泛银色光泽。散发着混合了柑橘水果、白色花朵和香草气息的复杂香味。无与伦比的清新口感，给人留下了平衡度完美及优雅的印象。一款混合了木质和花香风味的佳酿，适宜搭配新鲜淡水鱼。建议冰镇至11至12度后享用。

name_zh: 香皮勃艮第霞多丽白葡萄酒
info: “风味明快，酒香浓郁，蕴含着些许烟熏芳香。完美展现了原产区的风土特质…一款适合即饮的上乘佳酿。”- Jancis Robinson，15.5/20分 。散发着浓郁的树木气息与柑橘芳香，层次分明而通透，口感醇香圆润，回味爽利甘冽。可即饮或窖藏一年左右。一款风格硬朗的勃艮第干白。”- Burghound，86分 "Racy and rich and smoky fragrant. Lots on the nose for such a modest appellation…a nice wine for early drinking."- 15.5/20 points, Jancis Robinson  “There is more obvious wood influence with more obvious citrus influence as well on the airy and layered nose that leads to slightly richer and rounder flavors that are slightly bigger as well while finishing with a similar finish that is dry, clean and crisp. This could also be drunk now or kept for a year or so. A very solid Bourgogne.” – 86 points, Burghound

name_zh: 勒桦酒庄勃根蒂法定产区白葡萄酒
info:
Delicious, easygoing white, offering apple, cream and mineral character, medium body and pretty finish.  
美味易喝的一款白葡萄酒，带来苹果，奶油和矿物质的特征。酒体为中等至饱满。

name_zh: 贺兰山赤霞珠
紫蝴蝶  贡品 西拉干红葡萄酒
info: 阿德雷山附近的平原地区具有较暖的气候类型，这里出产的葡萄酒口味丰富、果香成熟、单宁复杂、酒体饱满、回味悠长。被视为 19世纪该区葡萄园开拓者和酿酒师贡品之作。The warmer plateaux of the  Adelaide region have a natural affinity for growing distinctively rich wine, with ripe fruit, complex tannins and a long, full-bodied palate. This wine is a tribute to the pioneering grape growers and wine makers of Adelaide in the 19th Century.

name_zh: 里费维庄园勃艮第白葡萄酒
info: 口感丰富紧密，带有苹果柠檬的香味，矿物感明显回味悠长                                                                                     Rich and concentrated, with apple, lemon and rhubarb flavors. Ends firm and long on the detailed finish, where a mineral accent lingers.

name_zh: 法国花都加本力苏维翁干红葡萄酒
info:
Deep purple in color. Generous with intense aromas of red fruit and vanilla. Well-balanced, powerful and round on the palate with a noticeably long finish.
Food Suggestions: Pairs perfectly with red meat, cheeses, sizzling pepper beef and roast duck.
 色泽深紫，红色水果和香草的气息开放且充沛，具良好均衡感，口感强劲且圆润，回味悠长。
与红肉，干酪，黑椒牛柳和烤鸭堪称绝配。

name_zh: 谢尼酒庄干型起泡酒
variety:
Chenin Blanc
Ugni Blanc
Folle Blanche
info: Pale yellow color with hints of green. Numerous and fine bubbles. Fresh and delicate on the nose, with nice fruit aromas. An elegant wine, wellbalanced and pleasant.

name_zh: 让·马克 小夏布利干白葡萄酒
info: 散发着醇美可口的绿水果和柑橘的香气，口感丰富饱满，易于喜爱的清新回味Ripe and pretty aromas of primarily green fruit and citrus, very rich and round flavors, all wrapped in a fresh and easy to like finish. Burghound 87 points/Tart, brisk fruit, lovely weight. Not so petit! Good length too, outperforms the appellation expectation. Drink 2011-2012

name_zh: 褒莱夫人宝拉系列马尔白克红葡萄酒
info:
Our Paula Malbec 2008 presents a typical violet-red color. Its aromas of fresh red and black fruits, berries, spices and cigar box announce a smooth and round wine in mouth.
我们2008年的这款宝拉系列马尔白克呈现出典型的紫罗兰红色。他的芳香中有新鲜红色和黑色水果的香气，并伴随着梅子、香料及雪茄盒的气息，口感顺滑圆润。

name_zh: 歌崇夏布利白葡萄酒
info: Well balanced and refreshing, this bright and elegant Chardonay offers aromas of Lemon Peel, gooseberry and minerals. On the palate are flavors of citrus with hints of melon, 完美的平衡度，本款霞多丽明快而优雅。散发柠檬皮、鹅莓及矿物的芳香，并具有甜橙与些许甜瓜的口感

name_zh: 朵林夏布利白葡萄酒
info:
有明显的矿物质味道，口感丰富愉快的，现在品尝具有轻微的果味
如果等待2或3年的话矿物质会更加丰富酒                     Have significant mineral flavor, taste rich happy, now has a slight taste of the fruit
If you wait for 2 or 3 years minerals will be more rich wine

name_zh: 澳大利亚禾富酒园神雕设拉子红葡萄酒
info:
A fruit driven style with a bouquet of lifted spice, plum and red berry fruit characters and subtle oak overtones. The palate is of medium body, showing soft complex fruit flavors with rich berry characters. Soft tannins help finish the wine with a dry, lingering finish.
 Enjoy with BBQ meats and game. 
系属果香型葡萄酒，蕴含香料、李子及红莓的芬芳及微妙的橡木气息。中度酒体，口味复杂，富含浆果味道。单宁柔和，令其回味略干，持久绵长。
与烧烤及野味搭配美味可口。

name_zh: 路易亚都世家莎布利法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
This wine has a very nice golden yellow color. It is lipid, bright and fresh wine, which taste and bouquet develop relatively quickly.
It should be served chilled,good match with oysters, charcuterie and fried fish.
此酒呈悦目的金黄色。是一款丰满,明亮且清新的酒，酒香扑鼻。  需冰镇后饮用。适合搭配生蚝、 拼盘及炸鱼

name_zh: 威廉费尔夏布利白葡萄酒
info:
Pale yellow Very refined bouquet, developing citrus, white-fleshed fruit and floral notes Fresh and supple, the wine is marked by mineral notes that are typical of the appellation
浅黄色
精致的芬芳，有柑桔类、白果的味道
口感新鲜、柔和，充满了典型夏布利的矿物味

name_zh: 十字马尔山红葡萄酒
info: Deep garnet colour, the nose evokes spicy red fruits. On the palate, the attack is supple, the tanins are round and velvety. Can be kept 5 years

name_en: Columbia Crest Two Vines Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 哥伦比亚山峰双藤加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
The wine presents an intense ruby color with black cherry, blueberry and cocoa aromatics. Similar flavors are perfectly balanced on the palate. It offers lush fruit intensity with a supple, lingering finish.
此酒呈现出红宝石般的浓郁色泽。黑樱桃、蓝莓及可可的芳香四溢，口味十分和谐平衡。果香浓郁，回味柔和，持久。

name_abbr: J P Benoit Droin Chablis 1er Cru Montmains
name_en: Jean-Paul et Benoit Droin Chablis 1er Cru Montmains
name_zh: 朵林夏布利一级梦曼白
info: 花香味浓郁，拥有典型的胡椒和柠檬味及泥土味，结构感强 矿物质明显，良好的平衡                                                                                       An intensely floral nose reflects notes of white pepper, lemon zest and tidal pool, all of which also characterize the rich, round and generous flavors that maintain good balance and a fine sense of harmony on the solidly persistent finish. This overtly saline effort is really quite pretty.

name_zh: 维桥设拉子红葡萄酒
info: Bright deep red with a purple rim. Lovely plum fruit with leafy notes. Beautifully soft, fruit driven wine showing typical Shiraz richness reined in by the soft tannin finish. 此酒呈明亮的深红色边缘泛紫色光泽。散发着宜人的李子果实和叶子的香气。口感柔和、果味馥郁，展现了设拉子典型的饱满度，余味带有柔和的单宁气息。

name_en: Charles de Fere Brut, Crémant de Bourgogne AOC
name_zh: 迪费天然型起泡酒（布根地AOC）
info:
Nice gold color with delicate thin bubbles.
Expressive and fruity nose. Typical vanilla flavors brought by wooden cask maturing.
Elegant and powerful mouth. Almonds and butter aromas with a toasted bread touch. Good balance combining acidity and full mouth, which ensures perfect maturing. A gingerbread note is perceptible.
Nice gold color with delicate thin bubbles.
Nose: Expressive and fruity nose. Typical vanilla flavors brought by wooden cask maturing.
Palate: Elegant and powerful mouth. Almonds and butter aromas with a toasted bread touch. Good balance combining acidity and full mouth, which ensures perfect maturing. A gingerbread note is perceptible.
美好的金色中带有细腻精致的气泡。
充满水果香味，富有表现力，并因在木桶中成熟而具有典型的香草气息。
充满杏仁、黄油和烤面包的味道，并略带姜饼味。其酒体优雅、强劲，酸度均衡，口感饱满，成熟完美

name_abbr: J P Benoit Droin Chablis Grand Cru La Clos
name_en: Jean-Paul et Benoit Droin Chablis Grand Cru La Clos
name_zh: 朵林庄园夏布利-克龙特级园白葡萄酒

name_en: Beelgara Regional Reserve Coonawarra Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 贝加拉库纳瓦拉加本内红葡萄酒（珍藏版）
info:
富有浓郁的莓子与香料的香气，口感典雅而复杂，单宁精致而回味悠远。
This wine has intense aromas of berry fruit and spices. The palate is both elegant and complex with mouth filling flavors berry fruit. The wine is stylish with great length of flavor and fine tannins on the finish.

name_en: Beelgara Regional Reserve Shiraz Clare Valley
name_zh: 贝加拉克莱山谷设拉子红葡萄酒（珍藏版）
info:
富有莓子、肉桂、丁香的芬芳，口感优雅而复杂，综合了辛辣、李子和黑莓的香气。
This wine has intense aromas of berry fruit, cinnamon and clove spice. The palate is both elgant and complex with spicy plum and blackberry fruit flavors.

name_abbr: Roux P & F Saint Aubin La Pucelle
name_en: Roux Père & Fils Saint Aubin “La Pucelle”
name_zh: 胡氏父子圣欧班白葡萄酒
info:
Color: Bright yellow.
Nose: It combines aromas of white flowers, flint, green almond, and orange-flower.
Palate: This is a firm and flattering wine - it becomes fleshier and fuller with time. This is a wine with real breeding.
色泽：明亮的金黄色。
香气：香气浓郁且复杂，含有花香，燧石，杏仁的味道。
口感：入口坚实又平滑，随着陈年的发展，变得更加饱满圆润。具有很强的陈年能力！

name_en: Cave de Lugny Bourgogne Pinot Noir
name_zh: 吕尼酒窖勃艮第黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
外观：清透，呈宝石红并泛有光泽;酒香：散发淡淡的红果和黑果混合香气和香料味;口感：酒体浓厚度中等，带有红果和甘草味道，清新宜人。
VISUAL:clear and shiny ruby red
NOSE: subtle aromas of red and black fruits (raspberry and blackcurrant) with notes of spices
PALATE:medium-body, with notes of red fruits and liquorice, with a fresh finish

name_zh: 鲁芬诺基昂蒂优质法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Clear, brilliant ruby red. Intriguing aroma of violets, typical of the Chianti style. Dry and medium-bodied, with wonderful cherry fruit flavor, refreshing acidity and medium tannins. The overall impression is a well-balanced, harmonious wine, which is complex but not imposing.
Pasta dishes, chicken, veal, medium-strength cheeses. 
此酒属于柔和，淡雅怡人的类型。具有透明的红宝石色泽，典型的基昂蒂酒诱人的紫罗兰芳香。酒体适中，入口甘醇。具有樱桃果风味，酸度爽口，单宁适中。酒体均衡和谐，多变朴实。饮后难以忘怀。
适与多种意粉、家禽、小牛肉及口味适中的奶酪相搭配。

name_en: Carpene Malvolti Treviso Extra Dry Prosecco DOC
name_zh: 卡玛酒园特拉维索起泡葡萄酒
info:
Colour: pale straw yellow with greenish nuances.
Bouquet: very fine and fruity.
Taste: fresh delicate and pleasant.
Perlage: fine and continuous, typically lively and elegant. 
 灰白的稻黄色带有一丝绿色。
良好的水果气味。清爽宜人，余味悠长高雅并伴有热带水果的气味。

name_abbr: Rene Monnier Les Chevaliers Meursault Blanc
name_en: Rene Monnier Les Chevaliers Meursault Blanc
name_zh: 林内莫涅庄园切弗莫索
info: 莫索特“Les Chevalieres”共有2.5公顷分成5到7块田，每块田单独处理，采用经典的酿造方法和护理，这是公司和优雅的举起酒杯。口感优雅迷人，具有桃子和菠萝口味,混合着葡萄皮的香味。                                                Meursault “Les Chevalières” comes from 2.5 hectares divided into 5 to 7 blocks, all treated separately. This mellow wine is firm and elegant. It has a feminine bouquet of peach and pineapple notes, mixed with grape skin aromas.

name_zh: 文森莫利雪桑蒙勒舍白葡萄酒
info: 散发着水果的芳香，还伴有动物、腐殖土和矮树丛的气息，口感圆润，酸度适宜，具有陈年的潜力                        The fruit aromas,and green bushestaste mellow, acidity is appropriate, has the potential of old

name_zh: 悦牛金粉黛红葡萄酒
variety:
Zinfandel/80.7%
Syrah/5.3%
Petit Syrah/4.5%
Tempranillo Zinfandel/3.5%
info:
这款葡萄酒极易入口，带有丰富的成熟黑莓和黑樱桃等黑色水果香味及树莓和草莓等鲜红水果的味道。黑椒和香草辛香调带来更多层次的口感，令果味更加突出。具鲜活的水果香味、软滑口感和浓烈酒质，可佐以从烤肉到香浓的意大利面食酱等任何口味浓郁的菜肴。
The wine is immediately approachable with lots of ripe dark fruit flavors of blackberry and black cherry complemented by bright red fruit flavors of raspberryand strawberry. Spicy notes of black pepper and vanilla add layers which allow the fruits to be the star. With its bright, vibrant fruit flavors, soft mouth feel andzesty personality, this wine can go with just about any dish from barbequed meats to rich pasta sauces.

name_zh: 拉博丝特卡莎梅洛红葡萄酒
variety:
Merlot
Carmenere
Syrah
Petit Verdot
Cabernet Sauvignon
info:
Casa Merlot
Young and intense bright purple red in colour. Very clean and intense aromas with delightfully fresh red fruit and black pepper dominating the nose. Well structured and juicy tannins that evolve a long finish.
拉博丝特卡莎梅洛红葡萄酒
年轻而浓郁明亮的紫红色。入口非常清爽且果香浓郁，在令人愉快的新鲜红色水果的风味的衬托下，黑胡椒的味道十分明显。入口结构分明，单宁可口。天然的酸度和新鲜的单宁令人垂涎。回味悠长。

name_zh: 菲斯奈特金牌起泡葡萄酒
info:
Straw yellow in color; clean and brilliant with medium-sized bubbles producing a persistent mousse. Light floral aromas on the nose, with a cleansing palate due to medium ageing. The dosage is made with wine from the same coupage aged for 12 mouths in oak barrels.
Best served at a temperature of 6-7ºC.
清雅的稻黄色酒体，酒体晶莹剔透，泡沫丰富持久，大小适中。淡淡的花香味，适度的陈酿令其口味清爽怡人。后添加的酒液是同批酒液经过12个月在橡木桶中的陈酿精心制成。
适宜在6至7摄氏度条件下饮用。

name_zh: 宝尚父子布里尼白葡萄酒
info:
Delicious floral and fruit aromas with a nice oaky note. An attractive marriage between power and elegance, this wine also offers lovely smoothness. Good ageing potential.
美味迷人的花果香气伴着丝丝橡木辛香。巧妙的将力量和优雅融为一体，搭配上诱人的柔顺质地令其吸引力倍增，陈化潜力优秀

name_zh: 菲斯奈特臻我红葡萄酒
info:
The colour is intense ruby red with violet-blue undertones characteristic of young red wines. This is a classic Tempranillo, showing intense flavours of earth, plums and violets over a hint of orange peel. It is full and luscious in the palate, rich in ripe fruits and fine tannins, with a great balance and lingering finish. Try it with white meat, beef, lamb, minor game, pasta, vegetables and half cured cheese.
 红宝石色泽，略带一丝年轻葡萄酒特有的紫罗兰色。典型天帕尼洛葡萄的口感，明显的泥土、李子、紫罗兰、橙皮的香气。口感饱满，口味甘甜，丰富的成熟水果风味。单宁柔和平衡，回味绵长。
该酒适合搭配白肉，牛肉，羔羊肉，野味，意大利面，蔬菜以及半成熟干酪。

name_zh: 班菲酒厂科迪萨琐红葡萄酒
info:
Intense ruby red color with violet hues. Fresh and fruit-forward aromas with notes of black currants, plums and wild strawberries. Well-balanced structure with a long finish.
Col di Sasso is a youthful red to be enjoyed with grilled or roasted meats, poultry, or as an ideal accompaniment to pasta with meat sauce and mildly piquant cheeses. 
 深宝石红色掩映着紫罗兰色光泽。果味突出，清新怡人。散发着黑莓，李子和野草莓的芳香。结构平衡，回味悠长。
是一款年轻的红酒。可搭配烧烤肉类，禽类，肉酱意面和芝士。

name_zh: 意大利普罗塞克起泡白葡萄酒（意大利法定产区）
info: Fruity bouquet with peach and spring flowers. Natural sparkling wine, fruity with an intense bouquet reminiscent of some spring flowers, not an overly dry flavour. 桃子与春花香气。果香味浓郁。自然起泡葡萄酒，果味中混含浓郁的春花芳香，却无过干的口感。

name_zh: 约瑟夫杜鲁安安考顿庄园查理曼特级白
info:
One of the greatest wines of Burgundy, to be tasted with awe and reverence. It has an intense golden hue. On the nose, there are some subtle tones of rose, fresh almond, citrus, honey, exotic wood and spice. Majestic and well balanced on the palate. Generous and lively at the same time. Intense and complex aftertaste. All the aromas mingle and linger for quite a long time afterwards. A wine of undeniable majesty
勃艮第地区最好的葡萄酒之一，品尝时对酿酒师的崇敬之情油然而生。色泽金黄。香气中微妙地融合了玫瑰、鲜杏仁、柑橘、蜂蜜、木材与香料的馨香。独到而又平衡的味觉。醇厚与活力共存，浓烈而富有层次感。品尝之后良久，香味仍然流连于唇齿之间。一款毋庸置疑的尊贵之酒。

name_zh: 南非好望角品乐干红葡萄酒
info:
Dark ruby color with a slight purple rim. On the nose cherry and ripe plums, spiced with vanilla. Medium to full bodied with ripe plums and berry flavors and a long, persistent aftertaste.
Perfect with grilled lamb and poultry, pork roasts and game fish. An ideal accompaniment to classic Cape cuisine, such as Bobotie and Malay curries, as well as spicy Mexican food. 深沉的宝石红色酒体，掩映出淡雅的紫色边缘。散发着樱桃、成熟李子及香草辛香。口感适中偏厚重，成熟李子与浆果口味持久，绵长。
搭配烤羊肉、禽类、烤猪扒及鱼肉美味可口，与开普顿当地菜肴，如咖喱肉末、马来西亚咖喱饭及墨西哥辛辣菜肴搭配也十分理想。

name_zh: 拉侠戈古堡红葡萄酒
info:
Crimson color, medium body, spicy, crushed fresh fruits. Fruity and rich. This
wine boasts an intense crimson-tinted robe. It develops a powerful, spice
nose finishing with grades of crushed fresh fuits. Fruity and rich, this
Bordeaux is of good substance and offers a certain length on the palate. 深
红色，中等酒体，新鲜水果和香料 香气。水果口味，味道丰富。拉侠戈
古堡红葡萄酒。口感紧实，强烈的爆发力，辛辣味，余味带有果香。果
香味浓重，余味悠长。

name_en: Jean Babou Réserve l’Exception Brut, Blanquette de Limoux, AOC
name_zh: 保罗天然型起泡葡萄酒
info:
Color：Pale yellow with green hint. Long-lasting bubble.
Nose: White flower and peach pear followed by toast and fresh butter flavour.
Palate:Clear and lively attack,smooth sensation.Then a fruity and butter overtake the palate.lingering.

name_zh: 光之城堡赤霞珠红葡萄酒
info: Wine with intensive dark colour and complex flavour of cherry and forest fruits. Full bodied with long sweet and spicy finish. Wine with extended maceration on the skins with several years aging potential

name_zh: 杰卡斯经典系列黑品乐干红
info:
颜色:
中度红色。
酒香:
新鲜、富有品种特色，伴随着草莓、樱桃和干香草的气息。 
口味:
轻度到中度酒体，均衡的新鲜黑品诺的特色果香，柔软的果酸，以及优质、芳香、易入口的单宁。
Colour:
Medium depth red.
Bouquet:
Fresh and varietal, with strawberries and dried herbs.
Palate:
A light to medium-bodied wine, balancing fresh varietal Pinot Noir
flavours, soft acidity and fine, savoury, approachable tannins.

name_zh: 布琅兄弟资宝起泡葡萄酒（低醇葡萄酒）
info: This sparkling wine is a youthful pale yellow to green colour and has lifted aromas of musk, sherbet, fresh passion fruit and apple. Zibibbo is bursting with Bubbles and summer fruit flavors with a racy, fresh vibrant finish. This Sparkling will make any occasion a celebration 这款起泡酒呈淡浅黄绿色，麝香，冰冻果子露，新鲜西番莲和苹果香味。带有爆发性的起泡，夏日水果香，清新活泼的余味。 这是一款适合任何庆典场合的起泡酒。

name_en: Domaine de la Romanee-Conti Montrachet Grand Cru
name_zh: 罗曼尼康帝-蒙哈榭特级园

name_abbr: Cave de Lugny Macon-Lugy Les Charmes
name_zh: 吕尼酒窖莱莎尔白葡萄酒
info:
外观：清澈，呈金黄色并泛有光泽，浅龄酒略带绿色。
香气：气味清新，带有花香和水果香气（坚果、蜂蜜、金合欢和柑橘）。
口感：酒体浓厚度中等，混合美味水果和淡淡香料味道。该酒浓缩当地气候精髓，是马孔村最顶级的葡萄酒品种，口感与马孔内高级葡萄酒相似。
VISUAL: clear and shiny goldish yellow, with green hints when young
NOSE: fresh and fruity with notes of flowers and fruits (nuts, honey, acacia and citrus)
PALATE: medium-body, packed with delicate flavors of fruits with a slightly spicy finish. This wine benefit from the best of the appellation and stands out of the range of Mâcon-Villages, with a style close to the Crus du Maconnais

name_zh: 奔富酒园精选设拉子加本力干红葡萄酒
info:
Deep crimson color. A lifted nose of red berries, mint and spice evolves to display a light herbal character. The palate offers ripe fruit, soft tannins and a supple mouth-feel. Red berry and plum flavors are highlighted by black pepper and spice before subtle, savory oak firms up the finish. 
Pairs well with lamb, beef and pasta dishes. 深红的色泽。红莓、薄荷、香料的芬芳进而发展为淡雅的草药清香。富含成熟果味，单宁柔和，口感细腻。红莓、李子口味在黑胡椒与香料的衬托下更加突出。回味充满橡木的优雅气息。
搭配羊肉、牛肉及意大利面美味可口。

name_en: Casillero del Diablo Brut Chardonnay Sparkling, Limarí Valley
name_zh: 红魔鬼天然型夏多内起泡葡萄酒
info:
Austerity and minerality, along with vibrant acidity;
Long persistent finish, fine and small bubbles and medium body set its elegance
紧致口感，矿物味道馥郁；
果酸充满活力，余味绵长悠然；
精致优雅，气泡细腻，酒体均衡。

name_zh: 瑞格尔侯爵酒园里奥哈桃红葡萄酒
info:
Vivid reddish in color, with a delicate, fruity bouquet of balsam and honey. Soft and elegant on the palate, with an indulgent hint of caramel to finish.
Well suited to lightly stir-fried vegetables and meats.
 娇艳的淡红色泽，蜂蜜与果香十分精致。口感柔和，优雅。回味蕴含淡淡的焦糖清香。
适合搭配油炸蔬菜或肉类。

name_zh: 瑞格尔精选天帕尼洛法定产区干红葡萄酒
variety:
Tinta de toro /85%  
Merlot y Syrah/ 15%
info:
Ripe with fruit and sweet with oak, this jammy red offers cherry, berry, vanilla and spice flavors. It has the structure for food, with a touch of acidity to keep it lively.
Pairs well with rice dishes, lamb and soft cheeses.
此款醇郁的红葡萄酒蕴含成熟的水果芬芳与甜润的橡木味道，樱桃、浆果、香草与辛香口味交织融合。结构精致，适合配餐，恰倒好处的果酸很好地体现出活泼的酒质。
搭配各式饭类、羊肉及口味清淡的乳酪十分理想。

name_abbr: Cave de Lugny Chardonnay Les Beluses
name_en: Cave de Lugny Macon Chardonnay “Les Beluses”
name_zh: 吕尼酒窖莱·布鲁斯白葡萄酒
info:
外观：清透，呈金黄色并泛有光泽，浅龄酒略带绿色。
酒香：气味清新，带有果香和淡淡白花、柑橘和烘烤香。
口感：新鲜口感混合矿物质味道，真实体现霞多丽当地的土质特点。口味丰富、持久。带有金合欢、杏仁和葡萄柚味道。
VISUAL:clear and shiny goldish yellow, with green hints when young
NOSE:fresh and fruity with subtle aromas of white flowers, citrus and notes of toast.
PALATE:packed with freshness and minerality, this is the true expression of the terroir of Chardonnay. With complexity and a long finish, this wine has a high aromatic potential, with acacia, almond and grapefruit flavours.

name_zh: 百子莲特酿加本力苏维翁 (原名为:阿塔妮加本力苏维翁特酿)
info: Vinified to highlight the intensity of the fruit and the roundness of the tannins, this is a typically Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon. Fresh flavors of red fruit and mint are supported by a tender structure. 此酒浓郁的果香与圆润的单宁非常突出，是一款典型的智利加本力苏维翁。结构柔顺，红果与薄荷的口味十分清新。

name_zh: 路易亚都世家马孔法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
Dry and easy to drink, lively and charming, this is a fruity wine with a floral scent and a hint of lemon, the Macon Villages should be drunk chilled and rather young.
This wine goes very well with a large range of food, fried or grilled fish, sea food, goat's milk cheese...
此酒是干型且容易饮用的葡萄酒，酒体活泼且迷人，是一款充满花香、散发隐约柠檬味的果味浓郁的葡萄酒，十分适合葡萄酒初级爱好者，此款酒适合在年轻的时候冰镇饮用，与大部分食物都能很好地搭配，例如炸鱼及烤鱼，海鲜及山羊奶奶酪。

name_zh: 香皮  宝利白干白葡萄酒
info: 这款来自香皮庄园的葡萄酒具有明亮的黄色，有亮金色。她的香气具有突出的白色花草和杏花蜜桃味。圆润的口感令人愉快，新鲜和轻矿物制的口感具有典型的玛肯产区的特色。A bright yellow, white gold colour. A good aromatic intensity with notes of white flowers and peach-apricot. Supple and round on the palate with a pleasant, fresh and lightly mineral finish typical of the Mâcon region.

name_zh: 佳乐美酒庄阿麦拉雅红葡萄酒
info:
Deep red color with purple tinges. It offers fruity aromas, resembling cherries and raspberries, and a subtle vanilla scent coming from barrel aging. A spicy, intense and sweeping wine, easy to drink, but yet with a long persistent mouth. Tannins are mild and round. This wine is ready to be enjoyed. Ideally paired with red meat, pasta with tomato sauce and cheese. 
深红色泛紫色光泽。散发着类似樱桃，覆盆子的水果芳香并伴随着带有轻微香草气息的橡木味。一款辛辣，浓郁、易饮的葡萄酒。口感持久，单宁温和圆润，现在即可品尝。适宜搭配红肉和番茄芝士酱意大利面.

name_zh: 贺兰山梅洛

name_en: Henri Bourgeois Petit Bourgeois Sauvignon Blanc
name_zh: 亨利博卢瓦庄园小老板苏维翁干白葡萄酒（地区餐酒）
info:
A really lovely Sauvignon, with very fresh citrus and peach fruit on the nose and a pleasantly nutty aroma. It has well defined acidity and good balance.
一款非常诱人的苏维翁，蕴含新鲜柠檬柑橘类水果和水蜜桃香味，并略带坚果味。有很好的酸度，酒体十分平衡。

name_zh: 茱莉雯桑塞尔白
菲利普庄园西拉红葡萄酒
info: A nose with notes of black berries and spices. The mouth is full, lifted by fine tannins, plums and dark cherries. 鼻子与黑色浆果和香料的笔记。口是完整的，柔和的单宁酸的李子和黑樱桃的香味。

name_en: Concha y Toro “Casillero del Diablo” Merlot
name_zh: 红魔鬼梅洛红葡萄酒
菲斯奈特黑牌起泡葡萄酒
info:
Brilliant pale yellow in color. Fine, intense and fruity aromas with persistent mousse. Clean and light on the palate with elegant length.
Best served at a temperature of 6-7ºC.
晶莹剔透的浅黄色酒体。香气精致，浓郁，果香十足，汽泡丰富。口味清新淡雅，回味持久，怡人。
适宜在6至7摄氏度条件下饮用。

name_en: Domaine Le Brun Pouilly Fumé AOC
name_zh: 乐盼庄园普依芙美白葡萄酒
info: "Lemony, lightly grassy nose, leading to quite an opulent palate with power and length." - Decanter柠檬香，淡淡的草香让丰满十足的口味有着劲道和绵长的 余韵。——品醇客。

name_abbr: P.C. Tour de la Roche Reserve Touraine S.B.
name_en: Pierre Chainier Tour de la Roche Reserve Touraine Sauvignon Blanc
name_zh: 谢尼酒庄豪世之旅长相思珍藏白葡萄酒
info:
Color: Pale yellow colour.
Nose:  Revealing a complex and fruity aromas, wine on the nose of citrus fruits and very ripe fruit.
Palate: Rounded and generous palate, with citrus fruits and white flowers aromas, hint of smoke and medium to long finish.
色泽：浅黄色。
香气：展现复杂的果味，具有柑橘类水果和非常成熟的水果气息有柑橘和熟透水果的复杂香气.
口感： 顺滑和丰富的口感，具有柑橘味和白花的味道，淡淡的烟熏味配合中等的收尾。

name_en: Monte Schiavo Marzaiola Lacrima di Morro d'Alba
name_zh: 蒙特赛-拉卡利瑪红葡萄酒

name_abbr: P.C. Clos de Nouys Vouvray demi-sec
name_en: Pierre Chainier Clos de Nouys Vouvray Demi Sec, AOC
name_zh: 谢尼酒庄诺伊庄园系列半干白 AOC
info:
Light yellow in color with tints of green. Delicate nuances of white flowers with aromas of fresh almonds.Smooth, good acid and sweetness, well balanced between freshness and body with a dominating honeyed finish.
淡黄色，泛出一丝绿色。仔细闻有白色花朵和新鲜杏仁的香味.平滑，酸度和甜度适中， 酒体与新鲜的口感之间平衡良好，回味甜如蜜。

name_zh: 菲维亚托齐拉蒙特干红
info:
Very dark red with good intensity.Red fruits and spices bouquet.Round and complete palate with a right balance of tannins and acidity.Ideal to enjoy with grilled red meat, marinated pork ribs or cheese.
极深的红色，浓度很高。红肉水果和香辛料和香气。口感圆润而完美，单宁和酸味之间的平衡极佳。理想搭配烧烤红肉，调味猪肋和奶酪。

name_zh: 索莱酒园工作台加本力苏维翁干红葡萄酒
info:
This wine captures the full, ripe fruit characters of this classic variety. The wine displays lifted aromas of blackcurrant and red berry fruit while the palate is full of rich, soft flavors and balanced fine oak characters. This is a perfect partner to lamb and pasta dishes. 
此酒汲取了此款经典葡萄品种所有成熟水果的特质。展现出黑醋栗、红浆果的芳香，口感饱满，丰腴，精致的橡木特质与柔和的口味达到完美平衡。与羔羊肉及意面是绝佳搭配。

name_en: Pierre Chainier 1749 Selection Anjou Chenin Blanc AOC
name_zh: 安茹白诗南白
info:
Aromas of spiced apple and apricot, kick-off this wonderful Loire white. The palate is off-dry with a touch of ripe green apple flavours and has a finely balanced medium finish.
带有浓烈的苹果和杏仁香气，酒体中等，入口会有成熟的青苹果风味，口感微甜。

name_en: Chateau La Bidière Muscadet Sèvre et Maine, AOC
name_zh: 谢尼酒庄拉碧庄园白 AOC
info:
Color: Brilliant light yellow.
Nose: Fresh citrus fruit, white floral aromas hints of nuts;
Palate: Freshly and young; round in the mouth, nuts, floral, fresh long after taste. 
颜色： 明亮浅黄色；
香气： 新鲜的柑橘香味，白花香带有坚果的香味；
口感： 新鲜年轻，圆润精致，有坚果花香的味道。回味清爽。

name_abbr: P J Aîné Côtes du Rhône Parallèle 45 Blanc
name_en: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Cotes du Rhone Parallèle 45 Blanc AOC
name_zh: 嘉伯乐罗纳河谷北纬45度白葡萄酒
info:
此酒澄黄色中带点浅绿色。活泼生动的花香及柠檬香气。既丰富又柔和，後续口感清新。
With Pale yellow colour with greenish hues.Aromatic and fresh with white flowers and citrus fruit.Ample and warm, with an attractive fresh final note.

name_zh: 巴斯克卡本妮苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
This wine has a deep and bright ruby red colour. The nose is intense, with a remarkable fruit:
cherries, blueberries, raspberries and plums generously share their role with notes of bay leaf,
cloves and nutmeg.
The palate is consistent, with a solid structure, but friendly and likeable.
The attractive combination of sweet and soft tannins with delicate acidity, results in a charming
wine with a pleasant and persistent finish. 
酒色为明亮的深红色。芳香浓郁，融合了樱桃，蓝莓，蔓越梅和李子的果香，并散发着月桂树叶，丁香和肉桂的香气。
口感持久，结构稳定，令人喜爱。
柔和单宁与怡人酸度微妙的结合十分迷人，使这款酒回味无穷。

name_zh: 普里奥庄园马尔白克红葡萄酒
info:
Tightly wound and toasty with terrific notes of raspberry ganache and blackberry compote flavors at the core. Long and powerful through the finish and driven by ripe acidity, this should blossom after some cellaring.
 结构紧凑，土司的香气与山莓、黑莓的成熟口味十分突出。回味持久而强劲，果酸成熟，并随着陈年更加醇浓。

name_zh: 朱卡迪托伯特酿甜白葡萄酒
info:
中度黄色色泽，香甜圆滑如丝的口感，有着淡淡的果香味及干果气息，如梨，杏，蜜桃，橘皮和玫瑰花的幽香。酸度恰到好处，平衡度极佳。绵长持久地的回味，一试难忘啊！
yellow color of medium intensity. Intense aromas of over-matured fruits, honey and dried fruits like pears, apricots and peaches, orange skin and roses. Sweet, unctuous in the mouth, silky, with balanced acidity. Complex and long finish

name_zh: 约瑟夫杜鲁安博若莱村酿红
info:
The wine has a bright purple colour.A very intense nose, reminiscent of violets, peonies and red berries.On the palate, it has a silky smoothness, and its delicious fruit lingers for a long time.Beaujolais Villages is very versatile with all kinds of food, even spicy.
呈亮丽的紫色。酒香浓郁，使人联想到紫罗兰、牡丹和红樱桃的清香。口感顺滑，宜人的果味在余味中持久飘香。博若莱村酿适于搭配任何食物，甚至是辣味菜肴。

name_zh: 托马斯巴多利诺红葡萄酒
info:
Color: Ruby Red
Nose: Very fruity and fresh, with lots of cherry notes.
Palate:Medium-Bodied,ruity and smooth taste with lots of cherry taste.
色泽：红宝石色
香气：清香的水果味，大量的樱桃香气。
口感 ：入口清爽柔顺，酒体适中，富有樱桃味。

name_en: Aliança Particular Dão DOC (Tinta Roriz, Touriga Nacional)
name_zh: 阿莲卡特选红葡萄酒
info:
Medium to dark red in color. A rustic but complex wine with smoky, mature notes supported by rounded fruit flavors of liquorice, plum and prune. Well-balanced and attractive with good length.
Food Suggestion: Ideal with mushroom risotto with parmesan.
 此酒呈幽深的红色，香气复杂且具有乡土气息，带有烟熏，甘草，洋李，李子干等圆润的水果香。平衡感良好，回味悠长，引人入胜。
配餐建议：与蘑菇意大利饭搭配理想。

name_zh: 奔富酒园俱乐部汤尼钵酒（利口葡萄酒）
info:
Amber-brown color with a dark red rim. The nose is lifted with an attractive mix of dried fruit, vanilla, caramel and a touch of nutty aged rancio complexity. The palate is rich and vibrant displaying ripe spicy fruit, toffee and walnuts framed by smoky oak with a lifted cleansing finish.

Ideally suited to dessert, cheese.
琥珀般的褐色酒体，边缘泛着深红色泽。迷人的水果干、香草、焦糖及一丝坚果的复杂香气交织融合。成熟的水果、太妃糖、胡桃口味丰饶宜人，且在橡木的烟熏气息及回味衬托下更加精致。
与甜点和奶酪搭配十分理想。

name_zh: 迈克基阿罗酒庄山中云阿斯蒂莫斯卡微泡甜白葡萄酒 （375毫升）
info:
Medium pale straw with green highlights. Intense, aromatic and fruity, suggestive of sage, grapefruit and musk. Clean, light and delicate, with balanced acidity.  
稻黄色的酒体掩映着绿色光泽。芬芳浓郁，充满果香，酒体清爽淡雅，果酸均衡，富含水果与麝香的芬芳。

name_zh: 雨果精选白葡萄酒
variety:
Sylvaner/45%
Pinot Gris
Gewurztraminer
Riesling
Muscat
info:
Very youthful pale green 
green apple, pear, white peach, banana, pineapple, lychee, and a profusion of spring flowers, rose, freesia and a subtle touch of muscatel
On the palate it is dry, lively, crisp and clear, Its finish is fleeting but firm
淡黄绿色中影射出鲜绿色
香气袭人，充满了青苹果、梨子、桃子、香蕉、波萝、荔枝的芳香
口感清澈、纯净，同时活力而年轻的酒质也赋予了其果味馥郁的味道，极易品饮

name_en: Jacob’s Creek Chardonnay Pinot Noir Sparkling
name_zh: 杰卡斯霞多丽黑品乐起泡葡萄酒
info:
颜色：中等稻草黄绿色,细腻而持久的气泡。
香气：完美结合了来自莎当尼新鲜柠檬的香气及来自黑皮诺的红醋栗的香气。
口感：优雅的柑橘类果香，结合奶油坚果的酵母香气，使得葡萄酒浓郁且富结构感。口感细腻而清爽。
Colour:
Mid straw green with a fine gas bead and persistent mousse.
Bouquet:
The refreshing lemon citrus aromas of Chardonnay are in harmony with
the red currant characters of Pinot Noir.
Palate:
Generous citrus fruit flavours are enhanced with creamy nutty yeast characters providing both richness and structure. The wine finishes soft,crisp and clean.

name_zh: 杰卡斯莫斯卡托桃红半干起泡葡萄酒
info:
颜色：浅粉色
香气：展现新鲜芬芳的覆盆子和草莓的芳香，同时略带一丝梨子的香气。
口感：轻度酒体，口中展现新鲜红色水果风味。优雅细腻的气泡和清新的口感达到了完美的平衡,带来难忘的品酒体验。
Colour:
Pale pink.
Bouquet:
Fresh, fragrant raspberry and strawberry aromas with hints of pear.
Palate:
Light and refreshing with red summer berry flavours. The wine is
elegantly balanced on the palate with the fine bubbles and a crisp finish
creating a tantalising drinking experience.

name_zh: 芳妮美雷司令白葡萄酒
info: The Riesling displays a strong sense of terroir expression, stylishness with lovely aromas of lime peel, mint and hints of white flowers on the nose, finishes with bright lemony, mineral, green apple and peach favors本款雷司令极为忠实的表现出了当地独特的风土，散发出青柠皮，薄荷花，以及野姜花的风格气息。回味中充满柠檬，青苹果，蜜桃的气息，并夹带矿物质感，令人心旷神怡。

name_zh: 御兰堡雅系列设拉子红葡萄酒
婷芭克世家阿尔萨斯薏丝琳法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
Light golden color. Nose of sweet apples, peaches, flowers. Palate of same with some citrus, petrol, minerals. Very balanced. Essentially dry. Great wine.
此酒呈淡淡的金色。有着甜甜的苹果，桃子以及花的香气。还带有一些柑橘香及汽油和矿石的气息。平衡较好、质地干洌。是一款佳酿

name_en: Baron Philippe de Rothschild Mouton Cadet Rouge
name_zh: 罗思柴尔德男爵木桐嘉棣红葡萄酒
info:
A scintillating, deep garnet red. Highly expressive black fruit at first, especially blackberry, with touches of toast and fine spice, then more complex fresh fruit aromas, especially cherry and redcurrant, that burst from the glass. Particularly supple and round on the attack, displaying an attractive harmony between silky tannins and the freshness of the fruit on the nose. A hedonistic wine, succulent and richly flavored, ending on a generous and pleasant, fruit-filled finish. Rib steak with shallots, breast of veal, duck, lamb cutlets.
鲜明亮丽的深石榴红色。扑鼻而来的是黑色水果（尤其是带烤面包和辛香的黑莓）的香味，樱桃和红醋栗的新鲜果香也相继绽放。口感柔顺圆润，丝滑的单宁和新鲜的果味巧妙的融合。这是一款快乐、美味并充满果香的酒，余味丰富愉悦。适于搭配香葱牛肋，牛胸肉，鸭子和烤羊排。

name_zh: 飞傲特级干红

name_en: Clos Henri Petit Clos Henri Pinot Noir
name_zh: 亨利葡萄园小亨利黑皮诺
卡萨布兰卡酒庄天逸珍藏系列黑比诺红葡萄酒
info:
Deep ruby color. Its nose is a mix of earth, flowers, and fruit, with a weighty palate containing notes of cassia and black raspberry. Its finish is smooth and friendly, and will likely develop greater velvet undertones over a year.
鲜艳的红宝石色，芳香中饱含浆果，花香和泥土的气息，入口有着浓郁的醋栗和黑覆盆子风味。口感柔顺且容易饮用，稍作陈年后口感会更醇厚。

name_zh: 法国婷芭克世家阿尔萨斯白皮诺法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
Pale green-yellow in hue.  Quick to mature, it is fruity, dry and well balanced with interesting, complex flavors. A versatile wine, suitable for any occasion. 
It is delicious on its own, as an aperitif, or with a light meal, ideal for Banquets and similar occasion.
酒体呈淡淡的黄绿色，酒质干爽，果味浓厚，是一款适合各种场合的美酒。
无论单独饮用，或作为开胃酒，或搭配清淡食品都非常适合，是宴会等类似场合的最佳选择。

name_zh: 芳妮美琼瑶浆珍藏白葡萄酒
info: Very aromatic with pure notes of rose, spices, and exotic fruit. It presents a rich, extra-ripe finish to the palate with notes of honey, without being heavy. As an aperitif, solo, with strong cheeses (Munster, Bleu, Epoisses, for example...) and also to accompany exotic cuisines.佳酿芬芳的酒香中有着玫瑰、香料和异国水果香。其浓郁熟透的余韵及口感中有着一丝蜂蜜香，却没有丝毫沉重感。佳酿可以作为开胃酒，也可单独品鉴，也可和硬奶酪搭配（例如芒斯特、蓝莓菌奶酪、瓦斯奶酪），或者和外国菜搭配。

name_zh: 法国婷芭克世家阿尔萨斯格乌兹莱妮法定产区白葡萄酒
info:
Nice golden color. Nose of lychee and apricot. Full bodiied. Relatively complex -flavors of lemon and grapefruit with delicate herbal and hint of honey on the end. Long finish with perfect acidity-not too much, not too little.
拥有迷人的金色色泽。有着荔枝与杏仁的香气。酒体丰腴，融合了浓郁的柠檬和柚子伴随着精致的草药味及淡淡的蜂蜜香气。回味持久，丹宁醇厚，酸度也恰到好处。

name_zh: 露茜茵艾伯特珍藏灰皮诺白葡萄酒
info: 酒体丰富，饱满，圆润，余味悠长，可以和一些清淡的用奶油烹制的鱼类或者家禽搭配饮用                             Rich and full, round and long in the mouth, it goes well with fish cooked in butter and cream and poultry served with a sauce.

name_en: Henri Bourgeois Petit Bourgeois Cabernet Franc
name_zh: 亨利博卢瓦庄园小老板加本力红葡萄酒
info: An aromatic wine with soft tannins and good structure.  Fruity flavors on the palate are balanced with oak, leading to a long finish. 此酒香气馥郁，单宁柔和，结构颇为精致。橡木气息令其水果口味十分和谐，回味持久绵长。

name_en: Michele Chiarlo Barbera d'Asti DOC Sup
name_zh: 迈克基阿罗酒庄精选阿斯蒂巴贝拉奥秘法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Ruby color with purple highlights. Elegant with fine intensity, suggestive of wild berries and mint. Dry, full-fruited and well structured.
Food suggestion: 
Dishes based on meat poultry and excellent with medium-bodied cheeses. 
红宝石般的色泽掩映出紫色光芒。酒体醇浓精致而优雅，令人联想到野浆果，薄荷的清香。干冽，果味丰富，富于层次感。
搭配禽类，口味适中的乳酪十分理想。

name_zh: 德萨佳阁红葡萄酒
info:
This immediate attractive red is filled with plenty of ripe berries fruit and sweet chocolate element. Medium to full body, seamless and very rounded. 
这款魅力红酒充满了大量的成熟浆果与甜巧克力的风味。酒体中等至饱满，入口紧凑，非常圆润。

name_zh: 奥希耶白葡萄酒
info:
Beautiful bright colour. The nose this year is particularly fruity with very harmonious notes of citrus and
exotic fruits.
Delicate attack in the mouth rapidly followed by a sensation of freshness. The wine presents good body and
perfect balance between acidity and smoothness. The finish is balanced and elegant and makes this wine
suitable for all occasions: as an aperitif or as an accompaniment to a starter or fish.
酒色明亮。酒香清新，散发着柑橘类水果和异国水果的香气。初尝一口，便能很快感受到它的清新。酒体饱满，酸度均衡，柔和。余味和谐优美。
作为开胃酒，佐餐或搭配鱼类，适合各个场合品尝。

name_zh: 拉菲奥希耶红葡萄酒
variety:
Cabernet Sauvignon/ 55%
Syrah/ 30%
others/ 15%
(Grenache, Mourvèdre, Merlot and Cabernet Franc)
info:
Beautiful intense garnet and violet colour. The complementary nature of Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah is
evident in the nose, the notes of liquorice and violet blend perfectly with the red fruit and spices of the
Syrah.
In the mouth the explosive full-bodied attack is very typical of a Languedoc wine. It then settles down,
delicately becoming harmonious. The tannins are silky and well-rounded. The finish, full of freshness, again
expresses liquorice and spices.
 酒体为美丽的浓郁红石榴色与紫罗兰色。可以闻到浓郁的加本力苏维翁与设拉子的气息，甘草和紫罗兰的气息与红色水果以及香料完美混合。
初尝可以明显感受到是典型的朗格多克红酒，渐渐地口感和谐。单宁柔和圆润。余味充满清新感，并再次感受到甘草与香料的味道。

name_en: Mas de Daumas Gassac Blanc, the grand cru of South France
name_zh: 德玛仕谷干白（玛德玛嘉萨高地峡谷干白）
variety:
Viognier/20% 
Chardonnay /20%
Petit Manseng /20%
Chenin Blanc /20%
rare grape/20%
varieties from all over the world.
info:
To be drunk young (in the first 18 months) to appreciate its magnificent minerality and very complex fruit aromas.
Or, to be kept at least from 4 to 12 years to discover a very rich wine with notes of honey and crystallized fruits.
Delicious by itself as an aperitif or with oysters, foie gras or any grilled fish.
可选择早期饮用（前18个月内）从而享受此酒诱人的矿物质气息和层次极其丰富的果香。
或待葡萄酒陈年4年至12年时享用，感受陈年赋予葡萄酒的蜂蜜气息以及浓郁的蜜饯水果的风味。
作为餐前酒单独饮用或搭配生蚝，鹅肝及烤鱼享用都十分理想。

name_zh: 芭迪奥拉红
info:
Youthful body, fresh red berry flavors, vibrantly bright taste
充满新鲜的红色浆果风味，酒体非常年轻并充满韵味。

name_zh: 维达斯艾瑞娅起泡酒
info: 该款起泡酒散发出矿物，柑橘和清新苹果的果香，非常纯洁和迷人。香气和口感上都带有迷人的桃子，香蕉和甜瓜的果香味道。果香味集中，品质上乘。一款物超所值的起泡酒。                               Mineral, lime and crisp apple aromas give it a precise, pure nose. And that same character exists on the palate and finish, where white peach, green banana and melon flavors are full and forward. Shows good concentration and quality.  A fine value.

name_en: Le Bosq Blanc Vin de France
name_zh: 博斯克白葡萄酒
info:
此酒有新鲜柑橘味，绿色和白色的清新的桃子味道。
Fresh flavours of green citrus and white peaches with a refreshing and well-balanced palate.

name_zh: 克兰朵桃红葡萄酒
info:
Intense, bright and pink ruby color. Beautiful harmony on the nose as well as on the palate. Seductive and expressive aromas of red berries, redcurrant, raspberry, blackberry and blackcurrant. The fruit finds its full expression in a beautifully structured, balanced, ample and refined palate.
Ideal serving temperature: 12° C - 14°C.
此酒具有明亮粉色宝石红,口感和嗅觉完美的结合,散发诱人的红浆果,黑醋栗, 覆盆子,黑莓和黑加仑香味.结构平衡,口感浓郁,酒体丰满,散发阵阵香味.理想的侍酒温度: 12° C - 14°C.

name_en: Chateau Grand Moulin Cotes de Blaye
name_zh: 大磨坊酒庄红葡萄酒
info: Aromas of ripe fruits harmoniously blend with roasted notes. This wine is soft with elegant tannins. It can be drunk immeidately but will age for 4-5 years

name_zh: 香桐起泡葡萄酒
info:
Chandon Sparkling NV
The entry is soft with generous primary fruit characters followed by a creamy mid-palate offering nougat and nectarines extending to a lingering and crisp brut finish. A vibrant, fresh style with subtle fruit flavours and a balanced creamy palate.
香桐起泡葡萄酒
明快新鲜的柑橘果香和鲜花的香味竞相绽放。阵阵的生梨和白色油桃的果香与可口的烤榛子和细腻的香料的气息融为一体。入口果香浓郁，随后如奶油般柔和的口感衬托出了果仁糖和油桃的味道；回味悠长，清冽干爽。

name_zh: 法国花都莎当妮干白葡萄酒
info:
Light yellow- gold straw color. Intense aromas of pears, pineapple and hazelnuts. The mouth is creamy with notes of figs and vanilla. 
Food Suggestions: Pairs perfectly with white meat and fish in sauce, mussels in creamy sauce, sushi and sashimi.
 颜色介于浅黄和麦秆的金色之间，具有开放的梨，菠萝和榛子香气。奶油般的口感中带有无花果和香草的味道。
与白肉，奶油浇汁鱼，奶汁壳类海鲜，寿司和生鱼片堪称绝配。

name_zh: 优班雷司令白葡萄酒
info: Nik Weis, owner and winemaker of Germany's renowned St. Urbans-Hof Weingut has sourced the best quality wines from neighbouring vineyards to produce Urban Riesling, a new wine with traditional roots. It has a complex, smoky and floral nose, a juicy, fruity elegant mouthfeel with a minerality that finished off dry and leaves a desire for the next sip.尼克·威尔斯，德国著名葡萄酒庄圣乌班荷夫的主人和酿酒师，该酒庄一直收购邻庄高质量的葡萄酒用于酿造乌班雷司令葡萄酒，这是一款有着传统底蕴的新酒。佳酿酒香复杂，有着烟熏香和花朵香，口感果汁味浓，果味优雅，余韵干燥有矿物香，会让你情不自禁的想喝下一口。

name_zh: 凯菲勒-瓦波里切拉红葡萄酒
桃乐丝特级公牛血干红葡萄酒
info:
All the exuberant aroma traditionally found in an intense, ripe red wine.A sensual background of fine spices in good balance with perfumed notes reminiscent of blackberries.Full, long finish on the palate.This wine goes well with stuffed peppers, game, and meat dishes with spicy or sweet and sour sauces.
这是一款酒体厚重，颜色深红的成熟葡萄酒。香气丰富，带有诱人精妙的辛辣气味，同黑莓的气息完美平衡。口感丰富，回味持久。此酒可与辣味、甜味或酸味的野味或肉类菜肴完美搭配。

name_zh: 卡拉力图蒙塔路尔红葡萄酒IGT
info:
此葡萄酒富有强烈之性格，层次中带有草莓及李子香味。味道浓郁。
Canaletto Montepulciano d’Abruzzo is a hugely characterful red wine, filled with layer upon layer of damson and morello cherry flavours. Ideal with a variety of meaty pasta sauces or grilled red meat.

name_en: Santa Rita Medalla Real Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 桑塔丽塔真实勋章加本力苏维翁特酿干红葡萄酒
info:
Intense and deep ripe red ruby color. Its bouquet combines blackcurrant, ripe red cherries, blackberries and mineral notes. Displays powerful and concentrated ripe tannins and a strong backbone, with depth and a lingering finish.
Very spicy red meats, game bird meat, ripe cheese.
红宝石般的色泽，深沉而浓郁。黑醋栗、成熟的红樱桃、黑莓及矿物质气息交织融合，十分复杂。口感强劲，单宁成熟醇郁，回味深沉而持久。
适合搭配口味偏辣的红肉、野禽及婪乳酪。

name_zh: 潘丽赛罗酒庄甜起泡葡萄酒
info:
Colour:yellow/green colour with golden reflexes in a framework of persistent bubbles.
Nose: Typical flavours are those of acacia white flowers, of passion fruit, of honey with mineral aromas of sage, thyme and mint, typical of our land.
Palate: The palate senses a pleasant and tasty flavour with a balanced acidity to contrast the outstanding residual sugary background of the ripe grapes, such as to make this wine agreeable and intense.
颜色：黄绿色的晶莹酒体中带有持续性很强的气泡
香气：典型的口味中带有白色花朵，金合欢，百香果，蜂蜜与带有矿物质般鼠尾草的香气。同时具有当地典型百里香和薄荷的香味。
口感：愉悦，可口的口感。均衡的酸度与成熟的葡萄所留下的少量的残糖形成了良好的平衡。

name_zh: 伊慕施华雷司令
info:
This wine is clearly refined, pure, with aromas of asparagus, mineral, white flower. It bubbles very subtly. The palate is supreme and beautiful, with a truly fine, limpid, crystal-clear definition. It provides a tingling, laser-show of acidity which embodies the wine with a well defined, incisive character. Very impressive.
酒色清亮浅黄，带绿色光泽，闻之有芦笋，矿味，白花香。入口略有起泡感，酒体丰润不肥腻，精致清爽，酸度悠长，有令人难以捉摸的层次感。颇为动人。

name_abbr: W. St. Urbans-Hof Piesporter G Riesling
name_en: Weignut St. Urbans-Hof Piesporter Goldtropfchen Riesling Kabinett
name_zh: 圣优荷夫金滴园雷司令白葡萄酒
拉菲传奇波尔多法定产区红葡萄酒
info:
Colour: Crimson with good intensity
Nose : Dense and aromatic driven by toasted aromas and dark fruits (blackcurrant).
Palate: Ample and fleshy at first with good sugar levels. It is a powerful wine with a long toasted and
spicy finish. 酒体呈亮深红色。
浓郁的芬芳伴随着烘烤的香味以及黑醋里的果香。
初尝一口，口感丰富饱满，甜度适中。这是一款比较强劲的酒，伴有持久的烘烤味和辛辣的回味。

name_zh: 吉娜斯至尊波尔多法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
This wine offers a deep ruby red colour. The nose is powerful, opening out into notes of wild strawberries, prunes, liquorice and a hint of vanilla. In the mouth, it is ample and rich, leading in to very silky tannins.
This very complete wine will go perfectly with red meat dishes and strong cheeses.
酒体呈现深红宝石色。风格强劲，酒体混合有草莓，梅干，甘草及淡淡的香草味。口感非常丰富淳厚，带有柔顺的单宁。与红肉菜肴及浓郁奶酪将会是最完美的搭配。

name_zh: 帝国田园干红
variety:
Made from Tempranillo
Garnacha 
Mazuelo grapes.
info:
酿造和陈年
经过严格的发酵控制。葡萄酒装瓶前在橡木桶中成熟12个月，之后继续成熟6个月。使之更加柔和。
品酒记录：
深宝石红色，带有深色浆果和香草的香气。天鹅绒般的顺滑，口感优雅。
食物搭配：
与红肉和禽类菜肴，烧烤以及奶酪都可以很好的搭配。

name_en: Joh. Jos. Prüm Graacher Himmelreich Riesling Kabinett
name_zh: 普朗酒庄仙境园珍藏薏丝琳半甜白葡萄酒
info:
J.J.Prüm Rieslings with their fascinating interplay between fruitiness, minerality and acidity are very versatile wines: They can be enjoyed by themselves, as apéritif or with many different kinds of food, not only Western style dishes. These wines also match particularly well with many different Asian cuisines, be it the diverse Chinese Cuisines, Japanese Sushi or Teppanyaki, or spicy Thai, Vietnamese or Indonesian dishes. Serve these wines chilled!
 普朗酒庄薏丝琳是一款百搭的葡萄酒, 果味,矿物味及酸度之间的搭配完美.普朗酒庄薏丝琳可单独作为前菜或者搭配各种其他风格的食物（不仅仅是西餐）享用.这款薏丝琳更能搭配各种不同的亚洲美食,不同的中餐,寿司,日式铁板烧,辛辣泰餐,越南菜或印度尼西亚菜.冷藏后风味更佳.

name_zh: 沃克堡多斐德红葡萄酒
菲谷露卢布红葡萄酒
info: Cherry, red colour, medium body, blackberries and cherries. Clean oak notes. Visual: intense robe, with the crimsons prevailing over a clean, bright background, attesting to the wine´s youth. The glass is inundated with legs, suggesting alcoholic strength and oily palate. Aroma. the initial aroma is dominated by the best of new oak, with hints of toast on a spicy background. Fruitiness character beneath the wood- Taste: moderate acidity, splendour of a rounded wine excellently structured on sweet tannins, with the velvety of Tempranillo. Elegant and lingering finish. 鲜艳的红色。中等酒体。红色水果、干净橡木的香气和味道。视觉：深红色，在干净清澈的背景前特别显著，代表着葡萄酒的年轻。酒杯上挂满的就推代表者葡萄酒的酒精度和饱满的酒体。香气：最初的香气是新橡木的味道占主导，带有香料烘烤的香气，以及果味的感觉。口感：酸度中等，酒体饱满，口感均衡，单宁微甜，有堂比尼罗的顺滑口感。余味优雅悠长。

name_zh: 辛迪精选西拉品乐塔吉干红

name_en: Vina Casablanca El Bosque Syrah, Maipo Valley
name_zh: 卡萨布兰卡酒庄艾柏丝可系列设西拉红葡萄酒
info:
It has a deep, highly concentrated purple hue present, and a nose of black fruits and blackberry blossoms with a slight hint of tobacco and cloves. Complex flavors of black tea, black pepper, and wild plums come forward on the tongue with lingering acid and weighty tannins
浓郁的亮紫色，芳香中饱含黑色浆果和黑莓的风味，略带一丝烟草和丁香子气息。仿佛由红茶，黑胡椒和李子组成馥郁口感的同时饱含成熟的单宁和柔恰的果酸味。

name_zh: 云咸 Bin 555西拉半干红葡萄酒
info:
外观：深红色带有紫色调。
香气：成熟的李子浆果味伴随着香料和香草橡木味。
口感：酒体适中的传统西拉，具有独特、丰富的李子果香和胡椒气味，并伴有微妙的美国橡木香兰子味。丰富而轻柔的结构、充沛的丹宁，使得它回味无穷。
Colour: Deep crimson red with vibrant purple hues
Bouquet: The nose displays rich plum, blackberry and spicy fruit aromas complexed by subtle vanillin oak.
Palate: A rich, full bodied wine showing powerful berry fruit flavours; plums, dark cherries with slight lifted spice characters are evident. It is soft on the mid palate, with fine tannins and with a generous balance of integrated oak, all of which contribute to a finish of good persistence.

name_zh: 伊慕施华格
info:
This wine is clear light yellow green, immediately displays smoky, flinty, mineral and red currant aroma, with a citrus, bergamot and honey flavor ending.  It has a beautiful presence on the palate, round and intensive, with a fabulously precise acidity. A brilliantly composed wine.
色泽为光亮的清浅黃綠，有烟熏、打火石、矿物质及红醋栗气息，以橙皮、佛手柑香气，蜂蜜韵味收结，入口圆滑细致，气息更为集中，酸度持久有力。

name_en: Pisano RÍO de los PÁJAROS Reserve TSV
name_zh: 比萨诺荷鸟红
info: Dark intense purple with violet tons. Prunes and violets aromas, touches of licorice followed by the spices of cinnamon and black pepper with a subtle floral overtone. Leather and Plums. Blueberries and dark cherries are prominent, meatiness on the palate, fresh juiciness with well integrated toasty oak and a melt of finely tailored tannins. Balanced finish. Ideal match for pasta with tomatoe sauces, pâté, mushrooms and risottos.

name_zh: 施洛斯-弗拉德骑士珍藏雷司令
杜荷夫雷司令白葡萄酒
info: Straightforward white, with baked apple and ripe currant flavors. Soft finish of peach and spice. Drink now through 2015

name_zh: 杜荷夫可登园雷司令白葡萄酒
info: A fruity style, evoking peach, apricot and pear flavors in a rich texture. It's all nicely balanced, juicy and lingers on the finish. 佳酿为水果口味风格，浓郁的质地有着桃子、杏和梨的香味。佳酿美妙平衡，果汁味浓，余韵悠扬绵长。

name_en: Donnafugata Sedara Nero d'Avola Sicilia IGT
name_zh: 多娜佳塔酒园塞拉塔干红葡萄酒
萨兰亭赤霞珠红葡萄酒
info:
Ruby-red.Good aromatic intensity, and touches of pepper; the wooden notes have been fully integrated but in the background, after ageing in French oak barrels.It feels soft and lingers in the mouth, with good structure, ripe and successfully achieved tannins.An ideal match for semi-hard or aged cheeses, or important and complex dishes of spiced red meat.
红宝石色。浓郁的黑胡椒的香气。而后散发出橡木桶陈酿后的木香。口感柔美，余味悠长。是一款架构良好，成熟且单宁优美的葡萄酒。理想搭配陈年奶酪，风味浓郁的菜肴以及辣味红肉。

name_zh: 泰来钵酒（利口葡萄酒）
info:
Deep ruby-red in color with a garnet rim. A firm, vigorous, full-bodied palate, with powerful fruit flavors and a long finish.
It is an excellent dessert wine, particularly with ripe, blue cheese.
 红宝石般的酒体，边缘泛着石榴红色泽。此酒质地紧凑，酒体饱满而丰厚，果香馥郁，令人回味悠长。
最适宜与甜点相搭配饮用，特别是与成熟的绿奶酪相配。

name_zh: 贝灵哲创始者庄园梅洛干红葡萄酒
info:
A deep ruby color. Black cherry fruit is complemented by spicy qualities, notes of white pepper and even a whiff of cinnamon. Backed up by a cedar and a light caramel component that comes from the wine's time in oak.
Food Suggestion: Pair with smoked chicken, grilled vegetables, or pasta.
 此酒有着深沉的红宝石色泽。黑樱桃的芬芳在香料、白胡椒及一丝肉桂的淡雅气息衬托下更加丰富而有层次。来自橡木桶陈酿后的雪松及淡淡的焦糖气息令其酒质颇为精致。
 搭配熏鸡、扒时蔬或意面美味可口。

name_zh: 杜荷夫可石园晚收雷司令白葡萄酒
info: This is pure and translucent, allowing its pear, apple and stone aromas and flavors to shine. Precision, balance and fine length complete the profile. 佳酿纯净，酒色呈半透明状，有着明媚的梨、苹果和石头的香气和口味。精致、平衡，美好的余韵让佳酿更加完美。

name_zh: 費里尼精選卡諾娜乾紅
沃克堡薏丝琳干白葡萄酒
info:
A fresh and elegant Riesling with fine peach aromas and a hint of citrus aromas in the finish. 
A perfect companion with fish dishes, asparagus and light meat. 
这是一款清新，优雅的薏丝琳，富含桃子的芳香，回味略带一丝柑橘的香味。
理想搭配：鱼类，芦笋，口味较清淡的肉类

name_zh: 冯巴斯曼庄园雷司令
甘德罗雷司令珍藏白葡萄酒
info: 半干酒体，酒体纯净，主要有蜜桃，杏子和西柚的香气，酸度鲜明平衡，回味新鲜。                  Medium dry. Pure, focused nectarine, apricot and grapefruit flavors are matched to vivid acidity and a bright, refreshing finish.

name_en: Alois Lageder Riff Pinot Grigio IGT
name_zh: 拉格德酒园白云石灰皮诺干白葡萄酒
info:
Produced from vineyards around the Dolomites, this Pinot Grigio is very fresh and vital, showing spicy, melony fruit, a lees character and intense minerality. It is very refreshing and an outstanding value
 产自葡萄园周围的白云石土质，新鲜而具有生命力，口感略显辛辣，具有甜瓜香气, 具备酒香的特制并伴随强烈的矿物质气息。这是一款令人喜欢且物有所值的酒。

name_zh: 古堡美洛红葡萄酒
info:
此酒拥有深宝石红色，香味复杂，辛辣中带一点烤焊香味。丹宁优雅，可作长期贮藏。
The wines have a deep ruby red color. The complex nose carries spicy, meaty fragrances with a hint of toast. On the palate, the balance is subtle thanks to the extremely fine tannins which lend the wine an ageing capacity of several years.

name_zh: 高美尼堡红葡萄酒
info:
Intense garnet red colour. A good balanced nose, spicy notes of wood and very mighty fruit aroma. Balanced and solid, this fleshy wine has also a nice finess. A beautiful wine to pitcher and to serve with lamb or a roast duck. Serving temperature between 14°and 16°. 
酒体呈浓郁的石榴红色。香气宜人，带有辛辣的木质气息和温和的果香。平衡度和架构出色，口感又不失细腻清新。适宜与羊肉及烤鸭搭配享用。最佳饮用温度在14至16度之间。

name_en: Alois Lageder Pinot Grigio Sudtirol - Alto Adige
name_zh: 拉格德酒园灰皮诺干白葡萄酒
info:
Brilliant straw yellow with a green shimmer. Quite pronounced and expressive aromas with flowery and somewhat spicy notes. Richy flavored in the mouth, with a slight smokiness at the back and a good, fresh finish. 
Food suggestion: Enjoy with starters (Both fish or meat), pâtés and terrines, fish and shellfish poultry, white meat and mushrooms.
稻黄色的酒体闪烁着淡绿光泽，晶莹剔透。花朵与香料的芬芳颇为显著而富于表现力。口味丰饶，略带些许烟熏味道，回味清新而优雅。窖藏2-4年饮用为宜。
搭配头盘（鱼类、肉类皆可），沙锅类、贝类、家禽、白肉类及蘑菇味道鲜美。

name_zh: 香桐粉红起泡葡萄酒
info:
Chandon Rosé NV
Fresh ripe black cherries, citrus and stone fruit notes dominate the nose, complimented by freshly baked pie crust aromas from 18 months of yeast age. The gentle and creamy mouth feel reveals stone fruits, raspberry and vanilla ice-cream characters. Soft citrus tones keep the palate fresh, balanced and focused.
香桐粉红起泡葡萄酒
新鲜成熟的黑樱桃，柑橘，核果的味道十分明显，此外18个月的酵母沉淀陈年赋予新鲜如烤馅饼起酥的芳香。入口柔和，质地如奶油般幼滑，核果，覆盆子，香草冰激凌的特征十分明显；柔美的柑橘的味道令口感十分清新且均衡。

name_zh: 安东努蒂长相思(意大利法定产区)
info:
Straw-yellow with subtle hints of copper. Light floral notes are followed by distinct fruity aromas. With air the wine opens with complex sensations on the nose and palate. The palate is characterized by lovely freshness that invites one for another sip.
色泽呈稻黄色，带有黄铜色。带有花香和浓郁的果香。葡萄酒和空气相遇后散发出丰富的香气与口感。口感清新，诱人。

name_zh: 曼尼哥灰比诺白葡萄酒
info:
straw yellow colour. The characteristic, elegant and intense bouquet
is rich in oak, walnut husk, yellow peaches and golden apples. Harmonious and sophisticated
with marked yeasty hints acquired by maturation “sur lies”. The wine is lively on the palate
where it becomes full and velvety with very persistent ripe fruit flavours, supported by a
pleasant crispness.

name_zh: 愉郎白葡萄酒DOC
info:
此酒有澄黄色泽，带丰富的果香及新鲜的花香味。清脆的果味及清爽的酸度，带乾爽的结尾。
Pale straw coloured, with a fresh, fruity bouquet. Crisp fruit and refreshing acidity on the palate, finishing dry.

name_zh: 凯菲勒-索阿维白葡萄酒
吉佳乐世家罗纳山麓法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Eye : Deep and dark red. Shiny.
Nose : Fresh fruits with red berries and spices.
Palate : Full, round and racy. Rounded and smooth tannins. A full-bodied, rich and intensly aromatic wine.
Overall : Full with a long finish and plenty of elegance and finesse due to the well balanced tannins and fruit.
Food and wine matching
cold meats, meat, game bird and cheese
颜色：深沉而亮泽的暗红色
气味：果味新鲜，带有红色浆果和辛香料的气息
口感：饱满，圆润，生动。单宁柔滑，一款酒体饱满、香味馥郁、口感丰富的葡萄酒
整体：饱满而回味悠长，均衡良好的单宁和果味使这款酒优雅而细腻。
食物搭配：冷肉，肉类，野味和奶酪

name_en: Agricola Cottini Bianco di Custoza DOC
name_zh: 毕安寇卡斯托干白葡萄酒（意大利法定产区）
variety:
Trebbiano Toscano /40%
Gargarena/ 30%
Cortese, Pinot Bianco &Chardonnay /15%
Tocai Friulano/15%
info:
Bright white color, light body, lemon and green apple. Fresh and fruity.
亮白色，轻盈酒体，柠檬和青苹果的香气。带有果香味。

name_abbr: Michele Chiarlo Roverto Gavi di Gavi
name_en: Michele Chiarlo Roverto, Gavi del Comune di Gavi DOCG
name_zh: 迈克基阿罗酒庄栎树林佳味保证法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
Pale straw color with green highlights. Ample, complex, elegant and persistent aromas with hints of vanilla, chocolate, anise and fresh hay. Dry, balanced and fragrant, with a silky texture and good length.
Excellent as an aperitif or to accompany soups, seafood or white meats.  
浅稻草黄色中掩映着淡绿色泽。香气复杂持久，馥郁而优雅，略带新鲜的青草味道。酒质略干，醇郁而和谐，有着丝绸般的质感，回味持久，悠长。
餐前饮用十分理想，与海鲜，汤类及白肉等菜肴搭配鲜美无比。

name_zh: 马库斯-施耐德本源特酿红葡萄酒
天朗黑比诺红葡萄酒
info:
此色泽较深的早期酒混合了黑樱桃和黑浆果的香气，甜美的黑浆果配合柔和的单宁。
The Tahuna Noir has concentrated black cherry and dark berry aromas which follow through to the palate where dark berry fruit and cherry flavours are supported by soft tannins. This is a ripe and deeply coloured food wine, designed for early drinking.

name_en: Marchesi Incisa della Rocchetta Roero Arneis DOCG
name_zh: 罗埃诺阿内斯白葡萄酒(意大利保证法定产区)
info:
This wine expresses its best potential in the first three years of life. Drink it young and appreciate its freshness and lively nature. The bottle should be stored in the dark, at a constant temperature of 15 °C or 59 °F, in a vertical position.
这款葡萄酒的最佳饮用期为三年。应该在其最新鲜，最有活力的状态平常。酒瓶需要储存在阴凉处，恒温15摄氏度或59华氏度，水平放置。

name_en: Castello Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio - Chardonnay Toscana IGT
name_zh: 托斯卡纳地区瑞米白葡萄酒
info:
Pale straw/yellow color. Very soft and fruit-forward aromas reminiscent of lime, pear, and banana together with some floral notes. Lively acidity delivers freshness and a long finish on the palate. 
Served chilled, Le Rime is the perfect partner to a full range of foods including pasta, vegetables, fish, seafood, veal and poultry dishes. 
淡黄色酒体。青柠，梨子，香蕉的柔和果香与些许花香交织融合。酸味活跃，回味清新持久。
饮用前需冰镇。可搭配意面，蔬菜，鱼，海鲜，小牛肉和禽类。

name_zh: 普鲁诺托优洛阿思提巴贝拉红葡萄酒
info:
此酒呈生的石色，充裕的芳香暗含李子和桃的味道。口感均衡单宁柔和
The wine is a vivid and intense ruby red in color with a grapey and fruity (plum and cherry) aroma. Grapes grown on light and loose-textured soils and modern oenological techniques which enable producers to obtain and conserve fruit and freshness combine to make this a wine which is very pleasurable in its youth. For this reason it goes well with simple dishes such as hors d’oeuvres, soups, risotto, and pasta.

name_zh: 马博罗黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
Medium depth of color with purple and crimson notes. An aromatic wine with black cherries and red currants on the nose, complexed with integrated oak and a smoky bacon character. A nice combination of dark cherries and red fruit abound. This is underscored with a hint of oak and firm tannins. Persists well.
Ideal with smoked salmon or pork chops. Suited to most rest meats and not bad as a wine to enjoy all on its own. 
柔和的紫红色酒体。散发着黑樱桃和红醋栗的芳香,并与橡木和熏肉的气息交织融合。醇厚的黑樱桃和红色果实的口味完美结合。酒体以强调橡木的气息和稳固的单宁为特性，回味颇为隽永。
与熏制的三文鱼或猪排搭配十分理想。同时也适合其他多种肉类菜肴，或独自享用。

name_zh: 鲁芬诺利比奥莎当妮干白葡萄酒
info:
Medium straw in color with aromas of green apples, lemons, nuts and pineapple. Very dry and quite full, with pronounced flavors of citrus fruit, earth and dry nutty tones, followed by a long, crisp finish. The overall impression is fresh, crisp, lively and yet full of flavor.Antipasto, poultry, seafood, pasta, cream sauces.
此酒呈现出美丽的金黄色，富含苹果，柠檬，坚果和菠萝的混合果香。酒质干冽而酒体丰满，饮后有着草本植物的口感，令人回味无穷。
此酒适宜与海鲜类食品相搭配。

name_en: Marchesi Antinori Santa Cristina Campogrande Orvieto Classico
name_zh: 圣克里斯蒂娜田园经典奥维托白葡萄酒
info:
明亮的杆色，洋溢丰富而优雅的水果味，酒体和，呈出与不同的美好口感
The wine , a straw yellow in color, shows intense and ample aromas of melon, pineapple, and orange flowers. It is lightly sweet in flavour with a balanced acidicty which adds to its drinking pleasure

name_en: Villa Matilde Rocca Dei Leoni Falanghina delle Campania IGT
name_zh: 马蒂尔德-法兰白葡萄酒
潘丽赛罗酒庄多赛托梦菲娜干红 DOC级
info:
Color:  Beautiful purple red very bright
Nose:  Fruity and typical aromas, including red cherry
Palate:  A very nice balance among tannins, acidity and alcohol, so that the wine is sapid and pleasant. The aftertaste, slightly bitter, reminds the almonds and is the very typical characteristic of this wine.
色泽：鲜艳的紫红色
气味：果味丰富且有着极富代表性的红樱桃风味。
口感：口感清爽，酒体平衡宜人，极具风味，回味中有着特有的苦杏仁风味。

name_zh: 纽顿纳帕山谷克莱红葡萄酒
info:
Newton Red Label Claret 
A sophisticated blend in the Bordeaux tradition, a dark garnet color with vibrant, lifted aromas of black cherry and currants supported by spicy and smoky hints of nutmeg. The palate reveals blueberry, black plum and black cherries with a white pepper spice.
纽顿纳帕山谷克莱红葡萄酒
这是一款经典的具有波尔多传统的混酿类型葡萄酒。纽顿纳帕山谷克莱红葡萄酒呈现深沉的红褐色；香料，肉豆蔻的气息衬托出明显的黑樱桃和加仑子的味道。入口给人以明显的蓝莓，黑李子，黑樱桃和丝丝白胡椒的味道。

name_zh: 奔翠红葡萄酒
info:
此酒由成熟多汁的桃子，浆果和葡萄乾酿制成。果味清香，配合结实的丹宁。
As ripe and juicy as the ripest pulms,berries and currants. Fruit driven nose is upfront and pronounced .Tannins firm but inviting.

name_zh: 菲维亚托齐拉蒙特干白
info:
Golden yellow colour with greenish hints.flower on the nose.Elegant and delicate with flowery and aromatic herbs in the finish; fresh and savoury structure.Ideal to accompany grilled white fish, oysters, lobsters, crabs or grilled chicken.
金黄色略带绿色。清新的花香。优雅而精致，后味有花香以及药草的香味。清新味美。最适于搭配烤鱼、牡蛎、龙虾、蟹或烤鸡。

name_zh: 马西花地葡萄园红葡萄酒
info:
Deep ruby red with violet tinges to the edges. Ample aromas full of spice and fruit with tinges of plum and cherry jam standing out. Full bodied on the palate, rich and velvety; bitter cherries with a hint of liquorice. Attractively long finish.
Food Suggestion:
A very versatile wine. Perfect with many different kinds of food such as pasta with rich sauces (based on meat or mushrooms), grilled or roasted red meats, game and mature cheeses.
Recommended drinking temperature 18°C."
深宝石红色泽，边缘带有一抹紫红色。丰富的香味中蕴涵了许多香料和水果，李子和樱桃果酱的味道从中突显出来。口感上能感觉到饱满的酒体，丰富而香醇。并伴有一丝苦樱桃和甘草的味道。迷人的回味。
配餐建议：
一款百搭美酒。能与许多不同类型的食物完美搭配，例如酱汁丰富的意大利面（含肉和蘑菇），烧烤类的红肉，野味和乳酪制品。建议饮用温度：18°C。

name_zh: 露纹酒园兄妹情设拉子干红葡萄酒
info:
The color is a brilliant deep ruby red. The wine is strongly fruit driven by lifted ripe mulberry, blackberry, and blood red plums with balanced dusty vanillin pod also showing is hints of white pepper and spice. The palate is of full to medium weight with a great intensity of sweet black cherry, blackberry, and plums; this intensity carries through to a long and focused finish with fine grain tannins framing the generous soft fruit.
Ideally suited to pasta and lamb.
 酒体呈红宝石般色泽。飘逸着熟透桑葚、黑莓和红李子的芳香，并伴随着香草及白胡椒、香料的芬芳。口感融合了黑樱桃、黑莓与李子的醇香，十分显著。酒体适中，单宁结构精致，典雅的莓果口味，让人回味隽永。搭配意面或羔羊肉十分美味。

name_en: Castello Romitorio Morellino di Scansano DOCG
name_zh: 罗密欧庄园诺林红葡萄酒
info:
此酒斯坎萨诺酿造，这是义大利其中一个最独特的微气候小镇，坐享西南部海拔的日照和丰富的火山土的优势。此酒的特色: 带有清新的花香、泥土和阵阵显著的李子果味。饮後感觉黑樱桃味带领味蕾至圆润、平稳的收结。
The combination of altitude, southwestern exposure, and rich volcanic soil create in Scansano one of Italy’s most unique microclimates. A nose of fresh flowers, earth and distinct notes of plum. On the palate, bitter cherries open into a round and steady finish.

name_zh: 多娜佳塔酒园阿塞丽干白葡萄酒
info:
Aromas of yellow peaches and plums. On the palate, it is soft with a pleasant mouth feel.  Very enjoyable served with lightly smoked fish, seafood and lighter dishes.  
 黄桃与李子的芬芳沁人心脾，口感柔和怡人。
与微熏的鱼类或海鲜及口味清淡的菜肴搭配鲜美可口。

name_zh: 芬得红葡萄酒
info: Crimson color, medium body, spicy, crushed fresh fruits. Fruity and rich. This wine boasts an intense crimson-tinted robe. It develops a powerful, spice nose finishing with grades of crushed fresh fuits. Fruity and rich, this Bordeaux is of good substance and offers a certain length on the palate. 深红色，中等酒体，新鲜水果和香料 香气。水果口味，味道丰富。拉侠戈古堡红葡萄酒。口感紧实，强烈的爆发力，辛辣味，余味带有果香。果香味浓重，余味悠长。

name_zh: 路易亚都世家勃根蒂黑皮诺法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
It offers a color of medium intensity, purplish in its youth changing to ruby and then gamet, after several years in the bottle. It is harmonious and balanced, with a plump fruitiness and silky texture offset by round, gentle tannins in a wine of medium body and elegant structure. The very typical, fragrant varietal bouquet is complemented by a deliciously lingering finish.
With this wine, you can enjoy grilled or boiled red meats, roasts, mild game, soft cheeses like Camembert and Brie.
此酒颜色中等, 年轻时呈现紫色，稍长后则转为红宝石色，装瓶几年后则变为深石榴红色。酒体和谐平衡，具有浓郁的果香，中等、优雅的酒体加上圆润柔和的单宁，带来了柔顺的口感。酒香则为典型的优雅芳香，余味十分持久，可口。

name_zh: 路易乐图布根地黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info: 在闪亮的深红色酒裙下,此酒向我们尽情展现黑皮诺葡萄的精彩.美味黑樱桃的果香伴随着幽幽的动物性香气,在口中单宁细腻且十分持久,现在恰逢最佳饮用期

name_en: The Hess Collection Cabernet Sauvignon, Napa Valley, USA
name_zh: 赫斯精选加乐福尼亚加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
The wine displays dark colour. Black cherry, chocolate and caramel aromas come first with subtle spice and barrel toast as secondary themes inviting your first sip. The palate reinforces cherry and currant and carries ample weight on the mid palate. The tannins are present but ripe and round and lead to a persistent finish. 
黑红颜色，黑樱桃，巧克力和黑醋栗香味带有些许辛辣和橡木桶烘培香。樱桃，黑醋栗带来的中度口感，成熟，圆润的丹宁带来的持久余味。

name_zh: 格兰卡洛黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info: Lovely Brilliant raspberry red with a youthful brightness. Bramble fruit with hints of strawberry and black cherry aroma. Nicely rounded mouth feel with hints of mulberries and plums. Delicate tannins linger with clean fruit and some forest aromas finish. 此酒呈明亮诱人的覆盆子红色。散发着树莓，些许草莓和黑樱桃的氛香。宜人圆润的口感中带有桑葚和李子的气息。单宁精致，余味带干净的水果和些许森林气息。

name_en: Argiolas Costamolino Vermentino di Sardegna DOC
name_zh: 阿吉拉斯酒庄 科斯塔莫白葡萄酒
info:
Color:Bright yellow with a green hint.
Nose:tropical fruit like pineapple and fig,later come out a elderflower sweet. 
Palate: Full body, low acidity with a melon and ripen apple flavor, fresh and relax touch in the mouth.
色泽：带绿色边缘的亮黄色。
香气：明显的热带水果 菠萝无花果的味道，之后又有接骨木花的甜香
口感：酒体饱满，在香瓜和成熟苹果味略带酸味。在口中仍比较清爽。

name_en: Cave de Tain Crozes Hermitage Rouge AOC
name_zh: 坦恩  罗纳山谷克鲁兹艾米塔吉红葡萄酒
info: 此款佳酿呈现着热情的石榴红伴随淡紫色。精致的黑莓果香，混合着香草和明快的像木香。适宜的甜度和坚实的单宁诠释了丰富饱满的口感Intense garnet-red colour with purple tints. Delicate aromas of blackberry fruits, with vanilla and light oaky notes. Rich on the palate with a good sweetness and a firm tannic structure. Final notes of fresh blackcurrant, violet and oriental spices.

name_en: Domaine de la Seigneurie Saumur Champigny Cabernet Franc
name_zh: 谢尼酒庄圣君庄园红AOC级
info:
Colour: A dark and concentrated ruby color.
Nose: A ripe red fruits nose, with leather notes.
Palate: The mouth is well balanced, rich in is aromas of macerated fruits, with soft tannins.
颜色： 浓郁的深红宝石色；
香气： 成熟水果香气带一丝皮革的气味；
口感： 口感平衡，果香浓郁，丹宁柔和。

name_zh: 阿尔芭丽诺白葡萄酒
info: 用初次榨取的原汁发酵而成，未经橡木陈酿。香气四溢 Made from the first press. No ageing. Very aromatic.

name_zh: 菲斯奈特臻我白葡萄酒
info: The colour is pale straw yellow. At the nose shows fresh fruit intensive touch like apples, pears and bananas. Also we can find some flours, white flora and hints of orange blossom coming from the Moscatel. At the palate is fresh and light, highly aromatic, fruits dominate again but also hints of honey that make it ideal to combine with Cheeses, foie gras and many salads or as a simply relaxful drink at a terrace in front of the sea浅浅的稻黄色泽。馥郁的苹果、梨和香蕉的水果芬芳。略带一丝清新的花香，以及莫斯卡托葡萄含有的橘香味。口感清爽，果香浓郁，伴有些许的蜂蜜味，因此很适合搭配奶酪、鹅肝、沙拉或作为海边的休闲饮品。

name_zh: 伊拉斯莫卡利博罗红葡萄酒
info: 该款葡萄酒60%的赤霞珠，30%梅洛和10%加本力弗朗葡萄混酿而成。深砖红色泽，浓郁复杂黑樱桃果香气息中掺杂着辛辣香料和柔和的橡木味，新鲜红色果香明显，单宁适中，口感复杂圆润。                                                 A blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Cabernet Franc and 30% Merlot. Dark ruby red, with black cherry tones. Complex and intense nose with spices and soft notes of fine oak. Lively and bright red fruit. Sophisticated texture full of pointedly firm tannins.

name_zh: 美诗丽緻梅多克珍藏干红葡萄酒
info:
品酒词: 颜色鲜明，这款酒具有黑樱桃和摩卡咖啡的香味，余味非常精致饱满，单宁柔和。

酿造法: 部分于法国橡木桶中陈年

配餐建议: 非常合适与扇贝，菌类，以迷迭香为调料的烤羊肉，大马哈鱼等一起食用

name_zh: 桃乐丝宝石半干白葡萄酒
info:
Straw colour, with brilliant iridescences.Very rich aroma, with floral (rose and jasmine) and fruity (passion fruit and banana) highlights over a fine base of spices (lavender and vanilla). Fresh palate with smooth acidity. The floral and fruity notes are complemented by nuances of thyme, bay leaf and green apple.Best wine matching with Asian cuisine, either with shellfish or spicy dishes.
麦秆色，有明亮的彩虹色。香气丰富，在香料（熏衣草和香草）的香气之上弥漫着花香（玫瑰和茉莉）以及水果香（西番莲和香蕉）。口感清新，酸味柔顺，百里香、月桂树叶和青苹果的味道补充了原有的花香和果味。最适合搭配亚洲菜肴的葡萄酒，与贝类或辣味菜肴搭配都很适合。

name_en: Aliança Casal Mendes Vinho Verde White
name_zh: 卡萨门德白葡萄酒
info:
Citrus colour and green reflexes.，Fruity aroma.，Lively spritz and lightness and dry fruity taste.
Ideal with seafood, fish, salads or by itself.
 酒体呈明亮的橘色并反射着青绿色的光晕，水果芳香，口感淡雅，偏干，果味浓郁。
配餐建议：与海鲜，鱼类，沙拉相配较为适宜，或者单独饮用也可。

name_zh: 克兰朵红葡萄酒
info:
Deep purple color with a nose of black currants, berries, liquorices with a hint of spice, vanilla, roasted coffee and black chocolate. Textured and fleshy long finish.
To be paired with light spicy dishes such as acidic Thai food or light Sichuan food.
呈深紫色泽，黑加仑，浆果与甘草的香气伴随着一丝香料，香草，咖啡和黑巧克力芳香。酒体质感强且回味持久。                                                                              适合于微辣的菜系如泰国菜或微辣的四川菜系

name_zh: 安东尼世家安东尼庄园红葡萄酒IGT
info:
葡萄酒的色呈深石。具有郁、复的香味，人想起成熟水果、李子果、薄荷、巧克力和草的味道。入口后，酒体良好、、宁柔和，天般滑。余味悠、持久，有成熟水果的味道。酒具有烈的石色。
Intense ruby red. Aroma, intense and complex with notes of spices, mint, and chocolate, which are particularly felt along with light aromas of rip cherries. On the palate the wine, savory and long, is full-bodied and round with supple and velvety tannins.

name_en: Leone de Castris Salice Salentino Riserva
name_zh: 林凯-珍藏萨利切隆伦托红葡萄酒
卢士涛菩托干型雪莉葡萄酒（产膜葡萄酒）
info:
A dry and elegant sherry that is light, smooth and fresh, with attractive fruit and just a hint of tangy yeast and the sea.
Food Suggestion: Ideal as an apéritif or with food. Delicious with shellfish and other seafood.
 一款高雅的干型雪莉酒，轻柔，顺滑且清新，带有诱人的水果和一丝咸酵母的香气，展现出大海的气息。
配餐建议：理想的开胃酒，可与贝类或其他海鲜搭配。

name_zh: 飞扬庄园红葡萄酒
info: Beautiful dark and deep dress, this wine exhales a complex bouquet complex of aromas of cooked plums, vanilla nuances and leather notes. After a supple and fleshy attack, the mouth reveals a beautiful tannic, well-balanced and long structure. A greedy full wine, full of charm and harmony

name_en: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Cotes du Rhone Parallèle 45 Rouge AOC
name_zh: 嘉伯乐罗纳河谷北纬45度红葡萄酒
info:
此酒色泽深而明亮，优雅、氛芳的香气，带有红果之香。圆润、具结构的单宁，尾韵辛辣。
Deep colour with an attractive brilliance.Elegant and aromatic, with red fruits blended with spices.Well-structured on rounded tannins, with a final spicy note.

name_zh: 帕拉西奥斯酒庄红葡萄酒
绿威林圣宴白葡萄酒
info: Lemon and lime fruit with a spicy peppery background, fresh and sappy on  the palate, mineral nuances, good structure and balance, medium body and length  具有柠檬和橙类水果味，并带有胡椒类香料的气息，口感上新鲜而充沛，细微的矿物气息，良好的机构和平衡感，中度酒体及回味。

name_zh: 劳伦斯五劳伦斯五维特利纳白葡萄酒
info: 葡萄富有细腻、微妙的芳香，也保留了其天然的充满活力的酸度。                                                                         Grape is exquisite, delicate fragrance, has kept its natural vibrant acidity

name_zh: 臻爱红葡萄酒
info: Ruby color, medium body, red berries and mineral notes. 红宝石色，酒体中等，带有红色浆果和矿物口感。

name_zh: 托刻伊曼多拉斯
info:
Golden color.Different fruit character of the grape, the mineral aromas of the land.a full-tasting experience in the mouth which adds oiliness to the fruity tastes, and ends with the freshness of the acidity that s typical of the region and its wines.
金黄色。展现出由葡萄带来的不同的果味特征、由当地土质产生的矿物味道。细腻爽滑的果味和来自地特有的葡萄的清新的酸度，带给饮用者无限享受的品尝体验。

name_en: Robert Gilliard Sion Fendant Les Murettes
name_zh: 罗伯特.吉尔勒斯慕特干白葡萄酒
禾富酒园神雕莎当妮白葡萄酒
info:
Mid straw in color with a vibrant youthful hue. The bouquet is typical of Australian chardonnay with tropical melon and peach characters and subtle oak integration. The palate is medium weight with rich fruit flavors and a backbone of supporting French oak. The finish is crisp, dry and refreshing.
Enjoy with chicken dishes, fresh seafood and salads. 
适中的稻黄色酒体掩映出迷人的色泽，年轻而充满活力。蕴含典型的澳洲莎当妮特有的香瓜、蜜桃的芬芳，及些许微妙的橡木气息。口味适中，果味丰富，法国橡木特质令此酒颇有力度。回味略干，清新爽利。
与鸡肉、海鲜及沙拉搭配鲜美无比。

name_zh: 天使蜜语

name_en: Charles Joguet Cuvée Terroir Chinon, AOC
name_zh: 卓格酒庄古地红
info:
Color:  Very dark purple color. 
Nose:  The bouquet reveals aromas of jam-like red fruits.
Palate: The full and round mouth is intense; the powerful body does not alter any of its freshness of the young vineyards.
色泽: 深紫色；
香气: 如红莓果酱般的水果芳香；
口感: 口感饱满而圆润，酒体强劲却不影响酒的新鲜感。

name_en: Villa Matilde Camarato Falerno del Massico
name_zh: 马蒂尔德-法兰诺红葡萄酒
鹰格堡七星干红

name_en: Mount Langi Cliff Edge Sparkling Shiraz
name_zh: 朗节  西拉起泡葡萄酒
info: 强劲的紫红色泽，陈酿的果香、橡木桶香和柔和的单宁无缝不入；红莓、黑莓、辛香、辣香、酸度，单宁，相得益彰。- James Halliday，96分，2005“Powerful purple colour; the same seamless flow of fruit, oak and tannins as in the preceding vintages; the flavours range through red cherry, blackberry, spice, pepper, tamed by lively acidity and fine tannins - 96 points, James Halliday, 2005

name_zh: 乐民酒园维桥莎当妮白葡萄酒
info: Brilliant straw with green tints, Redolent of freshly picked, sun –ripened white peach. Soft fruit giving a generous middle palate, balanced by a delightfully crisp acidity and finishing long with lingering peach flavors. 明亮的稻色中掩映着一抹绿色光泽，散发着成熟白桃的香味，口感适中，柔和的果味与脆爽的酸度形成了良好的平衡。余味绵长带蜜桃气息。

name_zh: 奔富酒园精选莎当妮干白葡萄酒
info:
Pale straw yellow color with youthful green hues. Fresh aromas of tropical fruits and melon are complemented by underlying creaminess and a touch of spicy oak. Medium bodied with ripe peach and green pear flavors, and notes of toasted oak. A delicate acid backbone ensures a clean, fresh finish.
An excellent accompaniment to seafood, chicken and pasta. 淡雅的稻草黄色酒体掩映出活泼的亮绿色泽。热带水果与香瓜的新鲜果香在一丝橡木辛香与乳香补充下更加完整。酒体适中，蜜桃与青梨的口味十分成熟，并带有些许橡木烘烤香味。果酸精致，回味清新爽利。
搭配海鲜、鸡肉及意大利面鲜美无比。

name_en: Domaine Helan Mountain Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 贺兰山珍藏赤霞珠
info:
选用贺兰山葡萄园的最佳地块——“戴维尔园”的优质葡萄酿造而成，果香浓郁并极具品种典型性。

该酒展现出黑醋栗和红色水果的香气，结合了柔和的橡木烘烤，香草，及丝许咖啡豆的香气。成熟的水果单宁和橡木在这款酒中完美结合，可以和一系列红肉如羊肉、鸭肉搭配。

name_zh: 澳大利亚禾富酒园南澳黄牌薏丝琳白葡萄酒
info:
Pale yellow in color with light green hues. The nose shows vibrant varietal aromas of citrus, lemon and lime, with subtle floral notes. The elegantly balanced palate displays fresh citrus and varietal fruit flavors supported by crisp acidity. 
Smoked salmon with creamy dill and tarragon dressing or proscuttio and pear salad.
清雅的淡黄色酒体掩映着亮绿色光泽。葡萄品种特有的柑橘、柠檬及橙子的芬芳十分迷人，并透出一丝淡淡的花香。口感优雅平衡，展现出柑橘及浓郁的水果口味，天然的果酸颇富质感。
搭配熏三文鱼佐以莳萝、龙蒿或梨子沙拉味道鲜美可口。

name_en: Bardong Erbacher Honigberg Riesling Sekt Brut
name_zh: 芭栋雷司令气泡酒

name_en: Roux Père & Fils Moulin A Vent AOC
name_zh: 胡氏父子风车磨坊
info:
Color: Deep Garnet red
Nose: The nose combines perfumes of black fruits and floral scents of autumn.
Palate: Full and fleshy with flavors of morello cherries and prunes. It is a very rich, well balanced wine.
色泽：深石榴红色
香气：充满着黑色浆果和花香。
口感：酸樱桃和西梅的味道，入口圆润而且非常平衡。

name_zh: 皮欧巴贝拉红
info:
The nose is distinguished with fresh, ripe fruit.  The palate is clear and definite, with hint of pulpy fruit, cherry and notes of chocolate framing a long and pleasant finish. Ideal to enjoy with grilled white meat dishes or red meat in sauce.
有新鲜成熟水果的独特香气。口感清爽突出，一抹软果、樱桃和巧克力的香味形成了悠长而怡人的余味。适于搭配烤白肉或酱制的红肉。

name_zh: 库尔切托齐安迪经典
info:
Intense ruby red with garnet reflections.Elegant, intense, ethereal and persistent.Dry, full, consistent body with prolonged impact.Ideal to accompany beef dishes and game.
浓宝石红色，有石榴红色光泽。香气优雅、浓烈、悠长。口感干而饱满，酒体坚固，酒味持久。红肉及野味。

name_zh: 克罗米  小派 黑比诺红葡萄酒
info: 明亮的鲜红色。甜酸结合的樱桃味配合着巧克力般的橡木桶气息。柔软、平衡，黑色李子和圆润的单宁带来神秘的辛辣口感。This enticingly elegant and light-bodied pinot noir fits the bill. It’s spicy, crunchy and loaded with red cherry and raspberry fruit, rose petal aromas and notes of pink pepper. Fine tannins, crunchy Tassie acidity and a long finish complete an enticing and laughably affordable package.

name_en: Jacob’s Creek Reserve Chardonnay Adelaide Hill
name_zh: 杰卡斯霞多丽珍藏系列阿得雷德山脉干白
info:
颜色:
浅黄色,伴有鲜艳的绿色调
酒香:
凉爽气候下形成的极具品种特色的柑橘类水果和白桃芳香,并伴有些许橡木辛辣香气。
口味:
柠檬橘类水果的香气，伴随些许腰果的香味，并富含有质感的奶油厚重感。这款美酒口味丰满，又有清脆的果酸味，使其结构优美、回味悠久。
Colour:
Pale yellow with vibrant green hues
Bouquet:
Highly fragrant cool climate varietal aromas of citrus and white peach,
with a touch of spicy oak.
Palate:
Lemon citrus with a hint of cashew nut and rich, textural creamy weight.
A full flavoured wine with crisp acidity that provides an elegant structure
and great length.

name_zh: 安东尼·鲁伯特极致红葡萄酒
info:
The nose abounds with blackcurrant, cassis, ripe plum and rich fruitcake with a hint of tobacco leaf too. It’s soft-textured and invitingly seductive. The same beautiful black and red fruit make the transition from nose to palate. They can be found in abundance with licorice and coca adding a dark, inviting depth and contrast to the ripe sweetness of the fruit. Velvety and soft textured but with backbone and structure.
闻酒香，鼻腔中充斥着黑加仑、黑醋栗、熟李子和水果蛋糕的香气，同时伴随着一抹烟草叶的香味；出彩的红色水果的香味由鼻腔传递到口腔，口感柔和且诱人；丰富的甘草汁、古柯融合着果实成熟的甘甜；天鹅绒般的质地，搭配坚实有力的结构，达到刚柔兼并的平衡口感。

name_zh: 葛瑞菲拉卡纳洛斯黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info: 浓郁的成熟樱桃，覆盆子及淡淡的肉桂，烟熏的香气。平滑，精致的结构感，黑色浆果，李子，小红莓的果味，与单宁完美的融合，余味绵长持久。             A wealth of intense ripe cherry and red raspberry aromas and hints of cinnamon and smoke announce this lovely Pinot Noir. On the palate, the wine displays smooth, supple textures, luscious black cherry, plum and cranberry flavors and a light touch of oak amid well-integrated tannins throughout a long, deftly balanced finish.

name_en: Château Jean Gue, Lalande de Pomerol AOC
name_zh: 尚如古堡拉兰德庞马洛法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Pleasant blackberry character, with hints of vanilla and fresh herbs. Medium-bodied, with fine tannins and a clean finish.
宜人的黑莓香气带着一丝香草及清新草本的味道，中等酒体，单宁细致良好且余味清新。

name_zh: 吕尼酒窖梅克雷红葡萄酒
info:
外观：深红色
酒香：浓郁红果（草莓、山莓和樱桃）和黑果（黑加仑子）香气，并带有香料味道。
口感：酒体浑厚、层次分明，该酒拥有明显的地域特征，带有美味果味和顺滑丹宁味。
VISUAL:deep and intense ruby red
NOSE: intense aromas of red fruits (strawberry, raspberry and cherry), black fruits (blackcurrant) with notes of spices
PALATE:full-bodied wine with structure, this wine is a loyal representative of its appellation, with delicious fruits notes combined with satin-textured tannins.

name_en: Miolo Family Vineyards Reserva Tannat, Brazil
name_zh: 米奥罗珍藏丹拿红葡萄酒
info: Colour: This wine presents high color intensity with ruby-red and purple tones. Aroma: It has a fruit aroma, emphasizing red fruits and spices, perfectly integrated with the wood of the oak, giving the wine a touch of complexity. Palate: It is well structured in the mouth, with a striking presence of its tannins, reflecting the typical characteristics of the tannat grape, but at the same time rounded and smooth, giving the wine a velvety touch. 颜色：葡萄酒的颜色非常浓郁，带有红宝石色和紫色。口感：带有果味，特别是红果和香料的味道。与橡木味完美融合，增加了其复杂性。口感：在口中结构非常平衡，单宁持久，说明其带有丹拿葡萄的典型特征，但同时，圆润顺滑，有天鹅绒般的质感。

name_zh: 沙朗苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
此酒是不经木桶储存，芳香苏维翁加上更成熟的草般果子香味。 口腔内充满著多种清新果味及爽口酸度。
The wine is unwooded to maximize varietal punch, the aroma has restrained sauvignon grassiness coupled with riper fruit characters. the palate is fresh and lively with pure varietal flavors and crisp acidity.

name_zh: 葡萄之路纳普斯坦新酿薏丝琳干白葡萄酒
info:
Delicate lemon lime and orange blossom dominate, with a hint of bath powder. The palate has lovely lemon lime fruit intensity. A very full rich middle palate and lovely crisp acidity helps emphasize the long fruit finish.
精致的柠檬、橙子花香与一丝浴粉的淡雅清香交织融合。怡人的柠檬果味颇为浓郁，充盈口腔。果酸爽利，令回味中果味十分突出。

name_zh: 比萨诺私家珍藏丹纳红
info: Seductive, intense purple colour. Complex and concentrated tannic aroma, resembling mushrooms, very ripe dark plum and spiced wood. Great density in the mouth, plus extra long and robust taste of jammy wild fruits. Rich and ripe flavours of Cranberries and Blackberries. It has the lush oak and polished texture of the best international-style reds, married to the meaty, smoky, plumy flavours characteristic of the Tannat variety. Vanilla spice from new barrels makes for a surprisingly complex red wine. Long and generous ending.

name_en: Chateau la Croix Bonneau Montagne Saint Emilion
name_zh: 宝诺十字酒庄红葡萄酒
info: Deep red in colour, La Croix Bonneau 2007 is a blend of 95% Merlot which gives spice, damson fruit and cassis aromas, plus 5% Cabernet Franc to give firm tannins and a touch of red berry flavour on the palate. Ageing in top quality French oak barrels has given a complex, mellow, long finish without overpowering the juiciness of the merlot fruit

name_zh: 客来贺酒庄浆果特选佳酿白葡萄酒
info:
Offering yellow fruit and smoky aromas. This medium-bodied, tightly wound, peach-flavoured wine is velvety-textured, sweet, and tangy. Delicious. 
此酒散发出黄色水果及烟熏的气息。酒体适中，蜜桃的口味稳固而含蓄，有着天鹅绒般的柔软质感，回味香甜，浓郁。

name_zh: 澳大利亚葡萄之路薏丝琳白葡萄酒
info:
This wine has stone fruit and tropical fruit aromas and flavors. Lime characters are also present and will grow with time in the bottle to balance the evident mineral slaty finish nicely.

Food Suggestion: Excellent as an aperitif, or with many styles of Chinese food, salads and rich poultry.
带有核果及热带水果的芳香和口味，来自克莱尔谷带有橙味的典型的薏丝琳特质得到充分展现，并且随着在瓶中陈放时间的推移，将与回味中矿物质的味道达到完美的平衡。
非常适宜作开胃酒，或与各类中国菜肴，沙拉及味浓的禽类搭配。

name_zh: 仙乐都"龙"长相思赛美蓉干白葡萄酒
info: 浅稻草色带有一丝绿色边晕。香气活泼，清新柔和；酒体适中，具有辛香的热带果香和橘香。一款易饮的典型的玛格丽特河白葡萄酒Pale straw with a slight green tinge. The vibrant bouquet offers fresh citrus and herbal aromas with guava and lemon sherbert characters in the background. Medium bodied, the lively palate displays spicy tropical characters, passionfruit and zesty citrus flavours. An easy drinking ‘Classic’ Margaret River wine style with wonderful purity of fruit with a crisp refreshing finish.

name_zh: 巴塔希尼比奥洛红葡萄酒
info:
The elegant notes on the nose are of plum, raspberry, rose and violet. Subtle hints of sweet spices develop as the wine opens. The mouth feel is harmonious, with a long finish. 
散发着李子、树莓、玫瑰和紫罗兰香气；短暂醒酒后会带出精致的甜味辛辣，口感和谐，平顺悠长

name_en: Marchesi Incisa della Rocchetta Rollone DOC
name_zh: 罗洛尼红葡萄酒
info:
Color Rich ruby red color. Bouquet When young, this wine is fresh with red berries and summer fruits. Watermelon and cranberry. Tropical flowers like gardenia and jasmine. Fields of freshly cut green grass. All of these flavors become intense and become more complex with ageing. Palate Medium-bodied, balanced and dry with a crisp fresh finish. Red currant, dark chocolate and black pepper. Generous on the palate. Persistent. Delicious.
色泽: 红宝石色. 特色: 在这款酒年青时，能感觉到夏天水果般的香气。典型的茉莉花等香气错综结合。还带有青草的香气。随着年份的久远，味道变得更加复杂紧实。口味: 中等酒体。口感平衡。余味新鲜。 带有黑胡椒和黑巧克力的口感。

name_zh: 司徒妮黑比诺红葡萄酒
info:
Colour: Bright ruby red 
Aroma: Intense cherry and savoury plum aromas with some subtle French oak adding complexity. 
Palate:  The palate shows vibrant cherry and plum 
fruit flavour, with some spicy, earthy 
complexity. The structure is weighty with fine, 
but quite grippy tannins providing balance to 
the intense fruit. 
颜色: 深红色
香气: 浓郁的樱桃和李子的香味,少许的法国橡木桶味让香气层次更丰富
口感: 美味的樱桃和李子味中带有些许辛辣感,有土味.这款酒的层次结构厚重,但单宁却又让酒的果味更为出众

name_en: Leeuwin Estate Siblings Sauvignon Blanc Semillon
name_zh: 露纹酒园兄妹情白苏维翁瑟美戎干白葡萄酒
info:
Pale straw with lime green edges. This wine has a rich lifted floral and lychee nose with a wonderful flinty edge combining all the characteristics to be found in Leeuwin Estate Sauvignon Blanc fruit. 
酒色呈清醇的青柠色，充满浓郁的荔枝香味，白苏维翁葡萄品种的所有特质在此款酒中得到充分展现。

name_zh: 露纹酒园莎当妮干白葡萄酒
info:
The color is a brilliant green straw. Intensely lifted aromas of ripe yellow pear skins, the petals of citrus blossom, nectarine and ripe peach accompanied by hints of fig and cashews from barrel maturation on yeast lees with integrated charry French oak. The palate displays the mouth filling and intense flavors of fresh ripe pears which is full bodied and incredibly rich, intermingling with delicious stone fruit flavors and nectarine. The middle palate shows richness from both the fruit and the lees stirring, with a lingering fresh citrus finish.
