明亮的稻黄色酒体。散发着熟透洋梨，柑橘花瓣，油桃和成熟桃子的混合芳香，并伴随着橡木桶陈酿成熟期中酒糟发酵所孕育出的淡雅无花果和腰果的芬芳，同时融入了法国橡木的碳香。洋梨味道浓郁醇厚，加之核果和油桃的点缀使此酒更为丰腴饱满，果味十足且渣滓活跃，体现了其回味持久且充满绵长的清爽柑橘芳香之特性。

name_zh: 露纹酒园莎当妮干白葡萄酒
法国婷芭克世家阿尔萨斯精选黑皮诺法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Charm, freshness, and finesse have earned this red grape variety its great popularity. The Pinot Noir develops an intense scent of red fruits (raspberry, strawberry, cherry) white its round, freshly-fruity flavour affords hedonistic pleasure.
迷人的气息和精致的口感为这支红酒赢得了极大的声誉。加州葡萄散发出强烈的红果香气（覆盆子、草莓以及樱桃）环绕着。新鲜的果香给予人快乐的享受

name_en: Tenuta di Collosorbo Rosso di Montalcino DOC
name_zh: 蒙塔奇诺红葡萄酒(意大利法定产区)
info: Ruby-red color, intense fruity perfume reminiscent of pansies, violets, raspberries and pomegranates. Smooth, fresh, intense and persistent flavour, harmonious and elegant. 颜色呈红宝石色，强烈的水果香味，带有三色紫罗兰，紫罗兰，覆盆子和石榴的味道。口感顺滑清新，强烈持久，和谐优雅。

name_en: Tedeschi Capitel San Rocco Vino di Ripasso Valpolicella Superiore DOC
name_zh: 泰得奇  圣罗科•瓦尔波利塞亚精选里帕索干红葡萄酒
variety:
Corvina
Corvinone
Rondinella
Rossignola
Oseleta
Negara
Dindarella
Croatina
Forselina
info: 成熟黑樱桃，黑莓水果香气混合玫瑰花瓣，茶叶，干草药等气味，平衡愉悦，酸度高，单宁可口。Ripe black cherry and blackberry fruit flavors mix with hints of rose petal, pekoe tea and dried herbs in this velvety red, which balances a pleasant sappy quality with tangy acidity, showing chewy tannins on the finish.

name_zh: 拉格德酒园黑皮诺干红葡萄酒
info:
Medium ruby color with a garnet shimmer. Clean, somewhat earthy varietal aromas with notes of red fruit, cherries and some spiciness. Fruity with medium body, this wine offers fresh finish with good length and elegance.
Food Suggestion: White and red meat, poultry, duck, venison, cheeses. 红宝石般的色泽闪烁着石榴红的光泽。葡萄品种特有的芳香十分纯净，散发着红果、樱桃与些许香料清香，果味柔和，酒体适中。回味清新持久，风格颇为优雅。条件适宜可窖藏3-5年。
可搭配红、白肉类，禽类、鸭肉、野味及乳酪美味无比。

name_zh: 佳乐美酒庄莫贝庄园红葡萄酒
variety:
Malbec/85%
Tannat/8%
Cabernet Sauvignon/3%
Syrah/2%
Petit Verdot/2%
info:
Brilliant and very intense red color, this wine is concentrate and complex to the nose, with a lot of spice( pepper and clove), black fruits ( black cherry and currant ) and a floral touch ( violet). It is powerful and fresh in the same time in the mouth; well integrate oak giving more complexity and very round and harmonious tannins.
此酒呈明亮和浓郁的红色。芳香馥郁复杂，呈现出辛辣（胡椒粉和丁香），黑水果（黑樱桃和醋栗）和紫罗兰花的气息。口感强劲不失鲜爽，橡木桶陈酿赋予其复杂圆润的口感以及和谐的单宁。

name_zh: 澳大利亚禾富酒园总统特选南澳设拉子干红葡萄酒
info:
A deep, dark red color. The bouquet is intense, peppery and full of spiced fruit and chocolate characters. These flavors are also evident on the rich and full-bodied palate with sweet fruit and very good structure. The finish is long and lingering courtesy of the fine grained wood tannins.
Enjoy with rich, spiced meat and vegetable dishes.
深红的色泽。浓郁的胡椒、辛香水果及巧克力的独特芬芳，相同的口味充盈口腔，同时伴有甜果的清香。果味香甜，口味丰富，酒体丰腴，结构细腻，有层次，回味中可品出木质单宁精致而微妙的口味。
搭配香辣味浓的肉类或蔬菜类菜肴鲜美可口。

name_zh: 孔斯特艺术家黑皮诺红葡萄酒

name_en: Marques de Riscal Reserva, Rioja DOCa
name_zh: 瑞格尔侯爵酒园里奥哈陈年特酿法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Intense red in color with delightfully spicy and complex aromas, highlighted by licorice and subtle oaky notes. This wine offers a soft finish, with subtle, lingering hints of toast.
Enjoy with roasted meats, garlic sautéed vegetables and stews. 
酒体呈深红色泽，宜人的辛香与复杂的酒香在微妙的橡木与甘草的清香衬托下更为突出。回味柔和，精致，几分土司芬芳延绵不绝。
搭配烤肉，及咖喱为辅料的蔬菜或炖肉味道鲜美。

name_zh: 科莱-内比奥罗红葡萄酒
凯胜泰利-经典克安蒂红葡萄酒
露纹酒园莎当妮干白葡萄酒

name_en: Chateau des Laurets Puisseguin Saint Emilion
name_zh: 劳蕾丝古堡红葡萄酒 (别名：右岸小拉菲)
info:
Dark purple colour with charming ripe fruit (raspberry and cherry) , associated with a fine touch of smokiness and spices. On the palate, very rond attack, typical from nice ripe Merlot, packed with velvety tannins. A well balanced acidity is giving long and fresh fruity aftertaste. 
Medium bodied structured with a good balance, this fine wine presents about 12 years of aging potentiel (in good cellaring conditions)
酒体色泽呈深紫色，诱人的成熟浆果（覆盆子和樱桃）芳香中夹带着一丝烟熏和香料的香气。在口感上，圆润并展现了典型的成熟梅洛特质，丹宁如天鹅绒般柔软。酸度平衡的结构带来了果香及持久的回味。中等的酒体结构和良好平衡度，此酒可储存12年（在优良的地窖环境中）。

name_zh: 优伶 小优伶 霞多丽干白葡萄酒
info: 浅稻草色。浓郁的矿物质气息间散发着白油桃和柑橘的果香。口感丰富，清新优雅，酒体适中。敲到好处的橡木气息很好的的支撑了其果香，酸度平衡。结构良好，回味悠长，是一款典型的冷气候美酒，可陈放若干年。Pale Straw. Great intensity with mineral notes, white nectarine and citrus flavours. This wine shows a creamy, nutty complexity with freshness and elegance. Medium weight with clean citrus fruit supported by well integrated French oak and balanced acidity. Great structure and length in the finish, this wine shows typical cool climate characteristics and will reward medium term cellaring.

name_en: Château Barrail du Colombier Cuvée traditionelle
name_zh: 巴赫古堡窖藏特級紅葡萄酒
艾拉斯黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
Bright, fresh fruit aromas of cherry, raspberry, and blueberry fill the glass.  Youthfully exuberant with lots of sweet fruit on the palate with hints of spice and vanilla. So versatile with food – fish, fowl, beef, pasta...the perfect house red!
 樱桃，红莓及蓝莓等水果的芳香盈满酒杯，风味清新而明快。大量香甜果味在味蕾上汹涌澎湃，伴有淡淡的香料与香草回味。适于搭配多款美食—如鱼类,禽肉,牛肉,意面等……一款完美的可于家中享用的红酒。

name_zh: 皮埃特罗毕克奇珍藏基安蒂红葡萄酒(意大利保证法定产区)
info:
Colour: purple-edged deep ruby. Nose: Rich, showing berry fruit and subtle vanilla. Palate: lovely velvety texture, supported by expressive
Tannins.
颜色：带有紫色边缘的深红宝石色。香气：丰富，带有浆果和香草的气味。口感：如天鹅绒般的质地，同时有丰富的单宁支撑。

name_en: Bardong Rudesheimer Klosterberg Pinot Noir Rose Sekt Brut
name_zh: 芭栋黑品乐玫瑰气泡酒

name_en: Beelgara Regional Reserve Chardonnay Yarra Valley
name_zh: 贝加拉亚拉山谷霞多丽白葡萄酒（珍藏版）
info:
其优雅而精巧的结构中富有桃、热带水果的芬芳，口感丝滑顺畅，回味绵长。
This attractive and elegant white wine is made from Chardonnay grape. It has attractive aromas of peaches and tropical fruit. The palate is soft and silky with a sustained length of flavor.

name_en: Weingut Nigl Cuvee Point, Kremstal, Austria
name_zh: 尼玖  庞恩特红葡萄酒
info: 深色宝石红和石榴红色泽，烟熏和果味中略带奶油和坚果的香气，成熟的莓类水果、橄榄和板栗味道，松露的精妙香气中略带苦巧克力味，绵甜中带苦，具有咖啡、烤面包、榛子和甜李子沙司的复杂香气。单宁紧实有力，果味成熟和谐，回味悠长持久，是一款强劲饱满的果味美酒。Dark ruby-garnet with black core and crimson rim; roasted-smoky fruit displaying creamy nut aromas and ripe - almost overripe - berry fruit, olives and chestnut notes, fine nose of truffle and bitter chocolate; lardy-sweet palate with roasted aromas of coffee and toast, hazelnuts and sweet plum pesto, firm, powerful tannins, mature and harmoniously-integrated; long and substantial on the finish, robust and full, a fruit-driven wine

name_en: Lafite Amancaya Gran Reserva Malbec Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 拉菲家族安第斯红葡萄酒
info:
Deep purple-red colour. Fruit driven wine, with appealing red and black cherry flavours,
blackcurrant and plums with a hint of vanilla and cedar. On the palate it has a nice tannic texture,
round and well-balanced.
Notes of vanilla and chocolate coming from the French oak.
 酒体为深紫红色。果味芬芳，有着迷人的红樱桃，黑樱桃的香味，并带有香草和雪松的黑醋栗和李子香气。单宁质地佳，口感圆润均衡。法国橡木桶中散发出香草和巧克力的香味。

name_zh: 库妙河 乡村霞多丽白葡萄酒
info: The 2009 Village Chardonnay gives delicate aromas of fresh peaches, baking bread and orange blossom with a hint of crushed stones. Medium bodied with a good amount of ripe apple and yeasty flavors, it has refreshing acidity, a gentle creaminess to the texture and a long finish.

name_en: Château des Jacques Cru Morgon AOC, Louis Jadot
name_zh: 路易亚都世家雅克城堡摩根法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
With a deep sherry color, developing walnut and little red fruits aromas, this wine has silky tannins that will help him to age.
It will be a perfect partner for charcuteries, italian foods, red and white meats when young. Getting older, it will match perfectly with game.
此酒具有如雪利酒般的深色色泽，带有胡桃木及小型红色果实的香味，如丝般柔顺的单宁令陈年后的酒更具魅力。此酒年轻时适宜搭配熟食，意大利美食及红白肉类。陈年后与野味则有着完美的搭配。

name_en: Tenuta dell'Ornellaia Le Volte Toscana IGT
name_zh: 乐福特红葡萄酒
info:
The hot and sunny climate gave us a remarkably appealing Le Volte, with rich, intense fruit and spice notes, and no trace of over-ripeness. On the palate boasts a smooth, velvety mouthfeel, with glossy tannins and a lively, crisp acidity, both contributing to its impressive balance, and it concludes with very lengthy finish.
气候炎热，阳光充足，为该年份的乐福特带来浓郁丰富而不过熟的水果及香料的芬芳气息。口感如丝绒般顺滑，丝滑单宁和爽脆酸度，更使这款酒异常均衡，余味悠久不散。

name_zh: 索莱酒园玛丽小溪设拉子干红葡萄酒
info: The 2002 Mamre Brook Shiraz has great depth. The nose shows intense blackcurrant and plum with hints of licorice, spice and chocolate. On the palate the wine offers generous, rich characters of dark berry, plum and mocha with fine, softly textured tannins. 此款设拉子颇为深沉。浓郁的香气中蕴含黑醋栗、李子及些许甘草、香料和巧克力的淡雅气息。口味醇浓，富含丰饶的黑莓、李子及摩卡咖啡味道。单宁柔和，颇具质感。

name_zh: 恬宁奥古斯红葡萄酒
info: St-Augstine is the flagship of our red wine, it is a selection of our best cuvees of Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. This wine elegantly associates warmth and richness with finesse and harmony

name_zh: 格雷策酒庄华莱士红
info:
A hint of dark cherry from the grenache component in Wallace provides an attractive floral note to the nose. The palate is rich and full yet supple and fresh. The Shiraz component gives the wine backbone, flesh and body with the grenache adding a soft, vibrant juciness. Textural tannin components are supported by lively notes of plums and hints of cassis. Dark fruit's, spice and cigar box characters are the hallmarks of this fuller bodied 2010 Wallace. Very approachable in it's youth and will develop great complexity as it ages.
歌海娜展现出丰富的黑樱桃风味以及诱人的花香气，而西拉则构成整款酒的结构和骨架。两者混合后展现出馥郁饱满的酒体并依然保持新鲜柔顺的口感。丰富的单宁在甜李、醋栗、黑色浆果、香料和烟草风味的映衬下更体现出2010年份的亲和力，陈年能力可见一斑。

name_zh: 银色高地家族珍藏干红
info:
Intense array of red and black fruits aromas. Rich, round with lovely fruit concentration; 12 months of aging in American oak. Limited production of 3,100 bottles.
这款酒有着扑鼻而来的红色浆果的香气，口感柔滑有着诱人的果味，结构均衡良好，在美国橡木桶内陈酿12个月，有些许香草味。

name_en: Chapel Hill McLaren Vale Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 礼拜山  麦克拉伦谷 赤霞珠干红葡萄酒
info: “色泽深沉浓郁，充分体现了西拉的产区特色，同时却完美的表露出其品种特有的深色果香；完美的单宁与良好的木桶陈酿更是锦上添花。” “Deep, dense colour; just as with the Shiraz, the region speaks loud and clear, but does not pervert the excellent display of varietal fruit with its array of blackcurrant and mulberry (and dark chocolate) fruit; excellent tannins and good oak are further pluses. Screwcap.”

name_en: Mount Difficulty Roaring Meg Pinot Noir
name_zh: 狄菲特山麓  萝瑞麦格黑比诺干红葡萄酒
info: 散发着迷人的深色果香，橡木的陈年增添了其复杂度。甜美而丰富，单宁优雅，回味悠长。 This wine exhibits a lovely mix of red and black berry fruits with further complexity gained from oak spice. The wine has a sweet berry entry which displays these same characters in abundance. Tannins rise gracefully out of the mid-palate to finish the wine. These are balanced by the wine’s acidity and fruit, to produce a long fruit driven finish.

name_zh: 怡园深蓝干红
info:
deep crimson color. aromas of dark berry fruits and a 'cedar like' oak influence. full, long and integrated palate, but allows the wines' individual varietal characters and subtle oak influence, to create complexity. 
明亮的深绯红色。呈现出扑鼻而来令人愉悦的复合香气，散发着明显的黑加仑，李子和雪松橡木味道。酒体中厚，圆润，开始呈现出它的复杂性。収结处感觉到单宁的柔和细腻，回味悠长，陈放后效果更佳。

name_en: Matua Valley Hawkes Bay Sauvignon Blanc
name_zh: 马腾山谷鹰湾白苏维翁干白葡萄酒
info:
Aromas of gooseberry and apple dominate. The vibrant and lively palate has mineral and herbal tones over a core of apple and green melon. An appealing freshness and lingering intensity completes this elegant wine.
Pairs well with wild rocket and spinach tart with fetta and egg filling topped with roasted pine nuts and parmesan cheese. 醋栗与苹果的芳香十分突出。苹果与青瓜口味中透出些许矿物质与草药的清香，颇为宜人。回味清新醇浓，令此酒更添几分优雅气质。
搭配以芝麻菜、菠菜、羊乳酪、鸡蛋、烤松子为辅料的意大利干酪十分美味。

name_zh: 丽朗碧奥庄园勃艮第黑品乐红葡萄酒
info:
有一个新鲜的和开放的花香味道扑鼻而来。在口感上,它是令人愉快的和柔软的。单宁柔滑和紧密。
This Bourgogne Pinot Noir 2009 has a fresh and open nose with floral notes. On the palate, it is pleasant and supple. Tannins are silky and well integrated.

name_en: Château de Lisse, Saint Emilion, Grand Cru
name_zh: 丽榭古堡圣爱美浓头等苑法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
This wine boasts a ruby robe with black tints. Displays aromas of ripe blackcurrant, plum and vanilla. A full, dense mouth-feel ensures richness and body.
Enjoyed with rich flavored meat and vegetable dishes.
这支酒呈红宝石色，泛黑色光泽，带有成熟黑醋栗、李子和香草的香味，丰富醇厚的口感保证了酒体的饱满，搭配带浓郁口感的肉类及蔬菜十分合适。

name_en: Charles de Fere Cuvee Jean Louis Blanc de Blancs
name_zh: 迪费路易白中白起泡酒
info:
Enticing pale gold color with especially elegant, fine bubbles.
The aromas are fresh and fruity in style.
Light and crispy to the taste, Cuvée Jean-Louis is full-bodied with a long finish.

迷人的淡金颜色，充溢着极其优雅美好的气泡。清新的水果芳香。
口感轻盈爽脆，酒体饱满，回味悠长

name_zh: 桃乐丝圣歌红葡萄酒
info: 颜色极深的暗红色。气味芬芳，有清新的矿物质气息。口感华丽圆润，但非常细腻，余味持久。这款暗红色的酒在来自法国橡木桶细腻的香料和烧烤口感的背景下，显现出果酱的味道，非常易饮。野味和红肉类菜肴。 Dark in hue and almost opaque. It is fragrant and mineral on the nose. On the palate it is luxurious and oily, but also silky and with a long finish. This darkly coloured wine is reminiscent of jam and liquorish, over a smooth spicy and toasted background, which comes from The French oak barrels. Salmos. A present day wine that speaks to us of the past. Dishes of game and red meats.

name_zh: 名导之手仙粉黛
info: 这款优雅的仙粉黛葡萄酒经法国橡木桶中陈酿，增添了烘烤香料及香草气息，以及令人陶醉的葡萄干、朗姆酒、黑加仑和红樱桃的香气。                                    The wine is aged in French oak, which adds the essence of toasted spice and French vanilla to heady aromas of rum raisin, black currant, and red cherry.

name_zh: 布劳本特马德拉5年珍藏利口葡萄酒
info:
Aged in oak casks for at least 5 years. A delicious, full-bodied and rich dessert wine, with an excellent balance between sweetness and acidity.  This is produced from a blend of several Madeira grapes for complexity.

这款酒在木桶中陈年达5年以上，酒味鲜美，是一款酒体丰富而浓郁的甜酒。在甜度和酸度之间的平衡可以说是达到了完美。通过多种葡萄的混酿增加了她的复杂度

name_zh: 帕利斯尔庄园长相思白葡萄酒
info: 亮绿色泽明艳动人。成熟的醋栗芳香与一丝热带果香芬芳怡人。此酒优雅而又爽利，醋栗的成熟口味与热带水果口味相得益彰。回味持久，略带一丝青草味道。Brilliant light green color. Ripe gooseberries with a hint of tropical fruit on the nose. An elegant but crisp wine with ripe, gooseberry flavors on the fore palate backed by tropical fruits and a hint of grassiness that lingers on the aftertaste.

name_zh: 翠陶玫瑰古堡美铎高地法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Dark ruby colour with some purplish tints. The nose is still a little tight with some notes of fresh red fruits and vanilla. The attack in the mouth is very juicy with lots of sweetness, and overall enveloped by the fine, elegant tannins. Beautiful controlled power with an agreeable freshness.
酒体为深红宝石并咯带紫色。酒体散发紧实的鲜红果实及香草的味道。入口感觉甜美多汁，并包裹着精致的单宁。强劲的酒体于清新完美的得到了控制。

name_zh: 美蕾卢比刚红葡萄酒
info: A Bordeaux-style blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, the 2003 Meerlust Rubicon shows currant, cassis, and dark chocolate flavors and aromas with a lingering tobacco note. A strong tannic backbone is present, but balanced by the concentrated fruit flavors.  This wine is drinking beautifully now, but will cellar well for 5 or more years. 此酒系一款由加本力苏维翁、梅洛及加本力弗朗混合酿制的波尔多风格的美酒，2003年份富含葡萄干、黑醋栗及黑巧克力的口味及芳香，萦绕着一丝烟草的清香。单宁强劲，与浓郁的果味达到完美平衡。此酒即刻饮用颇为美味，也可窖藏5年或更久之后享用。

name_en: Villa Maria Estate “Private Bin” Sauvignon Blanc(SC)
name_zh: 新玛利庄园珍匣苏维翁白葡萄酒
马库斯-施耐德黑标特酿红葡萄酒

name_en: Torbreck Old Vines GSM – Grenache, Shiraz, Mourvèdre
name_zh: 托布雷酒园老藤红葡萄酒
info:
此酒呈深红色，富有成熟的樱桃味、香料、黑醋栗和花莲闻香。口感丰富，酒质幼滑如丝，带有阵阵微妙的压碎樱桃、李子和泥土气息，单宁成熟柔和。
Deep garnet red with flickers of purple, the wines high-toned aromas of black cherries, five spice, crème de cassis and spring flowers. The palate offers a soft latent richness and silken-like texture with subtle notes of crushed cherries, dorris plum and earth - all neatly wound by a taught spine of acidity and ripe supple tannins.

name_zh: 奔富酒园BIN8加本力设拉子干红葡萄酒
info:
Black cherry, dark chocolate and cherry liqueur on the nose. Across the palate, splashes of chocolate and mint combine with hints of rosemary and warmed spice. Some toasty notes are evident from the balanced, integrated oak. Flavors of black cherry and dark chocolate combine with black olive and spicy fruit-cake tones. Full flavored, velvety tannins enhance the long, sweet fruit finish. 
Enjoy with beef, pizza, lamb or game. 
黑樱桃、黑巧克力与樱桃酒的香气颇为诱人。巧克力、薄荷的口味与些许迷迭香、香料气息交织融合。土司的芳香在和谐完整的橡木香气衬托下充分显现。黑樱桃、黑巧克力味道与黑橄榄、果料蛋糕口味十分和谐。单宁柔和，突出了持久回味及甜润的果香。
搭配牛肉、比萨、羊肉或野味十分可口。

name_zh: 马博罗白苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
Pale straw color with touches of green. Characters of cut grass and tropical fruits are dominant on the nose. Unfolds with flavors of passion fruit, gooseberry and subtle herbaceousness. The wine is mouthfilling with good texture and finishes well with cleansing acidity and great length. 
Ideally suited to asparagus, oysters and summer salads.
淡雅的稻黄色酒体掩映出绿色光泽。散发着青草的气息与热带水果的芳香。西番莲果，醋栗口味，并略带稀薄的草木香口感。 酒体质地完美，酸度适中，回味持久。
搭配芦笋、牡蛎和夏天沙拉十分理想。

name_zh: 约瑟夫杜鲁安努伊村红
info:
It has a beautiful, luminous ruby colour.On the nose, flavours of wild cherry, liquorice and other spices can be detected.Firm,fruity and well balanced.
亮丽的红宝石色。带有野樱桃、甘草和其它香料的淡淡香气。单宁强劲、果味浓郁，酒体均衡。

name_en: Louis Jadot Côte de Beaune Villages
name_zh: 路易亚都世家布蒙之谷村法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
It is a young and fruity wine with aromas of red fruits and cherries. With a delicate structure and soft tannins, it will perfectly match with light dishes, wine sauce dishes or soft white cheeses.
此酒是一款年轻的带有红色水果及樱桃香味的葡萄酒。结构优雅，单宁顺滑。 与口味清淡的菜肴，葡萄酒佐料的食物以及软白乳酪搭配十分完美。

name_zh: 托刻伊-阿苏
info:
Golden yellow with ocher/honey reflections.Rich and complex, this wine shows an excellent balance between sweetness and acidity.Ideal to enjoy with desserts such as chocolate cake, or fruit tarts and pies.
金黄色，泛赭色或蜂蜜色。醇厚而复杂，甜味和酸味之间的均衡极佳。适于搭配点心，诸如：巧克力蛋糕、水果挞、派。

name_en: Château Franc Petit Figeac St. Emilion AOC
name_zh: 古堡毕特红葡萄酒
info:
此酒是圣爱美浓区之好酒，色泽圆润、带有黑加仑子及浆果味，可与任何肉类共尝。
This is definitely one of the top wines from St. Emilion, the wines is full of flavours of currant, berries. A smoky elegant wine that goes perfect with all meals.

name_zh: 维达斯珍藏艾瑞黛德起泡酒
info: 稻草黄色泽，起泡细腻，香气中带有淡淡酵母烟熏还有一丝饼干或者面包的味道。紧接着蜂蜜，果香，花香的味道。口感上果香味丰富，带有些干果的味道。这些味道均来自酵母的陈酿，口感优雅，回味愉悦。     Straw yellow in colour, with a small, fine, plentiful mousse. The opening aromas are of the aging on lees, lightly smokey, with touches of biscuit or bread, which are followed by hints of honey, fruit and flower petals. The palate is excellent, fruity and full of flavor, with dried fruits from the lees ageing, but very elegant, giving the drinker a delightful sense of abundance

name_zh: 文森乔丹桑特奈老藤红葡萄酒
info: The Santenay is a well-built wine. It has the aroma of strawberry with characteristics of chestnut and dried plum.此款圣德利佳酿结构良好。有着草莓的香气和栗子以及干梅的特质。

name_zh: 戈兰高地酒庄亚登西拉干红葡萄酒

name_en: Golan Heights Winery Yarden Pinot Noir
name_zh: 戈兰高地酒庄亚登黑皮诺干红葡萄酒
帕利斯尔庄园黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info: 深沉的宝石红色酒体，掩映出淡雅的紫色边缘。散发着樱桃、成熟李子及香草辛香。口感适中偏厚重，成熟李子与浆果口味持久，绵长。                       Dark ruby color with a slight purple rim. On the nose cherry and ripe plums, spiced with vanilla. Medium to full bodied with ripe plums and berry flavors and a long, persistent aftertaste.

name_zh: 岩石古堡
巴舍穆诺庄园勃艮第红葡萄酒
info: 清楚经典地展现了勃艮第的风味,黑色水果和恰到好处的橡木气息。                                                                         Clear classic flavour of the Burgundy and black fruit and oak flavor

name_en: Domaine de la Vougeraie Pinot Noir Terres de Famille
name_zh: 弗格雷特酒庄黛丝家族黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info: 柔顺细腻、展现出黑品诺的细致，可口结构感强具有新鲜、明亮、                                                                     Smooth and exquisite, show a black pinot is meticulous, delicious strong structure with a fresh, bright,

name_zh: 米多罗杰特设拉子红葡萄酒
info:
此酒香气和口味纯正。由黑醋栗，胡椒，甘草和坚果香料酿制。黑醋栗的味道带出爆炸的味道，配合桃子，肉桂和单宁带出柔滑和持久的口感。
Fresh vibrant lifted and pure aromas and flavours. Attractive cassis, pepper and liquorice on the nose with hint of nutty spice .The flavours explode with blackcurrant,plums and cinnamon layering over silky tannin and superb length.

name_zh: 天朗白葡萄酒
info:
此酒带有黑醋栗及热带果风味，配以清新酸度，果味香浓。
The Tahuna Sauvignon Blanc has classic gooseberry and tropical fruit characters with fresh acidity giving focus to the fruit flavours.

name_en: Gaja Promis Toscana IGT (Merlot, Syrah, Sangiovese)
name_zh: 嘉雅教区果园普罗迷斯干红葡萄酒（托斯卡内日常餐酒）
info:
Light garnet in color. Displaying a bright and fruity nose with a jammy concentration. A delightful wine balances the elegance and suppleness of Merlot and Syrah with the austerity of Sangiovese. A pleasure to drink. 亮石榴红色酒体，散发出富含果香与果酱般浓郁怡人的芳香。
此款精致美酒使桑吉奥维斯葡萄的质朴清冽与梅洛葡萄和希哈葡萄的雅致、柔和达到完美平衡，十分怡人。

name_en: Marchesi Antinori Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
name_zh: 泰纳安东尼候爵存酿经典坎蒂红葡萄酒DOCG
info:
款葡萄酒呈深石色，具有郁的水果香味；收有利的气候件使得葡萄能其品种之特色，如桑吉、丰富，是葡萄精品。而卡本妮也能体葡萄之精，彰高雅和精致品性。入口后，葡萄酒散出郁的香味，有香草和巧克力的味道，宁也因木材　度的老化而得极柔和。有物口感，余味持久。它示了能在酒瓶久放的巨大力。
An intense ruby red with aromas of blackberries and cherries under spirits along with sensation of spice and tobacco from the careful aging in barrel. On the palate the wine is very solid with notes of vanilla and chocolate, supple and soft in its tannins and accompanied by the vibrant acidity which characterizes the Sangiovese grape as a variety. The complexity and length on the finish are excellent.

name_en: Golan Heights Winery Yarden Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 戈兰高地酒庄亚登赤霞珠干红葡萄酒

name_zh: 比嘉多布罗祖莫利诺红葡萄酒
菲麗寶娜皇家珍藏香擯
宝捷庄园
吉亚尼格力亚朵酒庄巴罗洛红葡萄酒

name_en: Joseph Phelps Vineyards Innisfree Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 安妮斯菲加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
The wine contains bright, cherry-like flavors and is made from premium estate and independently grown fruit to be enjoyed over the near term.  Distinctive Napa Valley chalkiness and a depth of character that results in a long lingering finish. 
此酒含有明快而类似樱桃的芬芳气息，由上好葡萄园中独立生长的优质葡萄酿制而成，适于短期内饮用。别具特色的纳帕谷白垩土味道与深邃的特质令此酒回味绵长悠远。

name_zh: 云雾之湾苏维浓白葡萄酒
info:
Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc is reminiscent of a fresh summer fruit salsa – ripe peach, passion fruit, mango and juicy citrus – sprinkled with fresh fennel and a dash of Pastis. The palate is rich and succulent, with a zesty citrus and apple-sherbet acidity.
云雾之湾苏维浓白葡萄酒
云雾之湾苏维浓白葡萄酒让您回想起新鲜可口的夏日水果果酱－成熟的桃子，西番莲，芒果，还有可口的橘子汁，期间透出新鲜的茴香和法国香料的气息。该酒口感丰富可口，让人联想到多汁的水果，有柑桔，冰冻苹果露的酸甜。

name_zh: 云雾之湾蒂蔻寇白葡萄酒

name_en: Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 罗伯特-蒙达维纳帕谷赤霞珠红葡萄酒

name_en: La Braccesca Vino Nobile di Montepulciano DOCG
name_zh: 布兰卡葡萄园芒特普贵族红葡萄酒DOCG
info:
明亮的红宝石色，散发着香草和成熟水果的芳香。丰富饱满的香气和美好的矿物味，是该地区和年份的特点。单宁柔软、平衡呈现出葡萄完美的成熟度。闻起来有香草的细致优雅和水果味充裕的浓香，酒体均匀。
A lively ruby red in color, the Vino Nobile 2008 offers aromas which range from ripe red fruit to spice and black pepper. On the palate the wine is supple and elegant with crisp mineral notes which are characteristic of its GRAPE varieties and its terroir. Soft on the finish, it shows the excellent ripenesS which the Sangiovese (locally known as Prugnolo Gentile) grapes attained in this vintage.

name_zh: 云雾之湾夏多内白葡萄酒
info:
Cloudy Bay Chardonnay
The scent of white flowers and fresh citrus fruits – lemons, limes and grapefruit – all temptingly mingled with the savory complexity of toasted nuts and oatmeal. The silky palate shows lively citrus flavours and seamlessly integrated spicy French oak.
云雾之湾夏多内白葡萄酒
云雾之湾夏多内白葡萄酒有白色鲜花和新鲜柑桔般的水果香；诱人的柠檬、青柠、柚子的果香和可口的烤坚果，燕麦片融合在一起，其香味非常的复杂。如丝绸般顺滑的口感和如柑桔般活泼的果香与风味十足的法国橡木天衣无缝的结合在一起。

name_en: Paul Jaboulet Aîné Muscat de Beaumes de Venise "Le Chant des Griolles” AOC, 375mL
name_zh: 嘉伯乐博姆-德-威尼斯蜜思嘉天然甜白葡萄酒
info:
此葡萄酒色泽清吸引的金色，拥有白桃，木瓜和热带水果的香味。有蜂蜜和糖果般的甜味，带出新鲜丰富的口感。
Clear golden colour with attractive brightness.White peach, quince and exotic fruit aromas. Final note of honey and candied fruit.Starts out full and fresh, with final warm, rich notes of candied fruit.

name_zh: 哥伦比亚山峰哥伦比亚谷莎当妮白葡萄酒
info: Offers fruit-forward apple and pear aromas with a hint of lemon citrus leading into a balanced crispness and creaminess on the palate. The lingering finish is of lush fruit with varietal intensity indicative of Columbia Valley wines. 此酒果香丰饶，散发苹果和梨子的芳香，伴有隐隐的柠檬柑橘味道，使得口感均衡爽利，乳脂般柔滑。悠长的回味，充满馥郁的果香与该品种葡萄的紧实感，展现其哥伦比亚谷葡萄酒的风格。

name_en: Alvaro Palacios Camins del Priorat DOC 2009
name_zh: 奥瓦帕乐酒庄嘉文红葡萄酒DOC
info:
此酒拥有紫红色，带著不同的气味如水果皮，果汁和纤维。它带著不同的水果味如西瓜，桃子，梨，石榴，黑莓和葡萄配合印度种子，花卉和木材。口感较乾和新鲜，天鹅绒般柔软，给人难忘的感觉。
Dressed in dens purple of red and violet fruits from tropical landscapes. The enfolding nose with thousands of references,almost poetical. Pulp and fruit skin, juice and fiber. Watermelon ,pulm,pear and pomegranates,the whole Mediterranean bringing aromas from faraway lands. Indian seeds,exotic wood and flowers. Its taste is even enriched with blackberries and casis in a voluptuous sensation of humble grace ,firmly sustained by the characteristic minerality,more especiallly in vintages like this one ,dry and fresh. The spices and the voluminous fruit are adorned with velvet and caress our palate and inside, leaving us with a feeling of charm in our memories.

name_zh: 圣密夕琼瑶浆白葡萄酒
info:
“ The popular Chateau Ste. Michelle Gewürztraminer is a bright, refreshing
medium-dry wine with inviting aromas of lychee nuts, nectarine, jasmine and
clove spice. This Gewürztraminer is nicely balanced between fruit and the
grape’s natural crisp character, while still being lush. Try this complex wine with Thai food or any cuisine with a little “bite” to it.” “圣密夕葡萄园的格乌兹莱妮是一款色泽明亮、清新宜人的葡萄酒。此酒散发着荔枝果、油桃、茉莉和丁香的气息，在保持果味和葡萄的脆爽特征之间的平衡之外仍然保留了浓郁的口感。此款复杂的葡萄酒可以搭配泰国菜或其他需要小口食用的菜肴”。

name_zh: 利弗兰加州白葡萄酒
info:
利弗兰白葡萄酒是一款清淡爽口的白葡萄酒，味道爽净怡人。熟梨清香令其更加厚重绵长、酒香诱人。
A white wine that is both light and crisp, Rivercrest White also offers a nice, clean finish. Fragrant flavors of ripe pear add depth and give thiswine a lasting appeal.

name_en: J L Chave St Joseph Offerus Rouge
name_zh: 让·路易斯夏维奥弗露丝红葡萄酒
info: 深颜色中泛着一丝紫光。紧实，富表现力且浓厚的香气中展现出香料，黑色水果和恰到好处的橡木气息。口感强劲，是一款单宁感强，活泼而有劲道的美酒         A deep, dark color with mauve tints.　Displaying spice, black fruit and delicate oak aromas underlying a dense, expressive and intense nose.　A powerful, tannic and racy wine with a concentrated yet structured palate.

name_zh: 拉内斯城堡教皇新堡红葡萄酒
info: 深宝石红色，带有黑色浆果(黑莓，蓝莓)和香料(白胡椒)的香气。丹宁紧实，口感细腻柔滑且具肉感。             Deep ruby colour. Aromas of black berries (blackberry, blueberry), spices (white pepper). Firm tannic structure. Palate meaty, almost unctuous.

name_en: Rancho Zabaco Sonoma Heritage Vines Zinfandel
name_zh: 萨尔堡索诺玛老藤金粉黛红葡萄酒
info:
索诺马传统葡萄酒具备醇厚的黑色水果和香料的芬芳，体现出金粉黛葡萄酒的经典品质及独特性。饱满的黑色水果及辛辣芳香中还带有温和的李子及果酱味道，不仅适合大众口味，而且丰富多变，可与多种食物搭配饮用。
The Sonoma Heritage Vines delivers an abundance of black fruit and spice aromas, demonstrating
the classic and distinctive characteristics of Zinfandel. An abundance of black fruit and spice aromas with soft, plummy,and jammy flavors make this wine not only approachable, but also versatile, allowing it to be paired with a wide range of foods.

name_zh: 冷溪山黑品乐红

name_en: Helan Qingxue Jia Bei Lan Estate
name_zh: 贺兰晴雪 加贝兰 干红葡萄酒
info: 宝石红色偏砖红色，清澈；具有淡淡香草、蘑菇香气，间或皮革、湿树叶气息；入口甜美、丝滑，结构平衡，回味甜美。Ruby or brick rob, clear; hints of vanilla, black mushroom, and leather, wet bush; sweetish and silky in the mouth, harmonious and good balance.

name_zh: 赫斯精选蒙特里莎当妮白葡萄酒
info:
Classic tropical themes of ripe cut pineapple, guava, and lemon zest give the aroma a lively life toward a similar flavour profile of ripe pear, peach, and pineapple on the palate. The body is medium in intensity. The perfect companion with food, especially in the crisp, cleansing fruit driven finish. 
经典热带成熟菠萝，番石榴，柠檬香味，成熟蜜梨，蜜桃，菠萝香口感。 中度酒体，适宜搭配食物饮用，余味呈爽脆且清新的果味。

name_zh: 帝宝 格兰蒂 珍藏 香槟
info: 金黄色泽，花香浓郁，带有淡淡的核类水果的果香，例如桃子和杏儿。结构精致，香气浓郁，层次复杂，回味中有一丝黄李的果香。Gold yellow. Floral perfumes with hints of stone fruits such as peach and apricot. Fine, intense and complex with a touch of yellow plum on the finish.

name_zh: 小大宝圣于连区副牌
info: 酒性开放自然，多果味；酒体丰满，细腻，协调；酒香馥郁而多层次。小大宝为中度酒体干红葡萄酒，具有樱桃果实、香草、黑醋栗和香料橡木气味。单宁柔和而圆润，充满李子、干枣、黑醋栗口感，余韵更有浓郁的香草橡木和果实香味                                                             More fruit; Full-bodied, exquisite and coordination; Smell fragrant and multi-level.  medium bodied dry red wine, cherry fruit, vanilla oak, cassis and spices smell. Soft and round tannins, full of plum, dried dates, blackcurrant palate, finish more intense aromas of vanilla oak and fruit fragrance

name_zh: 思库瓦山庄黑标赤霞珠红

name_en: Robert Gilliard Sion Dole des Monts
name_zh: 罗伯特-吉尔山坡干红葡萄酒
埃思图内尔古砾干红葡萄酒2006
info: La Goulee tends to be a well-made Medoc meant to be consumed during its first 5-6 years of life. The 2006 exhibits attractive chocolaty, berry fruit intermixed with underlying earth tones. Firm tannin gives it a slight austerity, but it possesses very good depth and ripeness as well as a savory texture.

name_zh: 皇家托卡伊酒庄贵腐埃苏甜白（500毫升）
info:
An amazing wine that is a benchmark for its class. Pure scents of dried apricot, citrus, jasmine and melon are coated with Asian spices, while the mouth is honeyed but nuanced, with flavors of dried spices, apricot marmalade and citrus fruits. What sets this wine apart is its mouthwatering acidity. Serve with dessert, cheese or as a digestive, with cigars or petit fours. 这款令人惊叹的葡萄酒在同等级别中出类拔萃。散发着干杏，柑橘，茉莉花和蜜瓜的芳香，隐约含有丝丝亚洲香料的芬芳，入口饱含蜂蜜的香甜，并伴有些许干香料，杏子酱和橘类水果香味。更独特的是该酒酸度怡人，令人口齿生津。
适宜搭配甜品，芝士或配以雪茄。

name_en: Chateau Clarke Baron Edmond de Rothschild
name_zh: 克拉克城堡里斯塔克美铎法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Dense and dark color, with fine ripe fruit with black current, raspberry aromas. The fruit is associated with a light spicy a smoky note (clove, and a subtle wood with mocha and vanilla). This 2001 shows a lot of elegance and complexity on the nose. Very supple attack palate, followed by a full mid-palate. The tannins are fine, dense and ripe, with good acidity to balance.
酒体丰腴，色泽幽深，散发着成熟的黑加仑和覆盆子的香气。夹杂有淡淡的烟草辛香(丁香混合着些许木质味，伴有香草摩卡咖啡的气息）。2001这个年份充分展现了此款酒幽雅、丰饶复杂的味道，入口柔顺，接以饱满圆润的味蕾感觉。单宁醇厚润滑，酸度也恰倒好处。

name_zh: 银色高地阙歌干红
info:
With 12 months of aging in French oak, this vintage is more robust as compared to 2007. Focused and structured with layers of black fruits and persistent tannins; bottle aging for 6 months encouraged. Limited production of 3,100 bottles.
这款酒在法国橡木桶陈酿时间长达12个月。它有着复杂浓郁的香气，黑樱桃和辛香气息纷至沓来。酒体优雅，单宁柔顺，余味悠长，较2007年份更富有活力。刻意限制产量，今年仅酿造10000瓶。

name_zh: 纽顿夏多内百葡萄酒
info:
Newton Red Label Chardonnay
Enticing and delicate notes of honeysuckle, white nectarine and peach Stone fruit flavors combine with ripe melon and fig. A well-balanced wine with a velvety mouth feel which persists throughout the lingering and refreshing finish.
纽顿夏多内百葡萄酒
该款夏多内白葡萄酒有诱人的金银花细腻的香味，白色油桃，香草以及新鲜的烤面包的味道融合在一起；核果与成熟的瓜果，无花果的味道交相辉映；这款结构平衡的夏多内白葡萄酒柔和的口感贯穿始终；回味悠长，清新。

name_zh: 勒桦酒庄勃根蒂法定产区红葡萄酒
info:
Clear light red color, with a brick red hue. The nose has pleasing aromas of strawberries, tobacco and earth. The palate shows sour cherries and tobacco, with high astringency. Medium length with some tannin.  
清澈的砖红色酒体，带有草莓，烟草和泥土的芳香。口感中充满着浓郁的酸樱桃和烟草味。余味和丹宁中长。

name_en: Henri Bourgeois Clos Henri Pinot Noir
name_zh: 亨利葡萄园马尔波罗黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
Expressing generous delicate plum and cherry aromas, with a hint of cinnamon and clove on the nose. Pleasant flinty notes, it’s roundness in the mouth provoques delicious sensations.
 此酒散发出浓郁而精致的洋李与樱桃的芳香，伴有些许肉桂与丁香的芬芳。口感强劲而饱满，带来悦人的美味享受。

name_zh: 佳得美庄园
孔斯特艺术家珍藏黑皮诺红葡萄酒

name_en: Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Fume Blanc
name_zh: 罗伯特蒙大维纳帕谷长相思白

name_en: Masi Costasera Amarone della Valpolicella Classico DOCG
name_zh: 马西阿马罗内经典海岸区果园红葡萄酒
info:
Deep ruby red colour with violet tinges to the edges. Clean, very powerful and complex on the nose with good alcoholic backbone amid the sweet aromas of dried prunes and raisins. Soft and dry on the palate with typical baked cherry flavours mixed with hints of cocoa and cinnamon. Attractively long finishing and full-bodied with soft tannins.
Food Suggestion:
Amarone is a full-bodied wine for grilled or roasted red meats, game, and strong tasty cheeses, such as parmesan. 
Generally considered a wine for meditation, it is a great after dinner wine. Recommended drinking temperature 20°C. 深宝石红色泽，边缘带有一抹紫红色。干净、非常有力且复杂的气息，良好的酒精感支撑着整个酒体，在其中还能闻到梅子干和葡萄干的甜美香气。在口感上柔软而干烈，带有典型的烤樱桃味，并伴有一丝可可豆和肉桂的味道。非常诱人、持久的回味，酒体饱满，单宁柔和。
配餐建议：
阿马罗内的饱满酒体适合搭配烧烤类的红肉、野味和口感强烈的芝士，例如帕马森干酪。此酒令人遐想连篇，餐后饮用佳。建议饮用温度：20°C。

name_en: Cakebread Cellars Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc
name_zh: 卡布瑞酒窖白苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
a fresh, rich, vivacious white wine with bright grapefruit, lime, melon and hay aromas and concentrated kiwi, citrus and green apple flavors. Its refreshingly flinty, mineral-y finish makes it a mouthwatering apèritif wine as well as a fine accompaniment to a wide range of seafood, poultry, vegetarian and salad dishes. It will provide great drinking pleasure.
此白苏维翁是一款清新馥郁而动人的白葡萄酒，伴随有优质葡萄，酸橙，蜜瓜和干草的芳香，以及浓缩奇异果，柑橘和青苹果的风味。其坚硬如矿物般的口感余味使人清爽振奋，可用作开胃的餐前酒，也可搭配大部分海鲜家禽素食菜肴和沙拉盘。

name_zh: 爱德森黑比诺红葡萄酒
info: "Vivid red.  High-pitched aromas of red currant and cherry, with complicating Asian spice and floral nuances.  Juicy and light on its feet, offering energetic red fruit and rose pastille flavors complemented by a touch of black tea.  Finishes bright and long, with lingering spiciness and no obvious tannins." - Stephen Tanzer佳酿酒色呈亮红色，高调的酒香中有着红醋栗和樱桃以及复杂的亚洲香料和花朵的精致香味。佳酿果汁味浓并且轻盈（不解这里的FEET的意思，请确认一下，谢谢！），有着活力四射的红果味和玫瑰含片的味道，而一抹红茶味让此种口味更加完美。余韵令人愉悦并且绵长，有着久久不愿离去的香辣和不明显的单宁味。——史蒂芬·丹泽尔。

name_en: Stag’s LeapWine Cellars Wsrren Winiarski Karia Chardonnary
name_zh: 鹿跃酒庄嘉瑞莎当妮白葡萄酒
info:
A cornucopia of aromas emerges from this wine, with apple, white peach and orange blossom joining subtle layers of roasted almond and vanilla cream. Similar flavors are enjoyed on the palate with additional citrus notes. A delicate honey tone is supported by bright acidity all the way through the toasty brioche finish. 
Pair with butternut squash ravioli with sage brown butter, shrimp scampi, or a pecan-crusted roast loin of pork. 
此酒带有丰富的果香，透着苹果，白桃和香橙花的气息并伴随着烘烤杏仁以及香草巧克力的味道，柑橘的甜味萦绕在口中。宜人的酸度中伴随着精致的蜂蜜气息，余味带有烘烤奶油蛋卷的风味，适合搭配意式南瓜蒸饺蘸黄油，鲜虾奶油扁面条或各式烤肉。

name_en: J. Christopher Pinot Noir, Willamette Valley
name_zh: 简西酒庄黑皮诺红葡萄酒
info:
On the nose, the Willamette Valley Pinot Noir presents bright, focused aromas of black cherries, blackberries, toast, and a light wafting scent of tobacco. It follows through with dark fruit and smoky black cherries on the palate, good richness, a silky, seductive texture, and a sweet, lingering finish. Supported by fine structure, the wine leaves an overall impression of focus, purity and elegance.
威拉米特黑皮诺葡萄酒香气前段明快干净，集中呈现出黑樱桃，黑莓，烘烤和一丝飘逸的烟草味。中段黑色水果和烟熏黑樱桃味更加集中，风味复杂，丝质魅惑的单宁质地，醇美萦绕的余味。精致的酒体结构支撑，总体印象为集中，果味和优雅

name_zh: 费童酒庄贡达斯红

Nose: Complex, aromas of very ripe sour cherries, light spices and black pepper.

色泽：明亮的深红石榴色

口感：单宁顺滑，酒体饱满丰富而回味较长，有成熟的浆果味和辛辣感。

这款风味浓郁的葡萄酒入口有浓郁的奶油焦糖，奶油糖果，新鲜的香草豆的芬芳，以及烤苹果和杏仁的味道；同时白桃和焦糖的气息中透出幽幽的蜂蜜的甘美，将这款酒体饱满，口感平衡的葡萄酒引向如奶油般浓郁的回味。

name_en: Ferrari Carano Fumé Blanc, Sonoma County
name_zh: 法拉力卡诺富美白
info:
Ferrari-Carano's 2011 Fumé Blanc has aromas of lime, kiwi, citrus, melon and a touch of grass complemented by flavors of grapefruit, lemon and lime with a mango and guava finish.
2011年富美白展现出浓郁奔放的青柠、猕猴桃、柑橘、蜜瓜和青草的芳香；入口充满西柚、柠檬和青柠的风味；回味中带有芒果和番石榴的味道。

Pale gold in colour with a steady flow of fine and persistent bubbles.
AROMA
Delicate yet complex, fresh and well-balanced with hints of citrus and white fruits.
TASTE
Well defined, subtly rounded with expressive flavours. The fruit progressively emerges to reveal a finely balanced champagne displaying great length on the finish
外观 - 酒体呈现浅金色，稳定持续的细洁气泡；

info:

With notes of demi-glace and roasting pan juices, beneath scents of pipe tobacco, vanilla and pencil shavings oak - much more than just a simple varietal offering. The palate is full-bodied, refined and taut showing dark, black conserve fruit flavors with plum notes to the fore. name_en: Donnafugata Ben Rye Passito di Pantelleria 375mL
name_zh: 多娜佳塔酒园风之子甜白葡萄酒（375mL）
info:
The wine displays its personality and depth initially with its bright amber yellow color. With intense notes of apricots and peaches, the bouquet offers sweet sensations of dried figs, honey, herbs and mineral notes. The wine is impressive on the palate with complexity and a prolonged finish. 
Perfect with herbed cheeses, foie gras and dried fruits.

 此款佳酿首先以明亮的琥珀黄色的外观体现出了她的个性与深度。散发着丰饶的杏仁和桃子香味，蕴涵着干无花果、蜂蜜、草本植物及矿物质的香甜口感。她浓郁复杂的口感融合着甜美芳香和轻柔的质感令人沉醉，回味持久绵长。

name_zh: 桃乐丝玛斯拉普拉纳特级王冠干红
info:
Beautiful, very dark ruby red colour with a soft mahogany rim. Exquisite aroma, traditional with this estate, reminiscent of bilberry and cherry jam, enhanced by toasted notes acquired through ageing in oak. The palate reveals an extraordinary dimension, with soft, juicy tannins that hold promise for the wine's future evolution. A perfect partner for the finest meat and game dishes.
美丽的深宝石红色，边缘呈红褐色。香气精致而传统，橡木桶中陈年带来的烤面包香增添了越桔和樱桃酱的香气。口感特别丰富，单宁柔滑而鲜美，使这款酒有极好的陈年能力野味和红肉类菜肴。最适合搭配肉食和野味。

info:
This wine is well concentrated with ripe fruit and a good length, whilst maintaining the finesse and delicate tannins of Margaux. 
 It is an easier wine to approach than the Grand Vin and will drink sooner but has the appealing body and structure of a well-made wine, which will keep for at least 10 years.
此款酒有着浓郁的成熟果香，以及持久的口感，丹宁也有玛歌酒独特的细致与精巧。与一些高档产区的酒相比更为易饮，并且酒体吸引质地良好，最好的保存期现是10年。

name_en: Helan Qingxue Jia Bei Lan Reserve
name_zh: 贺兰晴雪 加贝兰珍藏级干红葡萄酒
info: 非常清新干净的香气，香草，黑醋栗，绿色灯笼椒香气，像丝绸般柔软，中等酒体，平衡和谐，收尾干净愉悦。Very clear, fresh nose, vanilla, cassis and green bell pepper aromas, Soft and silky in the mouth, medium light body, good balance and harmonious, with pleasant and clean finish.

name_zh: 褒莱夫人宝拉系列白苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
This fresh, attractive and vigorous Sauvignon Blanc shows intense aromas of yellow grapefruit, lime and passion fruit, that are well integrated with gooseberry and herbal notes.
On the palate is a wine great freshness and very long very long after taste. 这是一款新鲜而具有迷人活力的白苏维翁葡萄酒，具有黄色西柚、柠檬和热情果的强烈香气，并综合了醋栗和草本的味道。
口感上尝起来具有非好新鲜感，以长久的回味收尾。

name_en: Leeuwin Estate Art Series Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 澳大利亚露纹酒园加本力苏维翁干红葡萄酒

The color is intense ruby red with garnet tints. The bouquet has lifted and intense blackberry, blackcurrant and mulberry fruits, with the enhancement of cedary French oak for complexity, intermingled with spice and dark chocolate. The palate shows a full bodied wine with intense blackberry and blackcurrant fruit with hints of mocha and chocolate that round off the complex flavors. This wine has great fruit length with smooth and silky tannins that provide a soft but lingering finish.
深暗红色酒体。散发着黑莓，黑醋栗及桑葚的浓郁芳香，加之雪松和法国橡木气息的点缀，使其更富有复杂性，并巧妙的融入了香料与黑巧克力的气息。在淡薄的摩卡和巧克力口味的衬托下，黑莓和黑醋栗的口感更为显著而浓厚，使酒体丰腴且复杂。果味丰富，丹宁圆润、柔滑，口感虽温柔但回味持久悠长。

name_zh: 布莱伊达酒庄乌瑟娄园巴贝拉红葡萄酒
酩悅香檳
info: Moët Impérial is the House’s iconic champagne. Created in 1869, it embodies the unique Moët & Chandon style. A style that distinguishes itself by its bright fruitiness, its seductive palate and its elegant maturity.                                                                 作为酩悦香槟品牌的旗舰系列，首批酩悦香槟于1869年问世，体现了该品牌最引以为荣的标志性风格：欢欣明快的果香，鲜活诱人的口感，以及优雅成熟的气质诠释了酩悦香槟令人愉悦的无限魅力。

name_zh: 萨兰亭霞多丽白葡萄酒
info:
Deep gold colour, with light green tints.Aromas of pears and red apples combine with honey and vanilla from the oak.Long and lingering aftertaste.Excellent for light pasta and grilled fish.
泛绿的深金色。梨和红苹果香气与来自橡木的蜂蜜和香草香气结合在一起。余味悠长。适于搭配清淡的面条以及烤鱼。

name_zh: 沙朗设拉子红葡萄酒
info:
阿德莱德山丘证明了它能做出扣人心弦的施赫红葡萄酒。他们仔细的选用低产量橡木桶。从而另葡萄酒入口更清香， 麦克尔斯菲尔德地区的土壤结构非常丰厚。演泽现代的澳大利亚施赫葡萄。
The blend component from the warmer sub-area of Macclesfield gives structure and richness, whilst Balhannah contributes spiciness and perfume.A vibrant, modern interpretation of Australian Shiraz.

name_zh: 五克拉酒庄奥拉达西拉干红葡萄酒
info:
The 2008 O’Riada Shiraz is made from fruit selected from four vineyards around the villages of Murrumbateman and Hall. The winemaking included the use of pre-ferment maceration, whole bunches, warm extended ferments, 6% co-fermented Viognier and twelve months maturation in French oak, 30% new. The warmth of the 2008 vintage shines through with a rich aroma of blackberry, dark cherry, rose petal and spice; wonderfully fragrant with a silky, medium bodied palate. Drink now after decanting or cellar for five to ten years.
Rated : 94 Points - Campbell Mattinson, The Wine Front, July 21, 2009
Robert Parker 92 points  

2008年份这支奥拉达西拉子（Shiraz）是精选自穆任百特曼（Murrumbateman）周围四个葡萄园的葡萄。发酵前先整串浸渍，再在常/高温下发酵，并会在其中加入6%的维欧尼耶（Viognier）葡萄，最后在30%的法国新橡木桶中醇化12个月。可以藉由黑莓，黑樱桃，玫瑰花和香料等多种香气探知到08年份温暖的气候条件。入口芬芳，酒体中度，质地柔滑。建议醒酒后饮用，或者珍藏5-10年再享用。
《葡萄酒前沿》（The Wine Front）坎贝尔马丁森（Campbell Mattinson）：94分（2009年6月）               罗伯特帕克（Robert Parker）：92分

name_zh: 乔万尼酒庄赛伦佳巴罗洛红葡萄酒
格陵諾克溪谷酒莊愛麗絲園設拉子紅葡萄酒
格陵諾克溪谷酒莊愛麗絲園設拉子紅葡萄酒
约翰﹒杜瓦尔恩蒂西拉
info:
Dense ruby purple.Youthful blackberry, blueberry fruit complexed with savoury French oak.Rich and generous with good concentration of dark fruit. The tannins provide a good frame for the wine but are fine, ripe and balanced. The structure has restrained power but remains elegant and finishes with excellent fruit intensity.
深宝石红色。带有活泼的黑莓及蓝莓的气味，美妙的法国橡木气息使香气更显层次。口感丰润雅致，充满着浓郁的深色水果味。单宁为这款酒创造了良好的结构，精致、细腻、成熟而均衡。酒体结构强劲却不失雅致，余味中果味精妙浓郁。

name_en: Domaine de la Vougeraie Gevrey Chambertin
name_zh: 弗格雷特酒庄杰弗瑞香贝天红葡萄酒
info: 不同的香味来源红色和深色浆果,是朴实的,结构感强具有新鲜、明亮、柔软和详细的口味相对优质的单宁支撑,而以线性的,精力充沛的和持久的。这是真的很漂亮,值得品尝。                                                                                         A completely different nose of red and dark berry fruit that is earthy, sauvage and mildly rustic is followed by fresh, bright, supple and detailed flavors underpinned by relatively fine tannins that culminate in a linear, sappy and persistent finish. This is really quite pretty and worth a look.

name_zh: 泰亭哲高级桃红绝干香槟
info: 这款香槟酒为亮粉色，气泡细腻持久。酒香浓郁，新鲜、活泼。散发着红色水果的香气（犹如鲜榨野覆盆子、樱桃、黑醋栗等果汁的清香）。天鹅绒般的细致同新鲜水果的味道完美均衡的合为一体。总体上讲这是一款结构均衡、朝气蓬勃的香槟酒。可作为晚餐用酒。同水果甜品（如水果挞、水果沙拉等）搭配饮用口味最佳。 Brilliant pink, is shimmering and intense. The bubbles are fine and the mousse persistent.Satisfyingly intense, is both fresh and young. It gives off aromas of red fruit (freshly crushed wild raspberry, cherry and blackcurrant).This is a velvety wine of fine balance, and body a subtle wine with flavours of fresh fruit.In all, a very pleasing wine of balance and youth.  A wine for both early and late evening.A delicious accompaniment to fruit desserts (fruit tart, fruit salad).

name_zh: 迈克基阿罗酒庄巴罗洛托妮诺图红葡萄酒
info:
Lots of smoke, leather and blackberry aromas. Medium to full-bodied, with ripe tannins and a rounded finish. A fine wine!
蕴含丰富的烟熏、皮革与黑莓芬芳。酒体适中偏厚重，单宁成熟，回味圆润。堪称一款精致的上等佳酿。

name_zh: 佳乐美酒庄多伦特白葡萄酒
info:
The typical pale golden color, characteristic of the wine variety. Floral and fresh aromas, resembling honeysuckle, roses, lemon and grapefruit. Apricot and other citric notes are present in this Torrontes. In the mouth , this wine is intense and well balanced, with an attractive final acidity, which makes it even fresher.
此酒呈典型的淡金黄色，完美展现了酿制葡萄的特征。散发着托伦特葡萄所带有的花香和清新果香：金银花，玫瑰，柠檬，柚子，杏和柑橘的气息。口感浓郁，平衡度佳，诱人酸度使这款葡萄酒感觉更加清爽。

name_zh: 凯歌皇牌香槟
info:
First, Yellow Label looks beautiful: golden-yellow, with a foaming necklace of tiny bubbles. Next it is so pleasing to the nose: initially reminiscent of white fruits and raisins, then of vanilla and later of brioche. Note the fine balance between the fruity aromas coming from the grape varieties and the toasty aromas following the ageing in the bottle. The first sip delivers all the freshness and forcefulness so typical of Yellow Label with a symphony of fruit tastes following on. Here is a true member of the powerful Brut family, well structured, admirably vinous. The lingering aromas echo and re-echo, with each fruit or spice note distinct.                                                                                                            首先，凯歌皇牌香槟看上去非常美丽: 金黄色，细小的泡沫组成的气泡链。其次是它惹人的味道: 最初是白色水果和树脂的气味，然后是香草的气味，最后是奶油蛋糕的味道。果香之间的完美协调来自葡萄的品种，酒瓶中的陈酿过程带来烤面包的香味。
初尝体现出新鲜和强劲，然后是皇牌香槟和谐的果味。它是真正的强劲Brut 家族成员，结构充实丰厚、上等的葡萄酒。夹带每种水果或香料气味的芳香久弥不散。
皇牌香槟设法协调两种相反的因素 – 强劲和精致 – 使它们保持完美的和谐状态。这种和谐使其成为开胃酒的理想选择，像香槟一样随餐享用。

name_zh: 嘉雅朗格山摩尔式堡法定产区干红葡萄酒
info: On the nose this wine begins to reveal its quality. Roasted black fruits, and roasted herbs, with complex notes of cloves and finely tanned leather. It is smooth and richly textured, with an approachable tannic backbone and correct acidity. A finely poised structure, graceful and stylish, almost gliding across the palate. Beautiful flavours.  诱人的芬芳足以显示其卓越的品质，深色水果的烘烤香，伴随着烤香草与复杂而精致的丁香、皮革气息。酒体柔滑，层次丰富，单宁结实而柔和，酸度恰倒好处。结构平衡，酒质优雅醇美，品质非凡。

name_zh: 摩卡佳塔酒庄蔻尔芭芭罗斯红葡萄酒
嘉雅歌玛达果园曼歌干红葡萄酒（托斯卡纳地方餐酒）
info: Deep red color. Lush Merlot fruit and spicy Cabernet aromas. Black currants with a touch of fresh mint, scented with a hint of coffee. The mouthfeel is fleshy, round, yet elegant and silky in texture.  此酒呈深红色泽，散发出梅洛葡萄的甜美和加本利葡萄的香料气息。黑醋栗的香气中透出一缕清新的薄荷味，伴有些许咖啡气息。口感饱满圆润，带着如丝般高雅的质感。

name_en: Allegrini Amarone della Valpolicella Classico DOCG
name_zh: 阿勒格里尼酒莊經典阿馬羅內紅葡萄酒
塞拉图酒庄松切拉图巴罗洛红葡萄酒
塞勒托酒庄巴布图巴罗洛红葡萄酒

name_en: Domaine Vougeraie Pommard Les Petits Noizons
name_zh: 弗格雷特酒庄波玛小诺松红葡萄酒
info: 亮紫红色，带有腌制樱桃、矿物、烟肉等香味，优雅浓郁，单宁柔滑怡人，入口优雅而多汁                            Bright purple, with pickled cherry, minerals, such as bacon fragrance, elegant and rich, silky tannins pleasantly, entrance is elegant and juicy

name_zh: 曼达岬赤霞珠红葡萄酒
info:
Cape Mentelle Cabernet Sauvignon
Rich blackcurrant and mulberry fruit with hints of sweet paprika, lavender, dark chocolate and subtle vanillin oak. The wine is full-bodied with rich, bold fruit flavours including black cherry and currants, dried tobacco and a slightly mocha oak influence. 
曼达岬赤霞珠红葡萄酒
浓郁的黑加仑和桑葚的果香中透出甘美的红辣椒，熏衣草，黑巧克力以及幽幽的橡木赋予的香草的芳香。酒体饱满，口感丰富馥郁，有黑樱桃，加仑子，干烟草，以及微微的慕哈咖啡的的味道

name_zh: 布莱伊达酒庄乌瑟娄园巴贝拉红葡萄酒
小飞卓堡红葡萄酒
info: The second wine of Figeac. It has the main characteristics of the Grand Wine in a more accessible version. A very attractive wine with finesse, and offering elegance and complexity

name_zh: 奥得罗酒庄巴罗洛经典干红葡萄酒
info: “这款收敛的红酒混合了烟草，樱桃和灌木丛的味道，尽管有着坚实的单宁，但是她仍然具有柔和而黏着并且持久的口感。”"This lean, angular Barolo is tightly wound, with cherry, tobacco and underbrush notes. Though firmly tannic, this is balanced and long, in a chewy, sinewy style."

name_zh: 思福酒园纳柏谷梅洛干红葡萄酒
info:
Rich purple color. Lush, focused flavor and aromas of bright cherries, strawberry, red and black plums, cranberry and violets. An elegant with strength firm tannins.
Poultry, pork and meat dishes. Carmelized onions, roasted garlic and mushrooms are also pleasant companions.
 深紫色酒体，散发出丰腴而浓郁的樱桃、草莓、红/黑洋李、酸果蔓与紫罗兰的芬芳。是一款单宁强劲持久的雅致佳酿。
可搭配禽类、猪肉等荤菜。同时也是洋葱、烤蒜和蘑菇的理想搭配。

name_zh: 克雷托酒庄阿斯里图芭芭罗斯红葡萄酒
睦纱古堡红葡萄酒
info:
Rich, warm deep cherry red
Smoky nose full of spice and fruits
Berry fruits – cherries, redcurrants, pomegranates and Christmas spices of cinnamon and nutmeg. Ripe sweet fruit with a smoky edge. Good acidity with good tannin levels result in a wine of classic structure with long ageing potential.
浓郁热情的樱桃红色
烟熏味中透露着浓烈的异域香料和水果芳香
浆果味有樱桃、红醋栗、石榴以及圣诞节蛋糕般的肉桂和豆蔻味。
口感成熟甜美带有一点熏烤味。酸度优秀，恰到好处的单宁水平为葡萄酒带来经典的骨架也预示了优异的陈化潜能

name_en: Chateau de Pibarnon Rouge, Bandol AOC
name_zh: 碧浓古堡红葡萄酒
info:
Dense wine, with a dark almost purple. 
When young, this vintage is a little nervous in mouth but also straight
and elegant, full bodied
and powerfull, with a particularly velvety and slightly salty finish.
黑色水果，可可，复杂的辛香料
碧浓田红葡萄酒2005年份是个很好的平衡及优雅的酒。口感圆润而细致，有丝滑般的柔顺感，收口非常新鲜而且果香萦绕

name_zh: 巴斯克苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
This wine is characterized by its soft yellow colour with green highlights. The nose expresses a complex
range of aromas such as lime, white peach, prickly pear, pineapple, green apple, lychee and mango.
One finds select vegetal notes of chives and boxwood. The palate is consistent, lively and fresh with
good volume and a remarkable persistence. To enjoy the wine fully, it should be drunk young, within
two years. While it is a great appetizer, all of its potential can be tapped with shellfish and salads. It
should be served very cold at between 10-12ºC. 酒色为柔和的黄色并伴有绿色光泽。闻上去有酸橙，白桃，仙人掌梨，凤梨，青苹果，荔枝和芒果的植物综合果香，口味清新持久生动。此款酒较为年轻，2年之内，应即时饮用。这是一款很出色的开胃酒，可与贝壳类和色拉搭配。
请于10—12度之间保存。

name_zh: 百发酒庄法尔赛黑皮诺干红葡萄酒
info:
The density of the bouquet leaves you in no doubt this is an imperious pinot, the palate fully living up to the message from the bouquet, with layer upon layer of dark fruits playing tag with the ripe tannins that provide texture and structure on the long finish.

此款酒的香气无疑向您传达出这是支不可错过的上佳黑皮诺（Pinot）葡萄酒，一入口，黑色水果带有的层层风味不断袭来，成熟的单宁赋予了其细腻柔滑的质地，结构扎实，回味悠长。

name_zh: 吉佳乐世家教皇新堡法定产区红葡萄酒
variety:
de old Grenache/85% 
de Syrah/5%
de Mourvèdre/5%  
others/5%
info:
Deep, dark red color. Spices and mature red fruits on the nose. Tannins are round with powerful complexity. A rich, unctuous wine with notes of mature plums, hazelnuts and red fruit.
Overall, a very rich wine full of harmony and balance.
 此酒呈深暗的红色。富含辛香及成熟的红色水果味。丹宁圆润，口感强劲而复杂。酒体丰腴而醇厚，伴有成熟的李子，榛果和红色水果香气。

总而言之，是一款非常丰润且和谐的葡萄酒。

name_zh: 亚历山卓酒庄圣乔万尼图巴罗洛红葡萄酒
酩悅玫瑰香檳
info: Rosé Impérial is a spontaneous and radiant champagne that tempts into seduction. A glamorous expression of the Moët & Chandon style. A style that distinguishes itself by its bright fruitiness, its seductive palate and its elegant maturity.                                                                                                                                                        酩悦粉红香槟拥有自然绚目的光彩，流露出的粉红魅惑让人无法抗拒，诠释着酩悦的无穷魅力。欢欣明快的果香，鲜活诱人的口感，彰显酩悦粉红香槟优雅成熟、卓然不凡的气质。

name_en: Jim Barry The McRae Wood Shiraz, Clare Valley
name_zh: 金百利马克瑞设拉子红葡萄酒
info:
Inky, deep red and purple hues.
Ripe red/black fruit aromas, floral notes, strawberries, black cherry, raspberry, sweet
fruity oak, cherry and black pepper.
The palate is rich and concentrated, with plummy, liquorice, cherry, blackberry and some cherry, toasty oak. The tannins are finely grained and well integrated.
墨汁深红色带紫色光晕，
成熟的红色和黑色水果芳香以及花香，草莓、黑樱桃、覆盆子果味并带有甜美的橡木味和黑胡椒味
口感饱满集中，李子、甘草、樱桃、黑莓和樱桃及烘烤橡木味不绝于味，单宁缜密细致。

name_zh: 狩猎神加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
Sensuous aromas of rich, dark chocolate, black cherries, and espresso immediately rise from the glass. As the wine opens, look for more subtle notes of violets, nutmeg, and truffles. The aromas carry over to the palate with additional flavors of cassis, orange peel, and clove. This medium to full-bodied wine has fine grained and smooth pebbly tannins.
Try this wine with any fine cut of steak and you will be delighted. 此酒带有浓郁诱人的黑巧克力，黑莓以及意式咖啡的香气。开瓶饮用后会散发出更多的紫色水果香气，如肉豆蔻，松露的香气。黑加仑，橘子酱以及丁香的风味萦绕口中。酒体中等至饱满，单宁细腻柔滑。适合搭配各式牛排，猪排，相信您一定会喜欢。

name_zh: 雅克森特酿735号香槟
info: "The NV Brut Cuvee No735 is a gorgeous, fleshy wine laced with radiant fruit. Lemon, white flowers, spices and crushed rocks are some of the notes that inform this deep, satisfying Champagne. A round, creamy finish wraps things up in style. The 735 got better and better over time, always a good sign. The 735 is 72% 2007 juice, 47% Chardonnay, 33% Pinot Noir and 20% Meunier. It is a bit richer, rounder and more immediate than the 734, not a bad thing for a wine meant to be enjoyed on the young side. This bottle was disgorged in the first quarter, 2011." - WA"735号无年份干香槟是一款充满了活力果味的丰满华美佳酿。这款极具深度，让人满意的香槟充满了柠檬、白花、香料和压碎的岩石味。圆润、充满了奶油香的余韵是那么的有風格。现在735号香槟随着时间的流逝变的越来越好，这是一个好的徵兆。735号香槟由72%的2007年葡萄汁、47%的霞多丽，20%的莫尼混合而成。和734号香槟相比，她更加浓厚、圆润也更加的早熟，但这对一款很多時在年輕時就被品鉴的佳酿来说，这并不是一件坏事。此瓶佳酿在2011年的第一季度除渣。" - WA

name_zh: 金玫瑰庄园
班尼杜克庄园
约瑟夫菲尔普斯酒园纳柏谷加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
The dark ruby-colored  Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon resembles a classic Bordeaux both in aromatics and flavor. A rich bouquet of cinnamon, spice, licorice, graphite and caramel are followed by integrated layers of cherry, currant, fresh cream and balanced, sweet tannin, all of which contribute to a youthful, bright, multi-layered wine.
这款深红宝石色泽的纳柏谷加本力，无论酒香还是风味，都与经典的波尔多佳酿十分相似。散发浓郁的肉蔻，香料，甘草和石墨及焦糖的芬芳气息，伴有樱桃，黑醋栗与新鲜奶油等层层绽放的美好风味，单宁甜美均衡，可谓一款年轻奔放，清新明快，层次分明的上好葡萄酒。

name_zh: 宝尚父子圣乔治之夜红葡萄酒
info:
Intense aromas of berry fruit and spice. Rich, tannic and well structured, this wine develops additional roundness after several years in bottle. Good ageing potential.
香气浓郁充满浆果味和辛辣味。酒体饱满，单宁结实，结构感强，是一款需要多年瓶储，假以时日能有更多惊喜的酒，陈化潜力优秀

name_zh: 黛伦堡枯藤西拉红葡萄酒
info: The heady aroma is both powerful and pretty with notes of fennel, purple flowers and blossom mingling with ripe, varietal purple fruits and black pepper.The palate opens with anise, black pepper, graphite and restrained dark cherries before it gives way to seductive mulberry, plum, licorice and spice. It has great power, depth and length with very vibrant, gritty fruit tannins providing immense structure. Notes of anise and spice linger for a long time after the last sip.

name_zh: 巴斯克夏多内白葡萄酒
info:
Bright yellow robe with slight golden sparks. The nose boasts a true explosion of melon, banana,
grapefruit and more exotic fruit with hazelnut notes. The mouth is savory, fresh, and pleasing, with a
nice fruity character, good volume and a long finish.
A Chardonnay to drink while still young, as an aperitif or to pair with oysters, white meats, fish or
cheese. Best served cold between 10º and 12ºC. 
明亮的黄色酒体带着些许金黄色的气泡。闻上去有明显的西瓜，香蕉和柚子以及榛子的味道。果味十足，口感上佳，清新，愉悦。回味持久。
莎当尼适合在其年轻的时候饮用，作为一款开胃酒，搭配牡蛎，白肉，鱼肉或者奶酪。
最佳冷藏温度为10到12度。

name_zh: 孔斯特艺术家酒庄黑皮诺红葡萄酒
杜哈磨坊波亚克法定产区红葡萄酒
info:
Beautiful garnet-red colour.
On the palate the wine is supple, round and flavour some with a good structure that will enable it to
fully open out in 5 years time.
酒体呈美丽的紫红色。
口感柔和圆润，结构出色，陈放5年以上味道会完全打开。

name_en: Il Poggione Vigna Paganelli Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
name_zh: 帕吉奧尼酒莊帕加里尼單一園珍藏級布魯內洛-蒙塔奇諾紅葡萄酒
吉佳乐世家孔德里欧法定产区干白葡萄酒
info:
Brilliant clear golden yellow. Intensely flowery (violets), and fruity (apricot, peaches and citrus). Fresh and round. Rich, unctuous and full bodied. Harmonious with light acidity and round fleshy fruits. Delicate and elegant.
 酒体晶莹呈金黄色。散发着杏、桃子和柑橘的芬芳和花香，清新圆润而酒体醇厚，微酸和水果的圆润口感交织融合。精致而优雅的一款白葡萄酒.

name_en: Helan Qingxue Jia Bei Lan Grand Reserve
name_zh: 贺兰晴雪 加贝兰特别珍藏级干红葡萄酒
info: 暗紫红色，清澈；香气浓郁，具有清晰的烟熏、橡木以及黑色浆果、果酱香气，间或薄荷、清凉气息；口感饱满、厚实，单宁感重，中等偏重酒体，结构平衡，回味较长。Dark purple, clear; rich on nose, remarkable smoky, okay and dark berry, jam aromas, hints of mints and fresh herbs; round and rich in mouth, rich and matured tannins, medium plus body, well balanced structure with quite long aftertaste.

name_en: Casanova di Neri Brunello di Montalcino
name_zh: 卡萨诺瓦布鲁那洛红
info:
Our Brunello di Montalcino is aged in Slavonian oak barrels for about 30 months and in the bottle for a year. It was born in our historic vineyards originally from 1873. Its constant high quality is further enhanced by its elegance and finesse.
在斯洛文尼亚橡木桶中陈酿约30个月，然后瓶储一年。它诞生的葡萄园早在1873年就开始收获了。优雅细腻的风格更彰显了其始终如一的优良品质。

name_zh: 路易亚都世家热弗雷香贝坦法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Jadot Chevrey-Chambertin shows the qualities characteristic of the commune: deep color, with a multi faceted berry and red fruit bouquet, a full, tannic structure and mellow texture carry into a lasting finish.
This powerful and perfumed wine requires elaborate and strong tasting food: leg of mutton, boeuf bourguignon, strong cheeses...
这支路易热弗雷香贝坦融合了多种特色：深色色泽，混合浆果及红果的多层次酒香，酒体含有丰富的单宁，以及延续至余味的醇美口感。
这款强劲有力且香味十足的酒适合搭配精细且口味重的食物：譬如羊腿，红酒炖牛肉及重乳酪。

name_zh: 路易王妃香槟
info:
路易王妃香槟NV融合了来自40个葡萄园中6个不同的年份的黑比诺,莎当妮,皮诺莫尼耶葡萄。储於橡木桶36个月，是上乘的香槟。色泽呈淡金色，果香优雅怡人，酒质丰满，有结构感，复杂多变化。
Brut Premier embodies the Louis Roederer house style, gracefully blending the old and new. Made from reserve wines, it allies the freshness of youth the roundness and vinosity of mature wine. This is structured, expansive Champagne with a smooth attack and a modern, powerful style with no loss of finesse.

name_en: Antinori Pian delle Vigne Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
name_zh: 平安园-布鲁耐罗干红葡萄酒DOCG
info:
葡萄酒打后呈深石色，有几分石榴色。香味郁、复，含有辛辣味、色水果的香味以及些的草和可可的味道。入口后，酒体、醇厚、均衡，余味悠、持久。
The wine is a very intense ruby red with garnet highlights. The aromas are ample and complex with notes of red fruit, spices and touches of tobacco and chocolate. It is full and ample on the palate, balanced and with a long, sustained finish.

name_zh: 卡布瑞酒窖纳柏谷梅洛红葡萄酒
info:
Bright, sweet black cherry and plum compote aromas, complemented by tea-leaf spice and oak vanillin scents, introduce our lovely 2008 Napa Valley Merlot, which follows through on the smooth, round palate with succulent, mouthfilling, ripe cherry and plum flavors.  Displaying a deep, expansive mid-palate, fine underlying structure and a lingering, zesty finish enlivened by black tea spice tones, this mellifluous Merlot is delicious for current drinking, but will develop further complexity with another 2-3 years of bottle age.
 我们的梅洛富含鲜美黑樱桃、黑梅与黑莓风味，略带粗犷、辛辣、可可与甜橡木的特色。口感完整醇润，其鲜明酸味与圆润柔和的丹宁酸调和出香醇浓郁的黑樱桃与梅李口味，尾韵持久优雅，散发出矿物与红茶的香气。这款经典的纳柏谷梅洛初酿成即十分美味，以瓶装保存2-3年后更能呈现如花朵绽放般的惊人口感。

name_en: Domaine Méo-Camuzet Fixin 1er Cru Clos du Chapitre
name_zh: 凯慕思庄园菲尚-卓彼特一级葡萄园红葡萄酒
info: Reduction hides the nose though there is good energy to the lightly mineral-inflected middle weight flavors that possess a rich but detailed, balanced, focused and linear finish. A delicious effort that needs to develop more overall depth to reach the top end of my estimated range

name_en: Jacob’s Creek Century Hill Shiraz Barossa Valley
name_zh: 杰卡斯百岁山西拉干红
info:
并伴有微妙的巧克力、雪茄盒和黑胡椒的香气，使酒香颇具层次感。 
口味:
这款美酒口味柔软，酒体饱满，展示了深色浆果之美味，中度口味，口感多汁。黑胡椒、干香草和辛辣味随时间在酒瓶里愈加升华。迷人的水果质感，衬以优质单宁和整合良好的炭烤摩卡橡木味，更加相得益彰。这是一款结构优质、均衡、真正具有复合口感的美酒，回味香甜持久。
 Colour:
Intense ruby red, violet hues.
Bouquet:
Subtle notes of chocolate, cigar box, and black pepper are layered with
concentrated plum, black cherry and fruit cake.
Palate:
Soft and full-bodied, the wine shows rich dark fruit and berry flavours that
contribute to a juicy mid-palate. Black pepper, dried herb and spice
flavours evolve with time in the glass. The luscious fruit textures are
supported by fine tannins and well integrated charry mocha oak
characters. A well structured, balanced and truly complex wine with a
persistent sweet berry finish.

name_zh: 凯歌皇牌粉红香槟
云岭冰酒（冰葡萄酒）
info:
Flamboyant aromas of dried pineapple combine with fresh apricots and honey in this rich, unctuous wine that's incredibly sweet yet not cloying, thanks to vibrant acidity.
 此酒香气馥郁，蕴含菠萝干与清新的杏子、蜂蜜芬芳。酒体丰腴而醇郁。口味十分甜润，与精致的果酸交相辉映，恰倒好处。

name_en: Santa Rita Gran Hacienda Sauvignon Blanc
name_zh: 桑塔丽塔古园白苏维翁白葡萄酒
info:
Crisp and refreshing. Its fruity aroma of citrus blossoms and peaches is well balanced by delicate herbaceous undertones. Fruity and floral characteristics enhanced by a pleasant acidity intensify the wine’s freshness and smooth lingering on the palate.  
 清新，凉爽。精致的草本植物使该酒富含柑橘花和桃子的果香充满平衡。恰到好处的酸度使得该酒的果味和花香个性飘香四溢，加深了该酒的清新和顺滑， 回味较长。

name_en: E. Guigal Côte-Rôtie Brune et Blonde AOC
name_zh: 吉佳乐世家金与灰葡萄园露迪山麓法定产区干红葡萄酒
info:
Ruby red with red vermillion tints. Small red fruits, blackberry and floral violet aromas. Intensely aromatic, powerful but full of finesse. Supple with balance between the finesse of the aromas and an explosive richness due to the concentration of the wine. Greatly expressive of the terroir.
A feminine wine with voluptuous silky texture and intense aromas.
深邃的暗宝石红色泽，此酒具有红色水果，黑莓和水果紫罗兰香气。虽然香味浓郁，但却十分精细。这款久负盛名的露迪山麓干红酒体极为浓郁，香气与丰饶的口感平衡性极佳。堪称当地风土的最佳代表。
总体上说，是一款娇柔但香气浓郁，质感柔滑而令人陶醉的葡萄酒。

name_zh: 天路夏多内白葡萄酒
桑塔丽塔真实勋章莎当妮干白葡萄酒
info:
Attractive greenish-yellow colored wine. Lively, brilliant, with good varietal intensity. Tropical fruits tones, with fine wood, vanilla and dry fruits.  On the palate it is creamy, with elegant complexity. Ideal for long ageing.
White meats, fish and raw or cooked shellfish. Pastas with sea food. 黄绿色酒体淡雅迷人。酒质活跃而出众，带有葡萄品种典型的醇郁特质。热带果香与精致的木香、香草及干果的芬芳交织融合。有着乳脂般的质感，酒体优雅而复杂，适于久藏。
搭配白肉、鱼肉、生鲜或烹熟的贝类及海鲜意面味道鲜美无比。

name_zh: 拉博丝特卡莎苏维浓白葡萄酒
info:
Casa Cabernet Sauvignon
Pretty bright red with ruby violet hints. Red fruit and cassis well balanced with an elegant touch of oak.   Middle body and good tannic structure create a wine that is perfect to be enjoyed today or cellared for several years.
拉博丝特卡莎卡本内苏维浓红葡萄酒 
漂亮鲜艳的红色带有红宝石般的光泽；丝丝橡木的芳香与红色浆果和黑醋栗的果香完美的融合在一起；酒体适中，出色的单宁结构造就了一款既可马上饮用或者窖藏数年再开启分享的美酒。

name_zh: 阿里安
info: 此酒用纯棠兰尼罗葡萄酿制，经新法国木桶陈酿。它成熟、圆润，带有怡人的橡木味和活泼的浆果气息。酒体精致典雅。适于搭配烤红肉、北京烤鸭或川菜。       The wine is pure Tinto Fino aged in new French oak, to make a ripe rounded oaky wine, with youthful berry fruit. It was very polished and elegantIdeal to enjoy with grilled red meat, Beijing duck, or spicy Sichuan food.

name_en: G.H.Mumm de Cramant Blanc de Blancs
name_zh: 玛姆克拉芒白中白尊选香槟
info: 此酒呈清澈的浅金色。白色花香轻盈：山楂、椴花、白色苜蓿，然后过渡到果香和异国香料：胡椒、鲜姜、茴香、菠萝。酒体精致清新，入口轻盈而有丝滑口感；其香气与嗅觉一致，一重细致的果香更觉立体：白色水果和黄色水果的香气在口中交替呈现；架构均衡，矿物香气贯穿始终。余味悠长。

name_en: Kleine Zalze Cellar Selection Chenin Blanc Bush Vine
name_zh: 柯林茨精选白诗南干白
info:
Medium straw color.Strong lime, tropical, ripe pineapple aromas on the nose.A well-balanced wine with an elegant acidity. This medium full style Chenin Blanc will mature for up to two years in the bottle.This wine will compliment most seafood dishes, especially a prawn risotto and a juicy, seared tuna steak. It will also go well with pork chops, smoked gammon, chicken and spicy Indian dishes. Enjoy at 6-8°C.
适宜的麦秆黄色。浓郁的酸橙、热带水果和成熟凤梨的香气。口感均衡，显示出典雅的个性。这款酒体中等至浓厚的白诗南在瓶中成熟时间可达两年。它可以搭配大多数海鲜，尤其是凤尾虾意大利饭和烤金枪鱼排等。如果和猪排、腌猪腿、鸡肉及香辣印度菜肴搭配也很合适，适饮温度为6至8度。

name_zh: 怡园协奏曲干白
info:
Bright, pale yellow color. Delicate flower aroma with delicate Muscat notes. Full bodied with perfume notes balanced by hint of acidity and sweetness.
明亮的浅黄色。浓郁的花香散发着明显的玫瑰香独有香气。清新优雅，酒体均衡，入口感到轻微的酸度，収结处带有丝丝的甜味。

name_en: Two Hands Wines 'Coach House Block' Single Vineyard Shiraz
name_zh: 雙掌酒莊“馬車房”單一園設拉子紅葡萄酒
罗兰百悦特酿桃红香槟
info:
ASPECT
Elegant, with colour changing naturally from a pretty raspberry hint to salmon-pink.
AROMA
Precise and very crisp. Wide range of small red fruits: strawberries, redcurrants, raspberries and black cherries. Its amazing freshness is the dominating note.
TASTE
Intensely fruity flavours, clean, well-defined and slightly sharp, the wine then opens up to provide an impression of plunging into a basket of freshly picked red berries: strawberries, Morello cherries, blackcurrants and raspberries. The wine is supple and rounded on the finish.
外观 - 呈现明亮集中的金黄色；                        
香气 - 香气丰富有感染力，以杏仁、榛子等干果的香味为第一层、紧接着表现出焙烤的香味。经过长时间的品鉴与此款香槟的交流，便能逐步体会到香味中蜂蜜和松树脂的基调。                 
口感 - 充实且大方的口感，一款给人丰富体验的精美香槟

name_en: Tommasi Amarone Della Valpolicella Classico DOC
name_zh: 托马斯酒庄瓦尔普利切拉经典阿马罗内红葡萄酒
info:
Colour: Intense ruby red.
Nose: Warm, ripe on the nose, intense and of great refinement.
Palate: Complex, smooth, full bodied, characteristic with clear shades of dried grapes.
色泽: 深珠宝红；
香气: 柔和成熟水果芳香，极为精致浓郁。
口感: 层次复杂，丝滑饱满，有干葡萄的味道特点。

name_zh: 阿帕尔塔红葡萄酒
info:
Clos Apalta
Exuberant and complex nose, with red and black fruit such as plums, black cherries combined with currant, berries, dry figs with black cocoa and a violet touch. Well balanced, elegant with round, velvety and polished tannins. Sweet spices like clover and vanilla give an elegant touch towards a rich and long finish.
阿帕尔塔红葡萄酒
活泼而复杂的香味，有红色和黑色浆果的气息，比如李子，黑樱桃，其间透出加仑子，浆果，无花果干，可可，以及紫罗兰的花香的气息，在如同丁香，香草等甘美的香料的芳香中优雅结尾。这是一款口感平衡，气质优雅的葡萄酒，回味悠长，丰富。

name_zh: 奥莱娜小岛  赛普莱诺干红葡萄酒
info: 08年份浓郁丰富。黑樱桃，香烛，草药，烟草，皮革等香气。收尾圆润，丰满，诱人。对于08年份来说，这支酒的表现可以和托斯卡纳中部相匹敌。成熟时间：2016-2028The 2008 Cepparello (Sangiovese) possesses lovely density and richness for the year. Black cherries, incense, herbs tobacco and leather are some of the notes that flow from this textured, highly attractive Cepparello. The finish is round, sensual and inviting. The sheer magic of the finest years is missing, but that is asking too much in 2008, even of Paolo De Marchi. This is as good as it gets in central Tuscany in 2008. Anticipated maturity: 2016-2028.

name_zh: 贝思菲利普庄园黑比诺
info:
This wine is dominated by the rich, sweet, vibrant fruits (sour cherry; raspberries; loganberries; etc.) and rose petal/floral aromas which run into lingering, sweet fruits on the palate. The palate is long, supple and chewy, with a platform of firm but subdued tannins. The fruits, natural acidity and fine tannins will give the wine cellaring potential for eight years and beyond. Classical pinot noir structure.
深红色，泛着紫色光晕。香气中带有突出的酸樱桃、覆盆子、桂圆等果味特征，浓郁香甜，非常迷人。持久迷人的玫瑰等花朵的芬芳在口中绽放出甘甜的果味特征。口感绵长、饱满，酒香持久，单宁强劲致密。迷人的果味、自然的酸度和精致的单宁使此酒具有极强的窖藏能力，可陈年8年以上。经典的黑比诺酒体。

name_zh: 凯慕思庄园香波-木西尼红葡萄酒
奔富酒园BIN407加本力苏维翁红葡萄酒
info:
Quite a charmer, dark and handsomely fruited, with a dusty, floral bouquet of violets, blackberries, plums and cedar/chocolate oak over nuances of mocha and dried herbs. Its long, polished palate of sumptuous, vibrant fruit and fine-grained dusty tannin deliver genuine elegance and structure, finishing with pleasing balance and persistent fruit.Ideally suited to beef, veal and strong cheeses.
 拥有十分迷人而浓郁的果香，伴有紫罗兰，黑莓，李子及雪松/巧克力等淡淡酒香，橡木气息在摩卡咖啡及干草药芬芳的衬托下十分美妙。口感绵长，果香馥郁，单宁精妙，酒体优雅，回味均衡宜人。搭配牛排、小牛肉及乳酪十分理想。

name_en: F. Parent Volnay 1er Cru Les Fremiets
name_zh: 帕瑞特   沃尔奈一级苑伏尔麦红葡萄酒
info: 一款强劲的红葡萄酒，拥有成熟的樱桃和干葡萄味及紧实的单宁，带来辛辣的余韵。Wine Spectator, 2006 87分“ A powerful red, with ripe cherry, red currant and beefy tannins to match… with a spicy aftertaste.” – 87points, Wine Spectator, 2006

name_en: Duval Leroy Blanc de Chardonnay Millésimé
name_zh: 杜洛兒香檳霞多麗香檳
安东尼天娜红葡萄酒
info:
天娜葡萄（Tignanello）酒极富魅力。此款葡萄酒的成熟色水果香气丰富，略香草和烤面包的味道，余味优雅。毫疑，是一款极具性的葡萄酒，片土地的气息融入其中，极度彰出成熟的桑吉（Sangiovese）葡萄品种的妙曼，尤以收期的果最佳。
Tignanello is the wine of a vintage in which the grapes reached excellent levels of ripeness, and this is reflected in its intense ruby red color, its important aromatic concentration, its notes of ripe red fruit and jam accompanied by spice, vanilla, and liquorice. The palate is distinguished by a dense and elegant texture sustained by the vibrant acidity of the Sangiovese, by tannins of a lovely suppleness, and by an extremely long and lingering finish.

name_en: Tenuta Guado al Tasso, Bolgheri Superiore DOC
name_zh: 古道探索特选红葡萄酒DOC
variety:
Cabernet Sauvignon/65%
Merlot/20%
Cabernet Franc/12%
Petit Verdot/3%
info:
此酒散出优雅迷人的芳香，香味清新，稍微有果和薄荷的香味，与郁的深色水果香味有机地融一体。口感丰富、宁滑。余味悠，口中留的成熟黑果的味道久久之不去。探索大道庄各种味完美地融一体，其优良精致的品其第一滴酒就人迷。
On the nose the wine shows elegant notes of toasted oak, coffee, and spices followed by aromas of plums and black currants. On the palate, the initial impact is soft but firm with a vein of acidity which gives greater freshness and crispness than usual. The tannins are extremely elegant and the aftertaste is very persistent, with sustained and lingering notes of the coffee, berry fruit, and toasted oak first perceived on the nose.. It is a vintage with a great aging potential.

name_zh: 安东尼天娜红葡萄酒
info:
天娜葡萄（Tignanello）酒极富魅力。此款葡萄酒的成熟色水果香气丰富，略香草和烤面包的味道，余味优雅。毫疑，是一款极具性的葡萄酒，片土地的气息融入其中，极度彰出成熟的桑吉（Sangiovese）葡萄品种的妙曼，尤以收期的果最佳。
Tignanello is the wine of a vintage in which the grapes reached excellent levels of ripeness, and this is reflected in its intense ruby red color, its important aromatic concentration, its notes of ripe red fruit and jam accompanied by spice, vanilla, and liquorice. The palate is distinguished by a dense and elegant texture sustained by the vibrant acidity of the Sangiovese, by tannins of a lovely suppleness, and by an extremely long and lingering finish.

Cheval des Andes is a New World “Grand Cru” which combines the art

Terrazas de los Andes.
The result of such magical encounter is a refined, subtle and complex

两者相遇则成就了一款极具魅力而又细腻，复合，精致的安第斯名庄佳酿.

name_en: Gosset Grand Blanc De Blancs Brut
name_zh: 哥塞香槟白中白
info: 柔和的淡黄色泽，气泡细腻，浓郁的李子，桃子和干果的香气，口感丰富，饱满和圆润。该佳酿展现了清新优雅并结合了微妙的特质。                        Pale yellow in colour, light, fizzing with thousands of bubbles. An open and expressive nose, with rich flavours of plum, ripe apricots or peaches or even dried fruit. From the first sip the palate is rich, rounded and powerful. It shows a lovely development with a soft freshness combined with a light salty tang.

name_zh: 龙船庄园
格雷策酒庄苍穹之眼红
info:
The 2011 Amon-Ra reflects the absolute essence of the Amon-Ra style - generosity of flavour with finesse of structure. The vivid purple colour displays the intensity of youth. The nose has an abundance of dark fruits, plum, black cherry and hints of cassis with notes of mixed spice and anise. Although young and tightly wound on release, the vibrant blackberry and dried spice flavours integrate well with youthful yet supple tannins leading to a long and sleek finish. As with previous vintages of Amon-Ra, the astounding purity of expression and multilayered structure will allow this wine to mature with elegance for decades to come.
2011年份完美的展现出苍穹之眼的精华所在 - 澎湃的风味加上细致精巧的结构。酒体带有年轻而鲜艳的亮紫色，充满浓郁的黑色水果，李子和黑樱桃的芳香并带有一丝醋栗气息，混合各式香料和茴香的风味。口感年轻紧致，馥郁的黑莓和干香料的风味非常融洽地与饱满的单宁融合在一起，带出绵长柔顺的回味。和以往年份的表现一样，拥有极为纯净的口感和丰富的层次结构使得这款酒在往后的数十年间变得更为成熟优雅。

name_zh: 奔富酒园BIN389加本力设拉子干红葡萄酒
info:
Dense and dark, and, at the time of tasting, still possessing a purple core. The supportive oak sits beautifully, seamlessly integrated. Stewed plum flavors meshed with notes of cinnamon, nutmeg and whole black peppercorns. The palate is tight and full-bodied, persistent, long and forceful. The wine has impressive texture, with pronounced, well-defined powdery tannins and oak totally absorbed in wash of liquorice and berried fruits. 
酒体浓厚，呈深暗色,品尝时仍掩映出紫色的光泽。橡木的气息完美融入。熟透李子的果香与肉桂、肉豆蔻和黑胡椒的芳香紧密结合。口感丰富而持久稳固。酒体质感卓越，少许丹宁与橡木的气息显著而分明，散发着甘草和浆果的醇香。

name_en: Casanova di Neri Brunello di Montalcino Tenuta Nuova

info:
Our Brunello di Montalcino is aged in Slavonian oak barrels for about 30 months and in the bottle for a year. It was born in our historic vineyards originally from 1873. Its constant high quality is further enhanced by its elegance and finesse.

and mocha aromas woven with Christmas pudding spices, cinnamon/nutmeg and fig and prune. The primary notes of stewed, dark berry fruits are counter-balanced by secondary notes of demi-glace and roasting pan juices. Wild raspberry and loganberry fruits align with finessed tannins and a refreshing acidity to aid palate tightness.
Jeremy Oliver – 94 points 深暗红色酒体。没有一丝橡木的气息，巧克力，莫卡咖啡的醇香与圣诞布丁、肉桂、肉豆蔻、无花果和洋李子的芳香交织融合。在半冰沙司和烧烤汁口味的衬托下熟透黑李子的果香颇为平衡而更为显著。散发着野生核果和罗甘莓的醇香，丹宁细腻，酸度清爽，口感稳固。

Combines well with soups and vegetable dishes such as porrusalda, ratatouille with egg, or green beans with foie, poultry such as free range chicken or capon, grilled meats, cibet of hare meeat stews, rice with greens or with lobster, roast or stewed lamb.

name_en: Yao Ming Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 姚明那帕谷赤霞珠
variety:
Cabernet Sauvignon /82%
Merlot/ 8%
Cabernet Franc/7%
Petit Verdot /3%
info: 呈深红色。优雅而浓郁的香气展现出红色水果、樱桃、黑莓和醋栗的迷人特质，并带有一些香料、矿物岩和紫罗兰的味道，尾调中有些许香草的芬芳。入口酒体浓郁，风格严肃，单宁柔和，酸度平衡。陈年后更显优雅，极具潜力。.精选自南部Sugar Loaf山脉的葡萄园和北部St. Helena的Wollack 葡萄园。所选用的葡萄为赤霞珠337号、4号和6号。土壤为扇状冲击岩和火山石，海拔从70-548.6米不等。采摘的葡萄果实经由人工挑选以及去梗后，未经压榨置入小型不锈钢桶发酵，低温浸皮5至7天，在29-32摄氏度发酵。受到漫长而干旱的生长期和10月初的风暴的影响，果实状况不一，需要根据不同情况来进行一天一至二次的桶内循环。总体的浸皮时间从19-34天不等，发酵先在传统篮筐里小心压榨，并在橡木桶中保留全部酵母进行乳酸发酵。每年进行两次换桶，而只进行一次调配，确保酒体与橡木桶完美融合。每一个橡木桶中的酒经过单独品尝鉴定后选入最终的葡萄酒调配。采用人工培育的波尔多酵母分离，不经过滤直接装瓶。

name_zh: 巴黎之花美丽时光香槟
info:
玛姆克拉芒白中白香槟，是玛姆香槟所珍视的一个历史悠久的传统，首次上市于1892年。
最初，这款香槟专门为其尊贵客人订制并亲手递送，瓶身设计只是按19世纪习俗、附上一张G.H.MUMM折角名片。现今的瓶贴仍然沿袭了名片标签的独特传统。
品质轻盈优雅，浅酌一口，新鲜的青柠、柠檬以及柚子的味道令唇齿留香，恰与消解在口中的丰富汽泡奇妙融合，曼妙滋味萦绕心间。

name_zh: 宝禄爵丘吉尔爵士特酿香槟
info:
Brilliant citrine yellow infused with deeper gold, crowned by a delicate mousse of   tiny bubbles, suggests both youth and concentration. 
Opens with notes of the forest floor and leafy scents of moss and field mushrooms. As the wine warms up, the nose reveals fresher, acidic notes of citrus fruits and mint. And then a further range of scents: suave, vegetal notes of acacia, hawthorn, noisette and hazelnut. A champagne evocative of autumn!
Fine balance between a fresh acidity and the assertive young tannins. Robust and fine at the same time. The structure is compact and muscular with a solid mouthfeel. Elegant length on the finish. 
明亮的柑橘黄色，夹带着深金色，伴有细致如慕丝般的气泡，显示出其年轻与集中   的口感
开始有森林植被和苔藓、蘑菇的气息。随着葡萄酒温度的上升，气味开始显得更为新鲜，有柑橘的酸度和薄荷的气息显现。接着是一系列其他香味：金合欢、山楂、蔷薇与榛子。一款唤起秋天记忆的香槟！
在新鲜的酸度与直接的年轻单宁直接有着非常好的平衡。丰富、美好。结构紧凑，口感坚实。余味优雅绵长

唐培里侬粉红香槟（礼盒）
info:
On the nose:
The first hints of fresh almond and harvest aromas immediately open up into preserved lemon and dried fruits, the whole rounded off by darker smoky and toasted qualities.
On the palate:
The presence of the wine on the palate is immediately captivating. Paradoxically concentrated yet creamy, it is energetic and warm in the mouth, focusing on the fruit, then gradually taking on more profound bass notes. The whole holds its note perfectly, intensively, with just a subtle, elegant hint of underlying bitterness.
香味：最初能闻到新鲜杏仁和麦收时节的芬芳气味，随即是柠檬和干果的清香，综合着烟熏和烤面包的浓香。
口感：入口即刻就感觉醇香四溢，既醇厚又轻盈，散发出稠密的果味，紧接着变得丰盈芳醇。整体呈现完美并略微带有轻柔独特的矿物质感。

info:
This wine presents aromas of violets, cedar, black tea leaves, black peper and brioche.A soft ,creamy entry gives way to a concentrated mid-palate that expands in the mouth and lingers on the finish.Elements of cassis, toffee and cocoa round out the rich flavors of the wine.Intense fruit, bright acid and sturdy tannins promise resilience and longevity. 
此款干红散发出紫罗兰，雪松，红茶茶叶，黑胡椒及奶油甜点的芳香。入口后柔和如乳脂般的香气被浓郁的果香所替代，黑醋栗，太妃糖和可可的香气勾勒出此酒丰富醇美的风味，余味悠绵不绝。浓郁的果香，明快的果酸及强劲的单宁，确保了该酒酒质的稳定和陈年潜力。

info: 这款酒质量极佳，单宁丝般柔滑，有干的黑醋栗的香味，水果味和酸味均衡，保证了它的陈年能力。适于搭配肉和野味，烤肉或炖肉均可。可搭配意大利面、汤、蔬菜，诸如：青豆火腿、红卷心菜培根。也可搭配鱼，比如说鳕鱼或炖鱼。                                                  The resulting wine is remarkably fine, with silky tannins and dry cassis fruit, with a youthful balance of fruit and acidity, which will allow it to age.Good with meats and game, both grilled and stewed, pasta dishes, soups, vegetable dishes such as beans with ham or red cabbage with bacon, fish dishes such as hake in sauce or fish stew.

name_en: Yao Ming Family Reserve Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
name_zh: 姚明那帕谷珍藏赤霞珠
variety:
Cabernet Sauvignon/ 80%
Merlot/ 9%
Cabernet Franc /7%
Petit Verdot /3%
info: 呈深石榴石红色。优雅而浓郁的香气展现出深色水果如李子、樱桃和摩卡的香气，并带有一些黑巧克力、石墨和薰衣草的味道，尾调中有些许香草的芬芳以及烘烤气息。入口酒体中的单宁优雅且柔和，余味悠长。陈年后更显优雅，极具潜力。.精选自阿特拉斯山的山坡到卢瑟福的的葡萄园。所选用的葡萄为赤霞珠4号、6号和337号。土壤为扇状冲击岩和火山石，海拔从70-550米（200-1800英尺）不等。摘的葡萄果实经由人工挑选以及去梗后，未经压榨置入小型不锈钢桶发酵，低温浸皮5至7天，在29-32摄氏度发酵，需要根据不同情况来进行一天一至二次的桶内循环。总体的浸皮时间从21-40天不等，酒精发酵后采用筐式压榨法小心压榨，并在橡木桶中保留全部酒脚进行乳酸发酵。每年进行两次换桶，而只进行一次调配，确保酒体与橡木桶完美融合。每一个橡木桶中的酒经过单独品尝鉴定后选入最终的葡萄酒调配。美国本土酵母与少量的波尔多选择分离菌种参与了酒精发酵与苹果酸发酵的过程。不经过滤直接装瓶。

name_zh: 翰斯科神恩山红
info:
Very deep crimson in colour.A sweet ripe complex exotic nose of prunes, plums, blackberries, cedar and chocolate aromas.A rich sweet succulent palate, complex and well-structured with excellent concentration and texture, finishing long with velvety tannins.Wild hare with field mushrooms, abalone with tasty sauce.
很深的红色。香气甜美、成熟、复杂而奇特。具有洋李干、李子、黑樱桃、雪松以及巧克力的香气。具有丰盛甜美多汁的口感，结构复杂均衡，浓度高，后味悠长，单宁丝滑。野兔炖蘑菇，鲜汁鲍鱼。

奔富酒园葛兰许南澳设拉子干红葡萄酒
info:
A very ripe, assertive, profoundly structured and traditional warm year for Grange whose dark, brooding and brambly fruit and lavish oak are supported by drying, firm and chalky tannin. It is still a bruising young wine, with a surprisingly floral and heady, jasmine-like bouquet and dense layers of blackberries, blueberries, cassis and dark plums backed by smoky, meaty, dark chocolate and cedary influences. As it opens further, nuances of treacle, aniseed and graphite slowly emerge. Firm and dense, its palate simply drips with concentrated flavor, finishing with the length and balance expected of this label.
Ideally suited to beef, lamb and duck.

Jeremy Oliver – 96 points 一款成熟迷人酒体深邃，并且选用传统温和年份葡萄酿制出的经典葛兰许，散发深色水果与荆棘类水果的芳香，橡木气息在强劲单宁的衬托下更为馥郁。酒龄尚轻，拥有花草与茉莉花般的浓郁芳香，黑莓，蓝莓，黑醋栗及深色李子的混合口感层次分明，十分香醇，伴有烟熏味和强劲的黑巧克力及雪松气息。随醒酒时间的推移，糖蜜，茴香和石墨的芬芳逐渐散发出来。口感醇厚深邃，酒香浓郁，回味绵长而均衡。
此酒是牛肉、羊肉和鸭肉的理想搭配。

It has great power, depth and length with very vibrant, gritty fruit tannins providing immense structure. Notes of anise and spice linger for a long time after the last sip.
